5a13876a8bf55085c847fd06.description: Azir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd06.name: Shurima's Legacy

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcde.description: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks and abilities, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of An Acquired Taste. At three stacks, he can use Devour on an enemy champion.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcde.name: An Acquired Taste

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb2.description: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb2.name: Salvation

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd04.description: Sivir gains a short burst of Movement Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd04.name: Fleet of Foot

5a13876a8bf55085c847fca7.description: Entering a stance grants Udyr bonus Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short duration. This effect can stack multiple times.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fca7.name: Monkey's Agility

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9a.description: Irelia reduces the duration of disables on herself based on whether she is Outnumbered by nearby champions. If she's in an even fight, she'll reduce disables by a small amount, if she's outnumbered, she'll reduce disables by a larger amount.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9a.name: Ionian Fervor

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf1.description: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf1.name: Living Vengeance

5a13876a8bf55085c847fccd.description: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fccd.name: Bravado

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb5.description: Tryndamere gains Fury for each attack, critical strike, and killing blow he makes. Fury passively increases his Critical Strike Chance and can be consumed with his Bloodlust spell.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb5.name: Battle Fury

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbb.description: Darius aims his attacks strategically, causing his target to bleed. This effect stacks up to five times. Enemies that reach max Hemorrhage cause Darius to gain Noxian Might, greatly increasing his damage.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbb.name: Hemorrhage

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc94.description: After casting 3 spells, Sona's next attack deals bonus magic damage in addition to a bonus effect depending on what song Sona last activated.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc94.name: Power Chord

5a683242fc675d0c906f60a1.description: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing 4% of their maximum Health in magic damage over 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. If Brand kills an enemy while it is ablaze he regains mana. When Blaze reaches max stacks on a Champion or large monster, it becomes unstable. It detonates in 2 seconds, applying spell effects and dealing massive damage in an area around the victim.
5a683242fc675d0c906f60a1.name: Blaze

5a13876a8bf55085c847fce5.description:
While in brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack.

Rengar's abilities build Ferocity. Upon reaching full Ferocity, his next ability becomes empowered and grants him Movement Speed on cast, but he instantly loses all Ferocity if he leaves combat.

Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, permanently increasing his Attack Damage.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fce5.name: Unseen Predator

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb6.description: Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which causes him to move faster and detonate after 4 seconds; dealing 100 + (25 x lvl) true damage to surrounding enemies.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb6.name: Icathian Surprise

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0b.description: Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion, monster, or tower. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold based on how much Adoration he has.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0b.name: League of Draven

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcfb.description:
When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage.

Damage from lane minions is unaffected.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcfb.name: Void Shift

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9d.description: Every 40 points of bonus Health gives Vladimir 1 Ability Power and every 1 point of Ability Power gives Vladimir 1.4 bonus Health (does not stack with itself).
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9d.name: Crimson Pact

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0a.description: Nautilus' basic attacks deal bonus physical damage and immobilize his targets. This effect cannot happen more than once every few seconds on the same target.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0a.name: Staggering Blow

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd11.description: Maokai's basic attack also heal him on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd11.name: Sap Magic

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd00.description: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd00.name: Sunlight

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc8e.description: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target for a short duration.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc8e.name: Pyromania

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc1.description: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc1.name: Mana Surge

5a1387728bf55085c847fd32.description: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to receive gold and experience. After level 5 Ivern can share jungle buffs with allies.
5a1387728bf55085c847fd32.name: Friend of the Forest

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc7.description:
Poppy throws her buckler, gaining range and bonus magic damage.

The buckler lands at a nearby location and Poppy can pick it up to gain a shield. Enemies can step on the buckler to destroy it.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc7.name: Iron Ambassador

5a13876a8bf55085c847fccc.description:
Zilean stores time as Experience.

When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives. Cannot be used in combat.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fccc.name: Time in a Bottle

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc5.description: <mainText>Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.</mainText>
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc5.name: Fury of the Dragonborn

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf3.description: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf3.name: Illumination

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc98.description:
Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged in the last 3 seconds, her ability cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds.

If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc98.name: Voracity

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc95.description: Jinx receives massively increased Movement Speed and stacking Attack Speed whenever she damages an enemy champion, tower, or inhibitor that is then killed or destroyed within 3 seconds.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc95.name: Get Excited!

5a13876a8bf55085c847fca3.description: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fca3.name: Soul Eater

5a13876a8bf55085c847fccb.description: Skarner's presence causes crystals to spawn in set locations around the map. While near crystals his team owns, Skarner gains tremendous movement speed, attack speed, and mana regeneration.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fccb.name: Crystal Spires

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc92.description: Zed's basic attacks against targets below 50% Health deal 6-10% of the target's maximum Health as bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every 10 seconds on the same target.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc92.name: Contempt for the Weak

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbe.description: After using an ability, Xayah's next few basic attacks will hit all enemies along their path and dropping Feathers she can recall.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbe.name: Clean Cuts

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd7.description: Jax's consecutive basic attacks continuously increase his Attack Speed.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd7.name: Relentless Assault

5a13876a8bf55085c847fca8.description: Jarvan IV's initial basic attack on a target deals bonus physical damage. This effect cannot occur again on the same target for a short duration.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fca8.name: Martial Cadence

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcaa.description: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining 30 movement speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcaa.name: Night Hunter

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb4.description: When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy Champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb4.name: Unseen Threat

5a13876a8bf55085c847fce0.description: Kassadin takes 15% reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fce0.name: Void Stone

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcff.description: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is doubled. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcff.name: Way of the Wanderer

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9b.description: Gains a charge of Essence Theft whenever a spell hits an enemy (max: 3 charges per spell). Upon reaching 9 charges, Ahri's next spell heals her whenever it hits an enemy.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9b.name: Essence Theft

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcef.description: Bard's presence causes magical chimes to appear, which grant Bard experience, mana, and a burst of speed. Additionally, lesser spirits follow Bard and aid in his attacks - collecting chimes causes these meeps to gain power over the course of the game.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcef.name: Traveler's Call

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd4.description: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd4.name: Ki Barrier

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcad.description:
When LeBlanc damages an enemy with a spell, she marks the target for 4 seconds. After 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc's next spell shatters the Sigil to deal magic damage.

Sigil of Malice cannot occur again on the same unit for 5 seconds.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcad.name: Sigil of Malice

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd1.description: While unburrowed Rek'Sai generates Fury with her basic attacks and spells. When burrowed Rek'Sai consumes Fury to heal herself.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd1.name: Fury of the Xer'Sai

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0c.description: Orianna's autoattack deals additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna attacks the same target.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0c.name: Clockwork Windup

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc4.description:
After being killed, Sion will reanimate with rapidly decaying Health. His attacks become very rapid, gain 100% Lifesteal and deal bonus damage equal to 10% of his target's maximum Health (max 75 to monsters).

All his abilities are replaced with Death Surge, which grants a burst of Movement Speed.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc4.name: Glory in Death

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9c.description: Stars orbit Aurelion Sol, dealing magic damage when they hit an enemy.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9c.name: Center of the Universe

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf4.description: Every 12 seconds, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf4.name: Short Fuse

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcdd.description: Each time Zac hits an enemy with an ability, he sheds a chunk of himself that can be reabsorbed to restore Health. Upon taking fatal damage, Zac splits into 4 bloblets that attempt to recombine. If any bloblets remain, he will revive with an amount of Health depending on the Health of the surviving bloblets. Each bloblet has a percentage of Zac's maximum Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. This ability has a 5 minute cooldown.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcdd.name: Cell Division

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc3.description: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc3.name: Lightslinger

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0e.description: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0e.name: Trial by Fire

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb1.description: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb1.name: Carnivore

5a1387728bf55085c847fd31.description:
Janna passively gains 8% Movement Speed, and nearby allied champions gain this bonus when moving toward her.

Additionally, Janna's basic attacks cause additional magic damage based on her bonus Movement Speed.
5a1387728bf55085c847fd31.name: Tailwind

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd8.description: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells for 7 seconds.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd8.name: Death Defied

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd09.description: Ekko's Zero-Drive charges his spells and attacks with temporal energy. The third hit deals bonus damage and, if the target is a champion, Ekko gains accelerated movement speed.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd09.name: Z-Drive Resonance

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc0.description: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain 40% Attack Speed and return 20/10 Energy.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc0.name: Flurry

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc2.description: Vel'Koz's abilities apply <font color='#FFFFFF'>Organic Deconstruction</font> to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc2.name: Organic Deconstruction

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd6.description: Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd6.name: Phenomenal Evil Power

5a13876a8bf55085c847fce3.description: After attacking or casting spells 4 times, Pantheon will block the next incoming basic attack or turret attack.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fce3.name: Aegis Protection

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcdc.description: Increases Wukong's Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcdc.name: Stone Skin

5a13876a8bf55085c847fccf.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased by 1% for each 1% of his Health he is missing.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fccf.name: Berserker Rage

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd02.description:
Every 10 seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for 120% physical damage and heals himself.

Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd02.name: Umbra Blades

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd10.description: Every third strike restores mana and cleaves nearby enemies for additional magic damage. Every spell cast grants attack speed for the next 3 attacks.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd10.name: Moonsilver Blade

5a27542b8bf550482ed63f89.name: Adrenaline Rush
5a27542b8bf550482ed63f89.description: Dr. Mundo regenerates 0.3% of his maximum Health each second.

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcea.description:
Kennen's abilities add one stack of Mark of the Storm to their target for 6 seconds. If the target reaches 3 stacks, it is stunned for 1.25 seconds and Kennen gains 25 Energy.

The stun will be a diminished duration of 0.5 seconds if it occurs again within 6 seconds.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcea.name: Mark of the Storm

5a13876a8bf55085c847fce4.description: When Blitzcrank's life is brought below 20% health, he activates Mana Barrier. This creates a mana shield equal to 50% of his mana for 10 seconds. Mana Barrier can only occur once every 90 seconds.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fce4.name: Mana Barrier

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd0.description: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself and all nearby allied champions.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd0.name: Triumphant Roar

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbc.description: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she attacks a new target.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbc.name: Love Tap

5a2754308bf550482ed63f8c.name: Garden of Thorns
5a2754308bf550482ed63f8c.description:
Seeds spawn around Zyra periodically, becoming faster with level and lasting 30 seconds. If an enemy Champion steps on a seed, it dies.

Zyra can cast spells near seeds to grow plants. Extra plants striking the same target deal reduced damage.

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc9.description: Cassiopeia gains Movement Speed per level, but she cannot purchase Boots items.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc9.name: Serpentine Grace

5a13876a8bf55085c847fca2.description: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fca2.name: King's Tribute

5a1387728bf55085c847fd30.description: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.
5a1387728bf55085c847fd30.name: Demon Shade

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf7.description:
Standing still or channeling abilities for 1.5 seconds empowers Fiddlesticks with Dread. Immobilizing crowd control resets this timer.

Dread grants Movement Speed, but only lasts for 1.5s after Fiddlesticks starts moving.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf7.name: Dread

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd13.description: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd13.name: Deadly Venom

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcce.description: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcce.name: Junkyard Titan

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc93.description: On ability use, Gragas takes a drink restoring 6% of his max Health. This effect can only happen every 8 seconds.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc93.name: Happy Hour

5a2754378bf550482ed63f8d.name: Soul Siphon
5a2754378bf550482ed63f8d.description: Morgana heals for the spell damage she deals to champions, large minions, and large monsters.

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd07.description: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd07.name: Determination

5a13876a8bf55085c847fca4.description: Fizz's dexterity allows him to move through units and take less physical damage from basic attacks.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fca4.name: Nimble Fighter

5a13876a8bf55085c847fca1.description:
Spells gain extra effects at max rank.

Dark Sphere: Sphere's lifetime is increased to 8 seconds.
Force of Will: Deals 20% bonus true damage.
Scatter the Weak: Spell width increased by 50%.
Unleashed Power: Range increased by 75.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fca1.name: Transcendent

5a13876a8bf55085c847fce8.description: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fce8.name: Damnation

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcae.description: At one point in the game, Kayn will permanently transform into either a Shadow Assassin or a Darkin.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcae.name: The Darkin Scythe

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbf.description:
Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling.

Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbf.name: Spider Queen

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9e.description: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus Movement Speed.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9e.name: Warpath

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0f.description: Corki's basic attack deals a percentage of their damage as magic instead of physical. Every once in a while, The Package arrives in Corki's base to be picked up, temporarily granting him out of combat Movement Speed and upgrading Valkyrie into Special Delivery.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0f.name: Hextech Munitions

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc99.description: Pix is a wild Faerie that accompanies Lulu. Pix will fire a barrage of magical energy at targets that Lulu attacks.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc99.name: Pix, Faerie Companion

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd05.description: Riven's abilities charge her blade, causing her basic attacks to deal bonus physical damage. Riven's blade may be charged up to three times and expends one charge per attack.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd05.name: Runic Blade

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf2.description: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of movement speed when passing them.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf2.name: Noxious Slipstream

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9f.description:
Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts.

While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage to champions. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9f.name: Skaarl, the Cowardly Lizard

5a13876a8bf55085c847fce1.description: While in combat Gnar generates Rage. At maximum Rage his next ability will transform him into Mega Gnar, granting increased survivability and access to new spells.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fce1.name: Rage Gene

5a27542b8bf550482ed63f8a.name: Cursed Touch
5a27542b8bf550482ed63f8a.description: Amumu's basic attacks <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font> enemies for 3 seconds, causing them to take 10% bonus true damage from any magic damage dealt to them.<rules>

5a13876a8bf55085c847fce7.description: When Kayle attacks a champion, the target loses 3% Armor and Magic Resist for 5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fce7.name: Holy Fervor

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0d.description: Graves's shotgun holds two shells. After firing them he must reload. Each attack fires several bullets in a cone. Hitting an enemy with multiple bullets does bonus damage. These bullets cannot pass through units.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0d.name: New Destiny

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcfd.description: Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcfd.name: Echoing Flames

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf0.description: <mainText>Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area. Colossal Smash's cooldown is reduced when Galio hits champions with his spells.</mainText>
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf0.name: Colossal Smash

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcac.description: Gain Movement Speed while near allied towers and turrets deployed by Heimerdinger.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcac.name: Hextech Affinity

5a13876a8bf55085c847fceb.description:
Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere.

Additionally, when Ornn reaches level 13 masterwork upgrades for some items become available for Ornn and his team to purchase.

Ornn can smith items directly from his forge menu or the shop.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fceb.name: Living Forge

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf6.description: Every several seconds Lissandra's next ability costs no Mana. This cooldown is reduced whenever Lissandra impairs an enemy's movement with an ability (does not apply to movement-impairing effects from items).
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf6.name: Iceborn

5a8252b78bf550fb743b9bbd.name: Ravenous Flock
5a8252b78bf550fb743b9bbd.description: Swain's ravens collect Soul Fragments that heal him. Swain can right-click an immobilized enemy champions to pull them closer to him, dealing damage and ripping out a Soul Fragment.

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd5.description: Reduces Mantra's cooldown each time Karma damages an enemy champion with one of her abilities (Half-effect for Karma's basic attacks)
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd5.name: Gathering Fire

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd15.description: A percent of the damage dealt from abilities is converted into a temporary shield, absorbing incoming damage.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd15.name: Iron Man

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd16.description:
Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her to deal increased damage to these targets.

Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd16.name: Frost Shot

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb8.description: Akali's first two attacks are empowered. The first strike heals her, and the second strike deals bonus magic damage. Twin Disciplines will recharge itself automatically a short while after being used.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb8.name: Twin Disciplines

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf9.description: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second. Minion damage does not stop Perseverance.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf9.name: Perseverance

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcfe.description: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for 3 seconds.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcfe.name: Guerrilla Warfare

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd03.description: <mainText>After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage.  Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.</mainText>
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd03.name: Fury of the North

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd3.description: Volibear heals rapidly for a few seconds when his Health drops to a critical level.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd3.name: Chosen of the Storm

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd9.description: Rammus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, scaling with his Armor.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd9.name: Spiked Shell

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcdb.description: Taliyah gains movement speed near walls.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcdb.name: Rock Surfing

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcda.description: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcda.name: Rising Spell Force

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb0.description: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb0.name: Martial Poise

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcee.description:
Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Movement Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range.

Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Movement Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcee.name: Prowl

5a27542d8bf550482ed63f8b.name: Visionary
5a27542d8bf550482ed63f8b.description: After 5 attacks, Nunu's next spell costs no Mana and is empowered to do its next rank's effects.

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb3.description: Shaco's basic attack critically strikes for extra damage when striking a unit from behind. Units can't be Backstabbed more than once every few seconds, modified by Shaco's cooldown reduction.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb3.name: Backstab

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc8f.description: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc8f.name: Blast Shield

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf5.description: Fiora challenges nearby enemy Champions to dodge her. She calls out a direction from which she will try to strike. If she can complete her own challenge, she receives a small bonus and calls out a new direction.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf5.name: Duelist's Dance

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc6.description: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc6.name: Headshot

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb7.description: Braum adds stacks of Concussive Blows to enemies with basic attacks or Winter's Bite. He and his allies continue to add stacks with basic attacks, at 4 stacks their target will be stunned.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb7.name: Concussive Blows

5a683201fc675d0c906f60a0.description: Basic attacks on champions grant a shield equal to 20% of Camille's maximum health against their damage type (Physical or Magic) for a brief duration.
5a683201fc675d0c906f60a0.name: Adaptive Defenses

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcec.description: After casting Transform Jayce gains 40 Movement Speed and can move through units for the next 1.25 seconds.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcec.name: Hextech Capacitor

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbd.description: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbd.name: Eternal Hunger

5a27543b8bf550482ed63f8f.name: More Sparkles!
5a27543b8bf550482ed63f8f.description: Zoe's next basic attack after casting a spell deals bonus magic damage.

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd08.description: Viktor starts with the Prototype Hex Core that can be upgraded three times in the store to augment his abilities.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd08.name: Glorious Evolution

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd12.description: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd12.name: Mark of the Kindred

5a2754398bf550482ed63f8e.name: Reign of Anger
5a2754398bf550482ed63f8e.description: Renekton gains Fury for every autoattack he makes. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects. Additionally, Renekton gains bonus Fury when he is low on life.

5a13876a8bf55085c847fca0.description: Talon's spells Wound champions and epic monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fca0.name: Blade's End

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc97.description: <mainText>Yorick can raise Mist Walkers with his abilities. Enemies that die near Yorick will sometimes leave a grave.</mainText>
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc97.name: Shepherd of Souls

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc8d.description: Illaoi and the <font color='#669900'>Vessels</font> she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at spirits, <font color='#669900'>Vessels</font>, and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit, and will heal Illaoi if they damage a champion.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc8d.name: Prophet of an Elder God

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcfc.description: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving anywhere between 1 and 6 bonus gold.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcfc.name: Loaded Dice

5a13876a8bf55085c847fce9.description: When Nami's abilities hit allied champions they gain Movement Speed for a short duration.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fce9.name: Surging Tides

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb9.description: Upon dying, Anivia will revert into an egg. If the egg can survive for six seconds, she is gloriously reborn.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb9.name: Rebirth

5a13876a8bf55085c847fced.description: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fced.name: Draw a Bead

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd14.description: Aatrox fills up his Blood Well through his abilities. When filled, Aatrox becomes Hellbent for as long as he stays in combat with champions or monsters, granting him attack damage, attack speed, and the ability to survive fatal damage.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd14.name: Blood Well

5a13876a8bf55085c847fca6.description: <mainText>Ryze's spells deal extra damage based on his Bonus Mana, and he gains a percentage increase to his maximum Mana based on his Ability Power.</mainText>
5a13876a8bf55085c847fca6.name: Arcane Mastery

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd01.description: Jhin's hand cannon, Whisper, is a precise instrument designed to deal superior damage. It fires at a fixed rate and carries only four shots. Jhin imbues the final bullet with dark magics to critically strike and deal bonus execute damage. Whenever Whisper crits, it inspires Jhin with a burst of movement speed.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd01.name: Whisper

5a13876a8bf55085c847fca5.description: Valor periodically marks enemies as <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font>. Quinn's first basic attack against <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font> targets will deal bonus physical damage.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fca5.name: Harrier

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcaf.description: Every few strikes, Master Yi strikes twice.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcaf.name: Double Strike

5a13876a8bf55085c847fce6.description: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for 10 seconds, this effect recharges.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fce6.name: Granite Shield

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1f0.description: Nunu launches a ball of ice at an enemy unit, dealing damage and temporarily slowing their Movement and Attack Speeds.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1f0.name: Ice Blast
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1f0.tooltip: Nunu launches a ball of ice at an enemy unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5b3.description: Diana draws in and slows all nearby enemies. Passively grants Diana attack speed after spell casts.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b3.name: Moonfall
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b3.tooltip:
Passive: Increases the attack speed gained from Moonsilver Blade to {{ e3 }}%.

Active: Reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and then slows them by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d218.description: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d218.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
5a1385df8bf55085c847d218.tooltip: Empowers an allied champion's next {{ e4 }} basic attacks, causing them to slow the target by {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) for {{ e3 }} second and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage. Lasts for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a13865b8bf55085c847d60f.description:
Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies.

Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.
5a13865b8bf55085c847d60f.name: To the Skies! / Shock Blast
5a13865b8bf55085c847d60f.tooltip: Leaps to an enemy dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a1386428bf55085c847d544.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
5a1386428bf55085c847d544.name: Tidal Wave
5a1386428bf55085c847d544.tooltip:
Summons a Tidal Wave from Nami's position. The wave knocks up enemies and slows them by {{ e4 }}%, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The duration of the slow increases based on how far the Tidal Wave has traveled, with a minimum duration of {{ e3 }} seconds and a maximum of {{ e5 }} seconds.

Allies hit by the wave gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d24e.description: Strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d24e.name: Terrify
5a1385df8bf55085c847d24e.tooltip: Terrifies a target, causing it to flee from Fiddlesticks for {{ e1 }} seconds.

5a13865c8bf55085c847d616.description: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Movement Speed and Attack Damage.
5a13865c8bf55085c847d616.name: Duskbringer
5a13865c8bf55085c847d616.tooltip:
Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and leaves a Dusk Trail for {{ e3 }} seconds. Enemy champions hit also leave a Dusk Trail.

While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and gains {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and {{ e4 }} Attack Damage.

5a1386408bf55085c847d493.description: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to minions and monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.
5a1386408bf55085c847d493.name: Alpha Strike
5a1386408bf55085c847d493.tooltip:
Master Yi teleports to strike up to {{ e8 }} enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage, with an additional {{ e3 }} damage to minions and monsters. During Alpha Strike Master Yi is untargetable.

Alpha Strike can critically strike, dealing an additional {{ f1 }} physical damage. Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Alpha Strike by {{ e7 }} second.

5a89c6b08bf5504e255a003e.description: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit collision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.
5a89c6b08bf5504e255a003e.name: Trample
5a89c6b08bf5504e255a003e.tooltip:
Alistar tramples the ground, ignoring unit collision and dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to nearby enemies. Each pulse that damages at least one enemy champion grants Alistar a Trample stack.

At {{ e5 }} Trample stacks Alistar empowers his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal an additional {{ f3 }} magic damage and stun for {{ e6 }} second.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d42e.description: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d42e.name: Allure
5a13863f8bf55085c847d42e.tooltip:
Curses target champion or monster for 5 seconds. If Evelynn hits the target with a basic attack or ability, she will expunge the Curse, refund its mana cost, and briefly slow the target by {{ e3 }}%.

If the Curse lasts at least 2.5 seconds, expunging it Charms the target for {{ e2 }} second(s) and:
  • Against champions: shreds Magic Resist by {{ e9 }}% for {{ e0 }} seconds.
    Against monsters: deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Charm duration increased by {{ e1 }} seconds.

    • Casting Allure does not remove Evelynn from Demon Shade.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d193.description: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d193.name: Grand Entrance
5a1385df8bf55085c847d193.tooltip: Dashes to a location. Upon arrival Rakan spirals into the air, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and knocking up enemies for {{ e3 }} second.

5a1386438bf55085c847d557.description: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.
5a1386438bf55085c847d557.name: Tempered Fate
5a1386438bf55085c847d557.tooltip:
Bard sends magical energy arcing to a target location. On impact, all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets in the target area are put in stasis, becoming invincible, untargetable, and unable to act for {{ e1 }} seconds.

Epic monsters are also put into stasis, despite normally being immune to disables.

5a1386428bf55085c847d507.description: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.
5a1386428bf55085c847d507.name: Shadow Dash
5a1386428bf55085c847d507.tooltip:
Passive: Dealing damage with Shadow Dash or Twilight Assault recovers {{ f1 }} Energy.

Active: Shen dashes in a direction, dealing {{ e2 }} [+{{ f2 }}] physical damage to enemy champions and neutral monsters in his path and taunting them for {{ e1 }} seconds.

5a1386408bf55085c847d496.description: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement and Attack Speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.
5a1386408bf55085c847d496.name: Highlander
5a1386408bf55085c847d496.tooltip:
Passive: Champion kills and assists reduce the remaining cooldown of Master Yi's basic abilities by {{ e5 }}%.

Active: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}%, Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}%, and grants immunity to slows for {{ e1 }} seconds. While active, champion kills and assists extend the duration of Highlander by {{ e4 }} seconds.

5a38501c8bf55044c7f60853.description:
Hammer Stance: Deals magic damage to an enemy and knocks them back a short distance.

Cannon Stance: Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the Movement Speed of all allied champions who pass through it. If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase.
5a38501c8bf55044c7f60853.name: Thundering Blow / Acceleration Gate
5a38501c8bf55044c7f60853.tooltip: Deals {{ e4 }}% of the target's maximum health (+{{ a1 }}) as magic damage and knocks them back a short distance. ({{ e1 }} Maximum Damage against monsters)

5a2745c08bf550482ed63dd7.description: Camille's next attack deals bonus damage and grants bonus movement speed. This spell can be recast for a short period of time, doing significantly increased bonus damage if Camille delays a period of time between the two attacks.
5a2745c08bf550482ed63dd7.name: Precision Protocol
5a2745c08bf550482ed63dd7.tooltip:
Camille's next basic attack deals {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage and increases her movement speed by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} second. This ability can be recast in the next {{ e0 }} seconds at no cost.

If the second Precision Protocol attack hits at least {{ e1 }} seconds after the first, the bonus damage is increased by {{ e8 }}% to {{ f2 }} and {{ f3 }}% of the attack is converted into true damage.

Precision Protocol cannot critically strike.

5a1386428bf55085c847d513.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
5a1386428bf55085c847d513.name: Powerball
5a1386428bf55085c847d513.tooltip:
Rammus accelerates in a ball, gaining up to {{ f2 }}% Movement Speed over {{ e4 }} seconds. On enemy collision, he stops, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back, and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second.

Can be reactivated to end the effect early and put Powerball on cooldown.
Powerball is a channeled spell and is subject to interruption by spells that prevent casting.
Casting Powerball cancels Defensive Ball Curl and puts it on cooldown.

5a1386658bf55085c847d628.description: Ivern places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies.
5a1386658bf55085c847d628.name: Triggerseed
5a1386658bf55085c847d628.tooltip:
Ivern shields an ally, absorbing up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f3 }}) damage. After 2 seconds, the shield bursts dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Can also be cast on Daisy.

5a1386438bf55085c847d547.description: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage.
5a1386438bf55085c847d547.name: Slicing Maelstrom
5a1386438bf55085c847d547.tooltip:
Summons a magical storm for {{ e3 }} seconds that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies near Kennen every {{ e2 }} seconds. Each maelstrom hit applies Mark of the Storm, up to a maximum of 3.

Successive maelstrom hits against the same enemy deal an additional {{ e4 }}% damage for each hit they've already suffered from this storm.

5a1386428bf55085c847d51e.description: Zac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.
5a1386428bf55085c847d51e.name: Stretching Strikes
5a1386428bf55085c847d51e.tooltip:
Zac's arm stretches and grabs the first enemy it hits, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage and briefly slowing them. Zac's next basic attack is replaced with a long range smack that repeats the initial magic damage and slow effect.

If Zac grabs a different enemy with each attack he'll throw them towards each other, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage in an area if they collide.

5a2745ad8bf550482ed63dd1.description: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.
5a2745ad8bf550482ed63dd1.name: Bramble Smash
5a2745ad8bf550482ed63dd1.tooltip: Maokai smashes his fist into the ground, releasing a shockwave. Nearby enemies are knocked away from him and all affected enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed briefly.

5a5cb715fc675d0d88f83079.description: Heimerdinger invents an upgrade, causing his next spell to have increased effects.
5a5cb715fc675d0d88f83079.name: UPGRADE!!!
5a5cb715fc675d0d88f83079.tooltip:
Makes Heimerdinger's next ability free and gives it bonus effects. Reactivate to cancel.

H-28Q Apex Turret: Places a Turret for 8 seconds that deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage with its cannon and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage with its beam. It has splash damage, immunity to disables, its attacks slow by 25% for 2 seconds and it doesn't count toward the Turret limit.

Hextech Rocket Swarm: Fires 4 waves of rockets that each deal {{ e8 }} (+{{ f1 }}) Magic Damage. Champions and Monsters hit by multiple rockets take reduced damage, max {{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }}).

CH-3X Lightning Grenade: Throws a bouncing grenade that discharges three times, dealing {{ e0 }} (+{{ f4 }}) Magic Damage. Both the stun and slow areas are larger and the slow is improved to 80%.

5a89c6528bf5504e255a0033.description:
Passively gain Attack Damage when near her Oathsworn ally, and deal bonus damage when striking the same target.

Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.
5a89c6528bf5504e255a0033.name: Sentinel
5a89c6528bf5504e255a0033.tooltip:
Passive: When Kalista is near her Oathsworn, she gains {{ e8 }} Attack Damage. If they both basic attack the same target, she deals {{ e2 }}% of their max health as magic damage. {{ e7 }} second cooldown per target.

Active: Send a soul Sentinel to patrol an unseen area. Champions spotted are revealed for 4 seconds. Sentinels last 3 laps.

Kalista gains a charge of Sentinel every {{ e4 }} seconds.

5a2745bf8bf550482ed63dd5.description: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Movement Speed.
5a2745bf8bf550482ed63dd5.name: Grasping Roots
5a2745bf8bf550482ed63dd5.tooltip:
Sends forward vines dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and rooting enemies for {{ e5 }} second(s).

Garden of Thorns: If Grasping Roots passes near a seed, a Vine Lasher grows dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds. A Vine Lasher has 400 range and lasts {{ f2 }} seconds.

5a89c61d8bf5504e255a002f.description: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, <font color='#cd90ee'>Camouflaging</font> him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Movement Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy for a guaranteed critical strike, even without being in brush.
5a89c61d8bf5504e255a002f.name: Thrill of the Hunt
5a89c61d8bf5504e255a002f.tooltip:
Rengar gains {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and True Sight of the nearest enemy champion within {{ e9 }} range for {{ e2 }} seconds.

After the first {{ e6 }} seconds, Rengar becomes Camouflaged and can leap to an enemy without being in brush. Leaping to the nearest champion deals {{ a1 }} bonus physical damage and reduces their Armor by {{ e8 }} for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Enemy champions within {{ e3 }} range and their nearby allies can sense Rengar during Thrill of the Hunt.
Enemies revealed by Thrill of the Hunt stay revealed for the spell's duration.
Attacking or casting most spells ends Thrill of the Hunt.
Stealth - Camouflaged: This character is hidden from view. It is revealed by nearby enemy champions and turrets.

5a1386588bf55085c847d5f7.description: Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance.
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f7.name: Glacial Storm
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f7.tooltip:
Activate: Drains {{ e2 }} Mana per second.

Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail that increases in size over {{ e7 }} seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to targets and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}%.

When the Glacial Storm is fully formed, it slows targets' Movement Speed by {{ f1 }}% and does {{ e3 }}% damage instead.

5a1386438bf55085c847d584.description: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed. Afterward, Leona's sword is charged with the power of the sun and deals bonus magic damage for a few attacks.
5a1386438bf55085c847d584.name: Solar Flare
5a1386438bf55085c847d584.tooltip:
Calls down a radiant beam of solar energy dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the flare are stunned instead of slowed.

Leona's sword remains charged with Incandescence, causing her next {{ e5 }} basic attacks to gain 100 range and deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus magic damage on hit.

5a13865c8bf55085c847d619.description: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line. Arise! also passively grants attack speed to Azir and his Sand Soldiers.
5a13865c8bf55085c847d619.name: Arise!
5a13865c8bf55085c847d619.tooltip:
Passive: Azir gains {{ e3 }}% attack speed. When Azir has {{ e6 }} or more Sand Soldiers, he gains {{ e7 }}% additional attack speed for {{ e8 }} seconds.

Active: Azir summons a Sand Soldier for {{ e1 }} seconds. When Azir attacks an enemy in a soldier's range, the soldier attacks in his stead, stabbing the target for {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Other enemies caught in the soldier's attack take {{ f7 }}% of the stab's damage.

Azir stores up to {{ maxammo }} Sand Soldiers and prepares a new one every {{ f1 }} seconds.

Sand Soldiers that strike the same targets deal {{ e9 }}% damage after the first.
Sand Soldiers can attack targets outside of Azir's basic attack range.
Sand Soldiers expire twice as fast when near an enemy turret.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4db.description:
Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Movement Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout.

Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4db.name: Burnout
5a1386418bf55085c847d4db.tooltip:
Shyvana deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage per second to nearby enemies and gains a bonus {{ e2 }}% movement speed that decays over {{ e7 }} seconds.

While Burnout is active, basic attacks deal {{ effect1amount*0.25 }} (+{{ charbonusphysical*0.25 }}) (+{{ charabilitypower2*.25 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and extend its duration by {{ e8 }} second.

Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.

Burnout has a maximum duration of {{ e9 }} seconds.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4e6.description: Gains movement speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e6.name: The Quickness
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e6.tooltip:
Gain {{ e5 }}% movement speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Touching enemies deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and charms them for {{ e3 }} second(s) the first time they're hit. The first champion charmed grants Rakan {{ e6 }}% decaying movement speed.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d455.description: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d455.name: Sanguine Pool
5a13863f8bf55085c847d455.tooltip:
Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood for 2 seconds, gaining a brief haste and becoming untargetable while slowing enemies above him by {{ e3 }}%.

Vladimir deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [{{ e4 }}% of bonus Health] magic damage over the duration and heals himself for {{ e5 }}% of that amount.

Sanguine Pool can be cast while charging Tides of Blood.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5bb.description:
Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Movement Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration.

When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5bb.name: Ambush
5a1386448bf55085c847d5bb.tooltip:
Twitch becomes Camouflaged and gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds. This bonus triples when he is nearby an enemy champion that cannot see him.

Twitch gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e6 }} seconds after exiting Ambush. Ambush resets when a champion dies while affected by Deadly Venom.

Stealth - Camouflage: Twitch is hidden from view while enemy champions remain outside his detection radius. Attacking or casting spells ends Camouflage.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d20a.description: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Movement Speed for 4 seconds.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d20a.name: Seismic Shard
5a1385df8bf55085c847d20a.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and steals {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed from the target for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d467.description: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d467.name: Unleashed Power
5a13863f8bf55085c847d467.tooltip:
Draws upon Syndra's full cataclysmic power, harnessing Dark Spheres to deal magic damage to target enemy Champion. Unleashed Power manipulates the three Dark Spheres orbiting Syndra, in addition to up to 4 Dark Spheres previously created.

Damage per sphere: {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}).
Minimum total damage: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

5a1386408bf55085c847d49e.description: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.
5a1386408bf55085c847d49e.name: Astral Infusion
5a1386408bf55085c847d49e.tooltip:
Restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health to another champion ally.

If cast while affected by Rejuvenation, Soraka will grant her target its benefits for {{ f1 }} seconds.

Cannot be cast if Soraka is below 5% Health.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5b2.description: Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b2.name: Pale Cascade
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b2.tooltip:
Creates three orbiting spheres that explode on contact with enemies dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Lasts {{ e1 }} seconds.

Grants a temporary shield that absorbs {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage. If the third sphere detonates, the shield increases by {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

5a8239d68bf550fb743b9a7d.description: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.
5a8239d68bf550fb743b9a7d.name: Spinning Slash
5a8239d68bf550fb743b9a7d.tooltip:
Tryndamere spins through his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies in his path and generating Fury.

Spinning Slash's cooldown is reduced by {{ e2 }} second whenever Tryndamere critically strikes. This reduction is increased to {{ e3 }} seconds against champions.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d44d.description: Irelia's attack balances the scales, dealing damage and slowing the target. However, if the target has a higher Health % than Irelia, then the blow stuns the target instead of slowing.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d44d.name: Equilibrium Strike
5a13863f8bf55085c847d44d.tooltip:
Irelia pierces her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing them by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} second(s).

If the target has a higher Health % than Irelia, she stuns them for the duration instead.

5a89c6168bf5504e255a002a.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.
5a89c6168bf5504e255a002a.name: Cull the Meek
5a89c6168bf5504e255a002a.tooltip:
Renekton swings his blade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) Health for each non-champion hit and {{ f2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) Health for each champion hit, up to {{ e4 }} Health.

He generates 2.5 Fury for each non-champion hit and 10 Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of 30 Fury.

50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}). Heal increased to {{ e7 }} (+{{ f4 }}) per non-champion and {{ f5 }} (+{{ f6 }}) per champion, up to {{ e9 }}. No longer generates Fury.

5a1386408bf55085c847d47d.description: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them. Nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impact.
5a1386408bf55085c847d47d.name: Cataclysm
5a1386408bf55085c847d47d.tooltip:
Heroically leaps to an enemy Champion dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and creating an arena of impassable terrain around them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Activate again to collapse the terrain.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4dd.description:
Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4dd.name: Dragon's Descent
5a1386418bf55085c847d4dd.tooltip:
Active: Shyvana transforms into a dragon, gaining {{ e0 }} Health and flying to target location. Enemies along her path take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Passive: Shyvana generates {{ e3 }} Fury every second. Basic Attacks generate {{ e2 }} Fury.

5a89c61a8bf5504e255a002d.description: Volibear lets out a powerful roar that damages, slows, and slightly knocks back enemies. Enemies who are airborne or dashing are dealt additional damage. Minions and monsters are feared as well.
5a89c61a8bf5504e255a002d.name: Majestic Roar
5a89c61a8bf5504e255a002d.tooltip:
Volibear deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back slightly and slowing them by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds. Enemies who are airborne or dashing are dealt an additional {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

Additionally, minions and monsters are feared for 3 seconds.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4ed.description: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck. If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4ed.name: Crystal Slash
5a1386418bf55085c847d4ed.tooltip:
Skarner deals {{ f1 }} physical damage to all nearby enemies. If a unit is struck, he charges himself with Crystal Energy for {{ e2 }} seconds.

While Skarner is charged, Crystal Slash deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage.

Basic attacks against non-structures lower Crystal Slash's cooldown by 0.25 seconds (quadrupled against champions).

5a1386448bf55085c847d5aa.description: Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5aa.name: Quickdraw
5a1386448bf55085c847d5aa.tooltip:
Dashes in a direction, reloading one shell. Graves gains True Grit for 4 seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead.

Basic attack hits lower the cooldown of Quickdraw by {{ e4 }} seconds. Damage against non-minions also refreshes True Grit.

True Grit grants {{ e5 }} Armor (stacks up to {{ e0 }} times).

5a1385de8bf55085c847d170.description:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d170.name: Cocoon / Rappel
5a1385de8bf55085c847d170.tooltip: Stuns the first enemy hit for {{ e5 }} seconds and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

5a1386408bf55085c847d497.description: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.
5a1386408bf55085c847d497.name: Pierce
5a1386408bf55085c847d497.tooltip:
Hurl a fast but narrow spear that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Triggers Martial Poise (P), Sentinel (W), and Rend (E).

If it kills a target, Pierce continues onward, passing all stacks of Rend to the next target.

5a1386408bf55085c847d47e.description: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.
5a1386408bf55085c847d47e.name: Howling Gale
5a1386408bf55085c847d47e.tooltip:
Summons a whirlwind, which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in its path and knocks them into the air for {{ e4 }} seconds.

The whirlwind can be charged up to {{ e6 }} seconds. For each second charged, it:
  • Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus damage
    Knocks up for an additional {{ e5 }} seconds
    Travels {{ e3 }}% further

    • Howling Gale always reaches its destination in {{ e8 }} seconds.

    Activate again to release the whirlwind early.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4f3.description: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f3.name: Scrap Shield
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f3.tooltip:
Rumble tosses up a shield for {{ e5 }} seconds that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Rumble also gains an additional {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e6 }} second.

Danger Zone Bonus: 50% increase in shield health and Movement Speed.

5a1386438bf55085c847d548.description: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.
5a1386438bf55085c847d548.name: Volcanic Rupture
5a1386438bf55085c847d548.tooltip:
Ornn slams the ground, creating a fissure which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and slows by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds. A magma pillar then forms at the fissure's end for {{ e3 }} seconds.

The fissure stops shortly after hitting an enemy champion.

5a1386448bf55085c847d58a.description: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and terrifying the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.
5a1386448bf55085c847d58a.name: Unspeakable Horror
5a1386448bf55085c847d58a.tooltip:
Passive: Nocturne gains massively increased Movement Speed toward terrified enemies.

Active: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds. If Nocturne stays within range of the target for the full duration, the target becomes terrified for {{ e2 }} second(s).

5a1386448bf55085c847d5a4.description: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5a4.name: Whirling Death
5a1386448bf55085c847d5a4.tooltip:
Draven hurls two massive axes to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to each unit struck.

Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals {{ e4 }}% less damage for each unit hit (Minimum {{ e2 }}%) and resets when the axes reverse direction.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d202.description: Blitzcrank fires his right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to him.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d202.name: Rocket Grab
5a1385df8bf55085c847d202.tooltip: Blitzcrank fires his right hand. If it encounters an enemy unit it will stun them and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage while he pulls them to himself.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1a9.description: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1a9.name: Cosmic Radiance
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1a9.tooltip: After a {{ e4 }} second delay, pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions, making them invulnerable for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a1386438bf55085c847d57a.description: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.
5a1386438bf55085c847d57a.name: Stacked Deck
5a1386438bf55085c847d57a.tooltip:
Passive: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage.

In addition, his Attack Speed is increased by {{ e3 }}%.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d466.description: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d466.name: Scatter the Weak
5a13863f8bf55085c847d466.tooltip:
Knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to them and any enemies they collide with.

Dark Spheres that are knocked back stun all enemies in their path for {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a1386428bf55085c847d518.description: Taliyah throws a volley of missiles in a target direction, moving freely as she does. This works the ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on worked ground, she only throws one missile.
5a1386428bf55085c847d518.name: Threaded Volley
5a1386428bf55085c847d518.tooltip:
Hurls 5 rocks in a direction, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a small area around the first enemy hit. Subsequent hits on the same unit deal {{ e2 }}% reduced damage. Creates Worked Ground for {{ f1 }} seconds.

Taliyah gains {{ f2 }}% movement speed on Worked Ground. Casting Threaded Volley on Worked Ground only hurls one rock but refunds {{ e7 }}% of its mana cost.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4ce.description: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4ce.name: Plasma Fission
5a1386418bf55085c847d4ce.tooltip:
Vel'Koz shoots a plasma bolt that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and applies a slow of {{ e5 }}% that decays over {{ e4 }} second(s).

Upon reactivation or upon hitting an enemy, the bolt splits at a 90 degree angle.

Killing a unit with this refunds {{ e2 }}% of the Mana Cost.

5a1386438bf55085c847d57c.description: Urgot shields himself, slowing himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.
5a1386438bf55085c847d57c.name: Purge
5a1386438bf55085c847d57c.tooltip:
For {{ e3 }} seconds, Urgot shoots at a nearby enemy {{ e8 }} times a second, dealing {{ e9 }} (+{{ f3 }}) physical damage per shot, locking onto champions recently damaged by his other abilities. He also shields himself, absorbing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) damage.

While firing, Urgot loses {{ e5 }} movement speed but has {{ e2 }}% slow resistance and can walk over minions and non-epic monsters.

Applies on-hits at 33% damage. Cannot critically strike. Minimum of {{ e0 }} damage to minions.

5a89c6a88bf5504e255a003d.description: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains movement speed for a short duration.
5a89c6a88bf5504e255a003d.name: Whiplash
5a89c6a88bf5504e255a003d.tooltip:
Whip target with Lashers, applying on hit effects and dealing magic damage equal to {{ f1 }} plus {{ e5 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of their max health. Then, gain {{ e3 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Entering Demon Shade resets Whiplash's cooldown and empowers it. When empowered, Whiplash pulls Evelynn to her target, dealing magic damage to them and enemies in the way equal to {{ f2 }} plus {{ e6 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of their max health.

5a1386428bf55085c847d504.description: Volibear erupts with chain lightning, damaging a number nearby enemies. The power of the storm causes Volibear's attacks to blast his targets with lightning that bounces to other nearby enemies.
5a1386428bf55085c847d504.name: Thunder Claws
5a1386428bf55085c847d504.tooltip:
Volibear erupts with chain lightning, striking up to {{ e4 }} nearby enemies with {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, the storm empowers Volibear, causing his basic attacks to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage that chains to {{ e4 }} nearby enemies.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0fc.description: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0fc.name: Pillar of Ice
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0fc.tooltip: Trundle creates an icy pillar at target location for {{ e1 }} seconds, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units by {{ e2 }}%.

5a2745be8bf550482ed63dd4.description: Zyra plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for Zyra. Zyra can store multiple seeds at once, and killing enemies reduces Rampant Growth's recharge time.
5a2745be8bf550482ed63dd4.name: Rampant Growth
5a2745be8bf550482ed63dd4.tooltip:
Plants a seed, lasting {{ e6 }} seconds. If an enemy Champion steps on a seed, it dies. Seeds spawned by Rampant Growth grant vision in a small area, and if stepped on they grant True Sight of the enemy champion for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Zyra stores a seed every {{ ammorechargetime }} seconds (Max: 8 seeds planted). Each time she kills an enemy, Rampant Growth's recharge time is reduced by {{ e1 }}% ({{ e2 }}% for champion takedowns, large minion kills, and large monster kills).

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1c5.description: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1c5.name: Stand United
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1c5.tooltip: Shen grants a shield to a target allied champion that lasts {{ e2 }} seconds and absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e8 }} (+{{ f2 }}) damage based on their missing health. After channeling for {{ f1 }} seconds, Shen and his spirit blade teleport to the ally's location.

5a8238d58bf550fb743b9a70.description: Jhin channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. It is able to fire 4 super shots at extreme range that pierce through minions and monsters, but stop on the first champion impacted. Whisper cripples enemies hit, which slows them and deals execute damage. The 4th shot is perfectly crafted, epically powerful, and guaranteed to critically strike.
5a8238d58bf550fb743b9a70.name: Curtain Call
5a8238d58bf550fb743b9a70.tooltip: Jhin sets up and channels, enabling him to fire 4 super shots at extreme range in a cone in front of him. The shots stop on the first champion hit, slowing it by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage, increased by {{ e5 }}% for each 1% health the target is missing (up to {{ f2 }} (+{{ f3 }})). The 4th shot crits for {{ f1 }}% damage.

5a67ec64fc675d08100b1bab.description: Moves to a unit and strikes them repeatedly for heavy damage. Can only be cast on Airborne targets.
5a67ec64fc675d08100b1bab.name: Last Breath
5a67ec64fc675d08100b1bab.tooltip:
Blinks to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and holding all Airborne enemies in the area in the air for an additional 1 second. Grants maximum Flow but resets all stacks of Gathering Storm.

For 15 seconds, Yasuo's critical strikes gain {{ e5 }}% Bonus Armor Penetration - this affects Armor from items, buffs, and runes.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4ba.description: Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing magic damage each time it bounces, up to 5 bounces. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow them.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4ba.name: Pyroclasm
5a1386408bf55085c847d4ba.tooltip:
Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each time it bounces up to 5 bounces. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions.

Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow the target by {{ e4 }}%.

5a13865b8bf55085c847d612.description: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado.
5a13865b8bf55085c847d612.name: Winds of War
5a13865b8bf55085c847d612.tooltip:
Galio fires two windblasts that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

When the windblasts meet, they combine into a giant tornado that deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ charabilitypower2.0*3 }}) plus (+{{ f9 }})% of enemies' maximum Health (max {{ e4 }} vs. monsters) as magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a3850038bf55044c7f60850.description: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at a targeted location, dealing damage and knocking up enemies at the center of impact.
5a3850038bf55044c7f60850.name: Dark Flight
5a3850038bf55044c7f60850.tooltip:
Aatrox takes flight and slams down at target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and knocking up enemies at the center of impact for {{ e4 }} second.

Aatrox fills up 20% of the Blood Well upon cast.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d462.description: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d462.name: Assassin's Path
5a13863f8bf55085c847d462.tooltip:
Talon vaults up to {{ f2 }} units over the nearest structure or terrain in the target direction. The vault's speed is affected by Talon's movement speed.

Talon cannot dash over the same section of terrain more than once every {{ f3 }} seconds.

5a1386568bf55085c847d5e1.description: Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille.
5a1386568bf55085c847d5e1.name: Tactical Sweep
5a1386568bf55085c847d5e1.tooltip:
Camille winds up and then slices in a direction, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies hit.

Enemies hit by the outer half are slowed by {{ e4 }}%, decaying over {{ e2 }} seconds. They take extra physical damage equal to {{ e5 }}% (+{{ f2 }}%) of their maximum health, and Camille heals for {{ e9 }}% of the bonus damage dealt to champions.

Tactical Sweep does {{ e8 }}% less damage to non-epic monsters.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d43c.description: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d43c.name: Crescendo
5a13863f8bf55085c847d43c.tooltip:
Active: Strikes an irresistible chord, stunning enemy Champions and forcing them to dance for {{ e2 }} seconds and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Passive: Reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities by {{ e3 }}%.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4c0.description: Miss Fortune passively gains Movement Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c0.name: Strut
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c0.tooltip:
Passive: After 5 seconds of not taking direct damage, Miss Fortune gains {{ e5 }} Movement Speed. After another 5 seconds, this bonus increases to {{ e2 }}.

Active: Fully activates Strut's Movement Speed and grants {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Love Taps reduce the cooldown of Strut by {{ f2 }} seconds.

5a89c6f18bf5504e255a0044.description: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.
5a89c6f18bf5504e255a0044.name: Searing Charge
5a89c6f18bf5504e255a0044.tooltip:
Ornn charges, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }})(+{{ f3 }}) physical damage to enemies hit.

If Ornn rams into terrain, he creates a shockwave that knocks up enemies for {{ e6 }} second and applies Searing Charge's damage to those not hit by the charge.

The shockwave destroys magma pillars and terrain created by enemy champions.

5a13864f8bf55085c847d5d9.description: Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion.
5a13864f8bf55085c847d5d9.name: Corrosive Charge
5a13864f8bf55085c847d5d9.tooltip: Urgot fires an explosive charge, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing enemies hit by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} second.

5a13865c8bf55085c847d618.description: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.
5a13865c8bf55085c847d618.name: Valor
5a13865c8bf55085c847d618.tooltip: Riven does a quick dash in the direction of your cursor and becomes shielded, blocking up to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) incoming damage for 1.5 seconds.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4e4.description: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e4.name: Gleaming Quill
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e4.tooltip:
Flings a magical feather that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy hit.

If the feather hits a champion or epic monster, Rakan restores {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health to himself and nearby allies after {{ e4 }} seconds or when he touches an ally.

5a1386438bf55085c847d545.description: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.
5a1386438bf55085c847d545.name: Electrical Surge
5a1386438bf55085c847d545.tooltip:
Passive: Every 5 attacks, Kennen deals bonus magic damage equal to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target.
