Active: Sends a surge of electricity through all nearby enemies affected by Mark of the Storm or Slicing Maelstrom, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

5a1386568bf55085c847d5df.description: Zed and his shadow both throw their spinning blades forward, dealing damage to any targets they pass through.
5a1386568bf55085c847d5df.name: Razor Shuriken
5a1386568bf55085c847d5df.tooltip:
Zed and his shadows throw their shurikens, each dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy they pass through, and {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage to each additional enemy.

Additional shurikens that hit the same enemy deal 25% less damage than previous shurikens.

5a1386428bf55085c847d50c.description: Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Veigar some ability power permanently.
5a1386428bf55085c847d50c.name: Baleful Strike
5a1386428bf55085c847d50c.tooltip:
Unleashes a bolt of dark energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first two enemies hit.

Killing a unit with this also grants Veigar a stack of Phenomenal Evil. Large minions and large monsters grant two.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4b9.description: Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing magic damage to them. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b9.name: Conflagration
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b9.tooltip:
Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d199.description: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d199.name: Petrifying Gaze
5a1385df8bf55085c847d199.tooltip: Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in front of her. Enemies facing her turn to stone and are stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds while enemies facing away are slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4cf.description: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4cf.name: Void Rift
5a1386418bf55085c847d4cf.tooltip:
Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. After a delay, it deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage.

Void Rift has a 2 second cooldown between casts.

5a1386598bf55085c847d604.description:
Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing double and True Damage if she has max Fury.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.
5a1386598bf55085c847d604.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
5a1386598bf55085c847d604.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai bites a target dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage. At max Fury, the bite does 100% more and deals True Damage.

Maximum Damage: {{ f2 }}

Burrowed: Rek'Sai tunnels forward leaving two connected Tunnel Entrances. Clicking a Tunnel Entrance will make Rek'Sai dive to the other entrance.

Tunnel Entrances last for {{ e5 }} minutes and can be destroyed by enemies. Rek'Sai may have {{ e6 }} tunnels at one time. Tunnels have a {{ e8 }} second cooldown on use.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1d3.description: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Movement Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1d3.name: Wall of Pain
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1d3.tooltip: Creates a wall that lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies that pass through the wall have their Magic Resist reduced by {{ e1 }}% and Movement Speed reduced by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds (their Movement Speed gradually recovers over the duration).

5a1386428bf55085c847d51f.description: Zac's body erupts, damaging nearby enemies.
5a1386428bf55085c847d51f.name: Unstable Matter
5a1386428bf55085c847d51f.tooltip:
Zac's body erupts, dealing {{ e1 }} magic damage +{{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of the enemy's max health as magic damage to nearby enemies.

Absorbing Goo reduces Unstable Matter's cooldown by {{ e4 }} second.

Max health damage is capped at {{ e5 }} versus minions and monsters.

5a1386598bf55085c847d5fc.description: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.
5a1386598bf55085c847d5fc.name: Piercing Light
5a1386598bf55085c847d5fc.tooltip:
Shoots a bolt of piercing light through an enemy unit, damaging enemies in a line for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}% of bonus Attack Damage) physical damage.

Piercing Light's cast time decreases slightly as Lucian gains levels.

5a1386428bf55085c847d515.description: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Additionally, he gains increased Attack Speed for a short time, but this bonus is extended by having any of his other spells active.
5a1386428bf55085c847d515.name: Frenzying Taunt
5a1386428bf55085c847d515.tooltip:
Taunt an enemy champion or monster for {{ e1 }} seconds and gain {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for the same duration.

While any of Rammus' other spells are active, Frenzying Taunt's Attack Speed bonus is refreshed.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4e7.description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e7.name: Noxious Blast
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e7.tooltip:
Blasts enemies in an area with Noxious Poison. If a champion is hit, Cassiopeia gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed decaying over {{ e4 }} seconds.

Noxious Poison deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a13865b8bf55085c847d613.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.
5a13865b8bf55085c847d613.name: Hail of Arrows
5a13865b8bf55085c847d613.tooltip:
Varus fires a hail of arrows that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and desecrates the ground for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Desecrated Ground slows enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and reduces healing effects by {{ e4 }}%.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d2ab.description: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d2ab.name: Remove Scurvy
5a1385df8bf55085c847d2ab.tooltip: Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit, curing all disabling effects and healing him for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) + {{ e2 }}% of his missing Health.

5a2745f18bf550482ed63ddd.description: Leona raises her shield to gain Armor and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.
5a2745f18bf550482ed63ddd.name: Eclipse
5a2745f18bf550482ed63ddd.tooltip: Grants {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) bonus Armor and {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) Magic Resist for {{ e3 }} seconds. When the effect ends, nearby enemies struck take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and Leona retains her bonus Armor and Magic Resist for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a1386438bf55085c847d556.description: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal.
5a1386438bf55085c847d556.name: Magical Journey
5a1386438bf55085c847d556.tooltip:
Bard opens a one-way corridor through nearby terrain. Both allies and enemies can use the corridor by right-clicking on any part of it while near its entrance, with allies travelling {{ e2 }}% faster than enemies.

The corridor disappears after {{ e1 }} seconds.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d468.description: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d468.name: Chomp
5a13863f8bf55085c847d468.tooltip:
Trundle lunges at his opponent with his next basic attack, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and briefly slowing his target.

This attack increases Trundle's Attack Damage by {{ e3 }} for {{ e6 }} seconds, with his opponent losing half of this amount.

5a1386428bf55085c847d512.description: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.
5a1386428bf55085c847d512.name: Defile
5a1386428bf55085c847d512.tooltip:
Toggle Off: When Karthus kills a unit, he restores {{ e2 }} Mana.

Toggle On: Drains {{ cost }} Mana to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies each second.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0c7.description: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0c7.name: Zap!
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0c7.tooltip: Jinx fires a shock blast that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit, revealing it and slowing it by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d46a.description: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d46a.name: Spirit Fire
5a13863f8bf55085c847d46a.tooltip:
Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at target location, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, enemies in the area have their Armor reduced by {{ e2 }}% and are dealt an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d16e.description:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d16e.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
5a1385de8bf55085c847d16e.tooltip: Deals magic damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus {{ e6 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of the target's current health. Maximum bonus against monsters: {{ e2 }}.

5a1386568bf55085c847d5dd.description: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.
5a1386568bf55085c847d5dd.name: Vault Breaker
5a1386568bf55085c847d5dd.tooltip:
Charges a powerful punch that carries Vi forward.

First Cast: Slows Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% while increasing damage and dash range over 1.25 seconds.

Second Cast: Dashes forward dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ f2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying Denting Blows to all enemies hit (deals {{ e3 }}% damage to minions and monsters). Stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, knocking it back.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d25b.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curses</font> refreshed.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d25b.name: Despair
5a1385df8bf55085c847d25b.tooltip: Toggle: Amumu cries, refreshing Curses on nearby enemies and dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }} plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their maximum health each second.

5a1386408bf55085c847d48a.description: Heimerdinger lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.
5a1386408bf55085c847d48a.name: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade
5a1386408bf55085c847d48a.tooltip:
Hurls a grenade that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to enemies and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the blast are also stunned for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Hitting a champion fully charges nearby turret beams.

5a89c7188bf5504e255a0045.description: Zoe fires a missile that she can redirect in flight. Deals more damage the longer it flies in a straight line.
5a89c7188bf5504e255a0045.name: Paddle Star!
5a89c7188bf5504e255a0045.tooltip:
Fire a missile that deals increasing damage the further it travels -- {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ f2 }} (+{{ f1*2.5 }}) magic damage.


Recast to redirect the missile to a new position near Zoe.

Paddle Star applies More Sparkles to the first enemy hit, dealing an additional {{ f3 }} (+{{ f4 }}) to {{ f3*2.5 }} (+{{ f4*2.5 }}) magic damage.

5a67ed19fc675d08100b1baf.description: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, and triple the bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter.
5a67ed19fc675d08100b1baf.name: Final Hour
5a67ed19fc675d08100b1baf.tooltip:
Vayne gains {{ e1 }} bonus attack damage and improvements to Night Hunter and Tumble for {{ e2 }} seconds. The duration of Final Hour is extended by {{ e5 }} seconds whenever a champion damaged by Vayne dies within {{ e6 }} seconds.

Night Hunter: Vayne instead gains {{ e4 }} movement speed.
Tumble: Vayne will also gain Invisibility for {{ e3 }} second when she Tumbles.

Stealth - Invisible: Vayne can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.
Final Hour's duration can't be increased beyond its original maximum duration.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d126.description: LeBlanc projects an orb towards her target, dealing magic damage. When Shatter Orb is empowered by Sigil of Malice, the spell bounces to the nearest ready Sigil of Malice (bounces deal reduced damage to minions).
5a1385de8bf55085c847d126.name: Shatter Orb
5a1385de8bf55085c847d126.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. When Shatter Orb is empowered by Sigil of Malice, the spell bounces to the nearest ready Sigil of Malice (bounces deal {{ e7 }}% damage to minions).

5a1386598bf55085c847d601.description: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and slowing their Movement Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.
5a1386598bf55085c847d601.name: Undertow
5a1386598bf55085c847d601.tooltip:
Olaf throws an axe to target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to units it passes through and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for up to {{ e3 }} seconds. The further the Axe flies, the longer the slow lasts, but it is never less than {{ e4 }} seconds.

If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d178.description: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d178.name: Shocking Orb
5a1385de8bf55085c847d178.tooltip: Xerath fires an orb of raw magic. The first enemy hit takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and is stunned for between {{ e8 }} and {{ e2 }} seconds. The stun duration lengthens based on how far the orb travels.

5a8239c28bf550fb743b9a7a.description: Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits.
5a8239c28bf550fb743b9a7a.name: Nevermove
5a8239c28bf550fb743b9a7a.tooltip:
Swain launches a wave of demonic power, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to enemies it passes through.

Swain then commands the wave to return, detonating it on the first enemy hit. Enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are rooted for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a1386438bf55085c847d580.description: Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.
5a1386438bf55085c847d580.name: Noxious Trap
5a1386438bf55085c847d580.tooltip:
Tosses a stored mushroom as a trap that detonates if an enemy steps on it, spreading poison to nearby enemies that slows Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%, reveals them and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e9 }} seconds.

Traps last {{ e5 }} minutes and take {{ e4 }} second to arm and stealth. If a thrown trap lands on another trap, it will bounce up to {{ e6 }} Teemos further before planting.

Teemo forages for a mushroom every {{ f1 }} seconds, but he is only big enough to carry 3 at once.

5a1386438bf55085c847d575.description:
The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain. Garen's attacks deal additional true damage to that champion.

Garen can call upon the might of Demacia to deal a finishing blow to an enemy champion that deals damage based upon how much health his target has missing. This damage is true damage against the Villain.
5a1386438bf55085c847d575.name: Demacian Justice
5a1386438bf55085c847d575.tooltip:
Passive: The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain. Judgment and basic attacks against it deal an additional {{ e3 }}% of its maximum health as true damage.

Active: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion, dealing magic damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus {{ e2 }}% of the target's missing health. Deals true damage to the Villain.

5a89c71a8bf5504e255a0046.description: Causes the target to become drowsy, then fall asleep. The first source of damage that breaks the sleep is doubled, up to a cap.
5a89c71a8bf5504e255a0046.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
5a89c71a8bf5504e255a0046.tooltip:
Dropkick a bubble that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, lingering as a trap if it hits nothing. The bubble's range is extended when flying over a wall.

After a delay, the victim falls asleep for 2 seconds. Attacks and spell hits break sleep but deal double damage, up to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus true damage.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4b0.description: Akali spins her kama at a target enemy to deal Magic Damage and mark the target for 6 seconds. Akali's melee attacks against a marked target will trigger and consume the mark to cause additional damage and restore Energy.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b0.name: Mark of the Assassin
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b0.tooltip:
Akali throws her kama at a target enemy to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and mark the target for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Akali's melee attacks against a marked target will consume the mark to deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and restore {{ e3 }} energy.

5a1386578bf55085c847d5e3.description: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e3.name: Rampage
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e3.tooltip:
Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. ({{ e5 }}% damage to minions)

If Hecarim damages at least one enemy with this attack he gains a stack of Rampage, reducing the base cooldown of this skill by {{ e3 }} second for a short duration. This effect can stack up to {{ e2 }} times.

5a1386428bf55085c847d50e.description: Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.
5a1386428bf55085c847d50e.name: Primordial Burst
5a1386428bf55085c847d50e.tooltip:
Blasts the target with primal magic to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.

Damage is maximized against enemies below 33% health.

5a5cb555fc675d0d88f83078.description: Passive: Grants Kayle on Hit magic Damage.  Activate: Ignite Kayle's sword with a holy flame, granting Kayle a ranged attack that damages multiple enemies and deals bonus magic damage.
5a5cb555fc675d0d88f83078.name: Righteous Fury
5a5cb555fc675d0d88f83078.tooltip:
Passive: Kayle's Basic Attacks deal an additional {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage on hit.

Active: Kayle increases her Attack Range by 400 for 10 seconds and the passive bonus is increased to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and apply spell effects on hit.

In addition, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applies spell effects on attack to enemies near her target.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d433.description: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for 5 seconds, and mimicking his spell casts. Zed can reactivate to swap places with the shadow.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d433.name: Living Shadow
5a13863f8bf55085c847d433.tooltip:
Passive: Whenever Zed and his shadows strike an enemy with the same ability, Zed gains {{ e3 }} energy. Energy can only be gained once per cast ability.

Active: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for {{ e5 }} seconds. Reactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.

5a82395d8bf550fb743b9a75.description: Nunu invigorates himself and an allied unit by heating their blood, increasing their Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and Ability Power.
5a82395d8bf550fb743b9a75.name: Blood Boil
5a82395d8bf550fb743b9a75.tooltip:
The heat of Nunu and a target ally's blood rises, increasing Ability Power by {{ e4 }}% (max: {{ e5 }}), Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%, and Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

If Nunu targets himself, Blood Boil will try to target the nearest Ally champion.

5a1386438bf55085c847d568.description: Fiora reveals all four Vitals on an enemy champion and gains movement speed while near them. If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed over the next few seconds.
5a1386438bf55085c847d568.name: Grand Challenge
5a1386438bf55085c847d568.tooltip:
Fiora reveals all four Vitals on target champion, for a potential {{ f8 }}% max health true damage. In addition, Fiora gains Duelist's Dance's movement speed bonus ({{ f6 }}%) while near the target.

If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals in {{ e1 }} seconds or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed for {{ e7 }} (+{{ f9 }}) each second for between {{ e9 }} to {{ e6 }} seconds, scaling with the amount of Vitals hit.

5a1386428bf55085c847d528.description: Nunu begins to sap the area of heat, slowing all nearby enemies. When Absolute Zero ends, he deals massive damage to all enemies caught in the area.
5a1386428bf55085c847d528.name: Absolute Zero
5a1386428bf55085c847d528.tooltip:
Nunu channels for {{ e4 }} seconds, sapping the area of heat. Nearby enemies have their Movement Speed slowed by {{ e2 }}% and their Attack Speed slowed by {{ e3 }}%. The Movement Speed slow increases to {{ e6 }}% over the duration of the channel.

Enemies caught in the area when the channel ends take up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, depending on how long Absolute Zero was channeled.
(Minimum Damage: {{ f2 }})

5a1385df8bf55085c847d23e.description: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d23e.name: Light Binding
5a1385df8bf55085c847d23e.tooltip: Fires a ball of light, rooting up to two enemies for {{ e3 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each.

5a5d91bdfc675d0d1c55dced.description: Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that damages an enemy and debuffs them. Ryze's spells have additional effects against the debuffed enemy.
5a5d91bdfc675d0d1c55dced.name: Spell Flux
5a5d91bdfc675d0d1c55dced.tooltip:
Apply Flux to an enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage. Spells consume Flux for bonus effects:

Overload: Deals {{ e2 }}% more damage and spreads to nearby enemies with Flux.
Rune Prison: Root duration is increased to {{ e6 }} seconds.
Spell Flux: Spreads Spell Flux to nearby enemies.

Spells that kill enemies affected by Flux spread Spell Flux to nearby enemies.

5a1386438bf55085c847d546.description: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units. Each enemy unit he touches takes damage and receives a Mark of the Storm.
5a1386438bf55085c847d546.name: Lightning Rush
5a1386438bf55085c847d546.tooltip:
Kennen doubles his base movement speed and ignores unit collision for 2 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to any enemy he passes through. Additionally, Kennen will gain {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.

Kennen gains 40 Energy the first time he passes through an enemy.
Lightning Rush deals half damage to minions.

5a1386428bf55085c847d52a.description: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.
5a1386428bf55085c847d52a.name: Nether Blade
5a1386428bf55085c847d52a.tooltip:
Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks draw energy from the void, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage.

Active: Kassadin charges his Nether Blade, causing his next basic attack to deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus magic damage and restore {{ e1 }}% of his missing Mana (increases to {{ e4 }}% against champions).

5a1386408bf55085c847d4ab.description: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4ab.name: Living Artillery
5a1386408bf55085c847d4ab.tooltip:
Fires an artillery shot, damaging enemies above 40% health for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ effect1amount*1.5 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage based on their missing health.

If enemies are below 40% health, they take {{ f4 }} (+{{ f6 }}) (+{{ f5 }}) magic damage instead.

Each subsequent shot within {{ e4 }} seconds costs {{ e3 }} more Mana (max {{ e5 }}).

5a1386588bf55085c847d5f2.description: Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing their movement speed. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target. The thrown Shiv deals bonus damage based on the target's missing Health.
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f2.name: Two-Shiv Poison
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f2.tooltip:
Passive: While Two-Shiv Poison is ready to cast, Shaco's basic attacks reduce the target's movement speed by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Active: Shaco throws a shiv that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and reduces the target's movement speed by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds. The shiv's damage is increased by up to {{ e3 }}% based on the target's missing health.

5a1386438bf55085c847d562.description: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.
5a1386438bf55085c847d562.name: Lucent Singularity
5a1386438bf55085c847d562.tooltip:
Creates a zone that slows enemies by {{ e1 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds the zone detonates dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Activate again to detonate early.

5a1386448bf55085c847d59e.description: Ekko splits the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and triggers a detonation, stunning enemies by suspending them in time.
5a1386448bf55085c847d59e.name: Parallel Convergence
5a1386448bf55085c847d59e.tooltip:
Passive: Ekko's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage to enemies under 30% health equal to {{ e3 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of their missing health. Deals a minimum of {{ e6 }} damage, and a maximum of {{ e5 }} damage vs. minions and monsters.

Active: After a 3 second delay, Ekko creates a short-lived chronosphere at the target location that slows enemies who enter by {{ e0 }}%. If Ekko enters the sphere, he will detonate it, gaining a shield that absorbs up to {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 2 seconds. Enemies caught inside are stunned for {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d451.description: Aurelion Sol pushes his stars farther out, magnifying their damage.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d451.name: Celestial Expansion
5a13863f8bf55085c847d451.tooltip:
Passive: Increases Star base damage by {{ e2 }}.

Toggle: Aurelion Sol's Stars orbit at his Outer Limit and deal {{ e1 }}% damage, for a total of {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage.

5a1386588bf55085c847d5f8.description: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f8.name: Double Daggers
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f8.tooltip: Xayah throws two knives dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage and leaving two Feathers. Targets hit after the first take {{ e2 }}% damage.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d42d.description: Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes up to 3 times.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d42d.name: Hate Spike
5a13863f8bf55085c847d42d.tooltip:
Evelynn's Lasher strikes in the target direction, dealing {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to the first unit hit and causing Evelynn's next 3 spells or attacks on that unit deal {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage. Then, Evelynn can recast this ability up to 3 times.

Recast: Fires spikes through the nearest enemy, dealing {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to all units hit.

Refunds {{ e1 }}% of Hate Spike's cooldown if the Lasher hits a monster. Hate Spike prioritizes the target Evelynn is attacking.

5a1386588bf55085c847d5ef.description: Kayn dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage.
5a1386588bf55085c847d5ef.name: Reaping Slash
5a1386588bf55085c847d5ef.tooltip:
Kayn dashes forward to strike nearby enemies. Both dash and strike deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.
Darkin: Deal a percentage of the target's maximum health instead.

Deals {{ e6 }} bonus physical damage to monsters.

5a89c6928bf5504e255a0038.description: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward, slowing affected enemies.
5a89c6928bf5504e255a0038.name: Wind Becomes Lightning
5a89c6928bf5504e255a0038.tooltip:
Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward.

Slash: {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage.
Thrust: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and slows by {{ e6 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Cast time is reduced with Attack Speed provided from items and levels (minimum of 0.4 seconds). Current cast time: {{ f5 }}

Deals 50% less damage to minions.
Lifesteal is 33% effective on both attacks.
Extends the current duration of Xin Zhao's other abilities by {{ f5 }} seconds.

5a1386428bf55085c847d539.description:
Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken.

Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.
5a1386428bf55085c847d539.name: Battle Roar
5a1386428bf55085c847d539.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and heals Rengar for {{ e2 }}% of the damage he took in the last {{ e3 }} seconds.

Ferocity effect:
Deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and removes existing crowd control effects, in addition to its normal effect.

Damage healed from monster attacks is increased by {{ e5 }}%.

5a1386428bf55085c847d542.description: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
5a1386428bf55085c847d542.name: The Box
5a1386428bf55085c847d542.tooltip:
Thresh creates a prison of spectral walls around himself. Enemy champions who walk through a wall suffer {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds, but break that wall.

Once one wall is broken, the remaining walls deal no damage and apply half slow duration. An enemy cannot be affected by multiple walls simultaneously.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d11e.description: Ivern conjures a vine, dealing damage and rooting enemy targets hit. Ivern's allies can dash to the rooted target.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d11e.name: Rootcaller
5a1385de8bf55085c847d11e.tooltip: Ivern conjures a vine dealing {{ e5 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage and rooting the first enemy hit for {{ e1 }} second(s). Allies can click on rooted enemies to dash into attack range.

5a1386438bf55085c847d56b.description: Fiddlesticks saps the life force of an enemy, dealing damage to a target over time and healing himself.
5a1386438bf55085c847d56b.name: Drain
5a1386438bf55085c847d56b.tooltip:
Fiddlesticks creates a tether to the target unit and channels Drain on it, granting True Sight and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to the target. Fiddlesticks heals for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt.

Drain lasts up to {{ e4 }} seconds, dealing a total of {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) damage.

Drain returns cooldown equal to its remaining duration if the target dies.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d26f.description: Creates a moving wall that blocks enemy projectiles.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d26f.name: Wind Wall
5a1385df8bf55085c847d26f.tooltip: Creates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles for 4 seconds.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5a5.description: Orianna commands her Ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her Ball remains at the target location after.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5a5.name: Command: Attack
5a1386448bf55085c847d5a5.tooltip:
Orianna commands her Ball to shoot toward a target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to targets along the way. However, it deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each unit it hits (Minimum {{ e3 }}%).

Her Ball remains behind at the target location afterwards.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0ab.description: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0ab.name: Incinerate
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0ab.tooltip: Casts a cone of fire dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area.

5a8239f88bf550fb743b9a80.description: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.
5a8239f88bf550fb743b9a80.name: Arctic Assault
5a8239f88bf550fb743b9a80.tooltip: Sejuani charges, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies and knocking them up. The charge ends after hitting an enemy champion.

5a1386428bf55085c847d51a.description: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.
5a1386428bf55085c847d51a.name: Unraveled Earth
5a1386428bf55085c847d51a.tooltip:
Places a field of dash-sensitive traps that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow enemies in the area by {{ f2 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds, the traps explode, dealing damage again.

Enemies dashing, being pushed, or being pulled through Unraveled Earth will trigger traps, taking {{ f3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage from each trap (maximum 4, each hit after the first deals {{ f4 }}% less damage).

5a1386408bf55085c847d4bf.description: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4bf.name: Double Up
5a1386408bf55085c847d4bf.tooltip:
Miss Fortune fires a bouncing shot through an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to each target hit. Both apply on-hit effects.

The second shot can critically strike for {{ f1 }}% damage, and it always critically strikes if the first shot kills its target.

5a1386428bf55085c847d511.description: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
5a1386428bf55085c847d511.name: Lay Waste
5a1386428bf55085c847d511.tooltip:
Creates a delayed blast at Karthus' cursor position dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each nearby enemy.

If the blast hits only a single unit it deals double damage.

5a1386428bf55085c847d509.description:
Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again.

Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.
5a1386428bf55085c847d509.name: Focused Resolve
5a1386428bf55085c847d509.tooltip:
Links Karma to an enemy champion or monster, granting True Sight and dealing {{ effect1amount*0.5 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage. If the link is unbroken for {{ e3 }} seconds, the target is rooted for {{ e2 }} second(s) and takes an additional {{ effect1amount*0.5 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage.

Mantra Bonus - Renewal: Karma is healed for {{ f1 }}% (+{{ f3 }}%) of her missing health. If the link is not broken or the target dies, the root duration is increased by {{ f2 }} second(s) and Karma is healed for {{ f1 }}% (+{{ f3 }}%) of her missing health.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4cc.description: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4cc.name: Arcanopulse
5a1386418bf55085c847d4cc.tooltip:
First cast: Xerath charges Arcanopulse, gradually decreasing his Movement Speed while increasing the spell's range.

Second cast: Xerath fires Arcanopulse, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line.

While charging Arcanopulse, Xerath cannot attack or cast other spells. If Xerath does not fire the spell, half the Mana cost is refunded.

5a1386648bf55085c847d627.description: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.
5a1386648bf55085c847d627.name: Flame Chompers!
5a1386648bf55085c847d627.tooltip: Jinx tosses out 3 chompers that, once armed, explode on contact with enemy champions, rooting the target for 1.5 seconds and stopping in-progress movement abilities on the spot before dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage over 1.5 seconds to nearby enemies. Chompers last for 5 seconds.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d119.description: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d119.name: Monsoon
5a1385de8bf55085c847d119.tooltip: Summons forth the might of the wind to knock surrounding enemies back and restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health to nearby allies each second for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a2745bf8bf550482ed63dd6.description: Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts.
5a2745bf8bf550482ed63dd6.name: Stranglethorns
5a2745bf8bf550482ed63dd6.tooltip:
Summons the fury of nature, growing a twisted thicket at target location which deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area as it expands. After 2 seconds, the vines snap upward knocking enemies into the air for {{ e1 }} second.

Garden of Thorns: Plants within the thicket are enraged, resetting their duration, gaining {{ e2 }}% Health and attacking in a flurry for 200% total damage.

5a2746178bf550482ed63de0.description: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.
5a2746178bf550482ed63de0.name: Broken Wings
5a2746178bf550482ed63de0.tooltip:
Riven strikes out in front of her in a short line. This ability may be re-cast {{ e4 }} additional times.

1st and 2nd Use: Slashes forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all units she comes in contact with.
3rd Use: Leaps forward and slams the ground dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and knocking nearby enemies up. This leap can cross unpathable terrain.

Riven will target the unit your cursor is hovering over, or if no targets are present, Riven will simply strike the direction she is currently facing.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d45b.description: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d45b.name: Onslaught of Shadows
5a13863f8bf55085c847d45b.tooltip:
Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies hit.

Hecarim releases a shockwave at the end of his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee from him for {{ e2 }} to {{ e3 }} seconds (increases by charge distance).

Hecarim himself will only move to the targeted location. The riders will always move the full distance.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d2a9.description: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d2a9.name: Collateral Damage
5a1385df8bf55085c847d2a9.tooltip: Fires an explosive shell with such force that it knocks Graves back. The shell deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy hit. After hitting an enemy Champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage in a cone.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4a0.description: Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4a0.name: Deceive
5a1386408bf55085c847d4a0.tooltip:
Shaco teleports nearby and becomes Invisible for {{ e3 }} seconds. Shaco remains Invisible even if he uses Jack in the Box or Hallucinate.

His next basic attack during or shortly after Invisibility will reduce Deceive's cooldown by {{ f3 }} seconds.

Stealth - Invisible: Shaco can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d290.description: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and slowing them briefly.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d290.name: Audacious Charge
5a1385df8bf55085c847d290.tooltip: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy. The charge deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for 0.5 seconds. Charging grants Xin Zhao {{ e3 }}% attack speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

5a1386598bf55085c847d5fd.description: Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.
5a1386598bf55085c847d5fd.name: Hammer Shock
5a1386598bf55085c847d5fd.tooltip:
Poppy smashes the ground, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e5 }}% of the enemies' maximum Health as physical damage, and leaving an unstable area.

The area slows enemies inside it by {{ e3 }}% and erupts after {{ e4 }} second, dealing the initial damage again.

5a5d91bbfc675d0d1c55dcec.description: Ryze traps a target enemy unit in a cage of runes, damaging them and preventing them from moving.
5a5d91bbfc675d0d1c55dcec.name: Rune Prison
5a5d91bbfc675d0d1c55dcec.tooltip: Instantly root an enemy for {{ e1 }} second and deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage.

5a89c6e58bf5504e255a0042.description:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.
5a89c6e58bf5504e255a0042.name: Twin Bite
5a89c6e58bf5504e255a0042.tooltip:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack, dealing {{ f2 }} and {{ f1 }} physical damage on the first and second hits respectively.

While Twin Bite is on cooldown, basic attacks reduce the remaining cooldown duration by {{ e3 }} seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.

Twin Bite's second hit damage is equal to {{ e1 }}% of Shyvana's attack damage.

5a1386408bf55085c847d470.description: Quinn calls Valor to mark an enemy and hinder its vision before damaging all enemies in the immediate area.
5a1386408bf55085c847d470.name: Blinding Assault
5a1386408bf55085c847d470.tooltip:
Valor flies in a line, marking the first enemy he hits as Vulnerable and reducing its vision radius dramatically for {{ e3 }} seconds. He then deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies.

If the primary target is not a champion, it cannot attack for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4e3.description: Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e3.name: Keeper's Verdict
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e3.tooltip:
First Cast: Poppy channels for up to {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing herself by {{ e7 }}%.

Second Cast: Poppy smashes the ground, emanating a shockwave that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies around the first champion hit and knocking them a large distance toward their Summoning Platform. The shockwave length and knockback distance increases with channel duration.

Enemies hit with an uncharged Keeper's Verdict will take half the damage and be knocked straight into the air for half the duration. Enemies are untargetable while they are being knocked away.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d19f.description: Skarner gains a shield and has increased Movement Speed while the shield persists.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d19f.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
5a1385df8bf55085c847d19f.tooltip: Skarner is shielded for {{ f1 }} ({{ e1 }}% of his maximum health) (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds. While the shield persists, Skarner gains movement speed that ramps up to {{ e5 }}% over 3 seconds.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4f4.description: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f4.name: Electro Harpoon
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f4.tooltip:
Rumble shoots his opponent with up to 2 tasers, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applying a stacking slow of {{ e2 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Danger Zone Bonus: Damage and slow percentage increased by 50%.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d450.description: Aurelion Sol creates an expanding disk, which explodes to stun and damage enemies when it moves too far away from him.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d450.name: Starsurge
5a13863f8bf55085c847d450.tooltip:
First Press: Aurelion Sol creates a new stellar core, which grows over time and grants him {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed.

The core will detonate when it reaches his Outer Limit, applying {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and a {{ e4 }} second stun.

Second Press: Detonate the core early.

5a1386428bf55085c847d519.description: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within in a direction of her choosing.
5a1386428bf55085c847d519.name: Seismic Shove
5a1386428bf55085c847d519.tooltip:
Taliyah targets an area. After a short delay, enemies caught within the area will be pushed and dealt {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

You can control the direction enemies will be pushed by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.

5a1386578bf55085c847d5ea.description: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5ea.name: Rake
5a1386578bf55085c847d5ea.tooltip:
Talon tosses a volley of blades, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to units hit and returning to him after a delay.

On their way back to Talon, the blades deal {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional damage and slow the enemy by {{ e2 }}% for 1 second.

5a1386428bf55085c847d541.description: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
5a1386428bf55085c847d541.name: Flay
5a1386428bf55085c847d541.tooltip:
Passive: Thresh's basic attacks deal from {{ f3 }} to {{ f3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) additional magic damage, which builds up while not attacking (total souls collected plus up to {{ e3 }}% total Attack Damage).

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a line beginning behind Thresh. Enemies hit are pushed in the direction of the swing, then slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} second.

Cast forward to push; cast backward to pull.

5a1386408bf55085c847d489.description: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.
5a1386408bf55085c847d489.name: Hextech Micro-Rockets
5a1386408bf55085c847d489.tooltip:
Unleashes a barrage of 5 rockets that converge towards the cursor and fan out past it. Rockets deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. Additional rocket hits deal reduced damage:

Champions and Monsters: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage, max {{ e6 }} (+{{ f2 }}) total damage
Minions: 60% of base damage

Rocket hits against champions charge nearby turret beam attacks.

5a1386578bf55085c847d5ee.description: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5ee.name: Condemn
5a1386578bf55085c847d5ee.tooltip:
Fires a bolt that knocks back a target and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

If the target collides with terrain, the damage is increased to {{ f1 }} and the target is stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Condemn's damage is increased by {{ e2 }}% if the target collides with terrain.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d44b.description: Irelia dashes forward to strike her target. If it kills the target, Bladesurge's cooldown refreshes and refunds a portion of the Mana Cost.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d44b.name: Bladesurge
5a13863f8bf55085c847d44b.tooltip:
Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying on-hit effects.

If it kills the target, Bladesurge's cooldown is refreshed and Irelia gains {{ e2 }} Mana.

5a13864d8bf55085c847d5d5.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.
5a13864d8bf55085c847d5d5.name: Defensive Ball Curl
5a13864d8bf55085c847d5d5.tooltip:
Rammus enters a defensive formation for up to {{ e3 }} seconds, increasing Armor by {{ e1 }} plus {{ e6 }}% ({{ f1 }}) and Magic Resist by {{ e8 }} plus {{ e7 }}% ({{ f2 }}) but becoming slowed by {{ e5 }}%.

During this time, Spiked Shell deals {{ e4 }}% damage and also deals its damage to enemies that basic attack Rammus.

Can be reactivated to end the effect early and put Defensive Ball Curl on cooldown.
Casting Defensive Ball Curl cancels Powerball and puts it on cooldown.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d26c.description: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d26c.name: Toxic Shot
5a1385df8bf55085c847d26c.tooltip: Teemo's basic attacks poison their target, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magical damage upon impact and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magical damage each second for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a1386408bf55085c847d482.description: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's maximum Health as bonus true damage. (Max: 200 damage vs. Monsters)
5a1386408bf55085c847d482.name: Silver Bolts
5a1386408bf55085c847d482.tooltip:
Every third consecutive attack or ability against an enemy deals an additional {{ e1 }}% of the enemy's maximum health as true damage (no less than {{ e2 }}).

Silver Bolts deals no more than {{ e3 }} damage against monsters.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d298.description: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d298.name: Phase Dive
5a1385df8bf55085c847d298.tooltip: Ekko dashes a short distance in the targeted direction. His next attack will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and teleport him to his target.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d457.description: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. After a few seconds, Hemoplague deals magic damage to infected enemies and heals Vladimir for each enemy Champion hit.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d457.name: Hemoplague
5a13863f8bf55085c847d457.tooltip:
Vladimir infects enemies in a target area with a virulent plague, causing them to take {{ e2 }}% increased damage from all sources for {{ e4 }} seconds.

After {{ e4 }} seconds, Vladimir deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all infected targets. If Hemoplague damages an enemy Champion, Vladimir heals himself for {{ f4 }} (+{{ f3 }}), plus {{ e5 }}% for each Champion beyond the first.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d177.description: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d177.name: Eye of Destruction
5a1385de8bf55085c847d177.tooltip: Xerath calls down a blast of arcane energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies within the target area, slowing them by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the blast take {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}%. This slow decays rapidly.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d282.description: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d282.name: Boomerang Blade
5a1385df8bf55085c847d282.tooltip: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first target hit and {{ e2 }}% reduced damage to each subsequent target down to a minimum of {{ e3 }}%.

5a1386408bf55085c847d48c.description: LeBlanc rapidly dashes to a target location, dealing magic damage to nearby units. In the following 4 seconds, she can activate Distortion again to return to her starting location.
5a1386408bf55085c847d48c.name: Distortion
5a1386408bf55085c847d48c.tooltip:
Dashes to target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the target area.

For the next 4 seconds, she can activate Distortion again to return to her starting location.

5a1386428bf55085c847d522.description: Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit. This ability gains a stun after three stacks of An Acquired Taste.
5a1386428bf55085c847d522.name: Tongue Lash
5a1386428bf55085c847d522.tooltip:
Damage the first enemy hit for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }}s. Champions with 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste will additionally be stunned for {{ e6 }}s.

Activate Devour while your tongue is in midair to devour monsters/minions from a distance.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5c1.description: Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, damaging all nearby enemy champions around him and gaining increased Attack Speed and bonus Attack Range for a short duration.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5c1.name: Massacre
5a1386448bf55085c847d5c1.tooltip:
Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemy champions, filling up 20% of the Blood Well for each hit.

Aatrox gains {{ e3 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e5 }} attack range for {{ e8 }} seconds upon cast.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d2a5.description: Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave, dealing magic damage and launching nearby enemies towards the Ball after a short delay.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d2a5.name: Command: Shockwave
5a1385df8bf55085c847d2a5.tooltip: Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave after a brief delay, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and flinging them into the air a set distance in the direction of the Ball.

5a5d90d2fc675d0d1c55dceb.description: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke that reduces sight range. Enemies caught in the initial impact are dealt magic damage and have their movement speed reduced briefly.
5a5d90d2fc675d0d1c55dceb.name: Smoke Screen
5a5d90d2fc675d0d1c55dceb.tooltip:
Creates a cloud of Black Smoke lasting 4 seconds. Enemies inside Black Smoke cannot see out.

Enemies caught in the initial impact are dealt {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and have their movement speed reduced by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d149.description: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d149.name: Undying Rage
5a1385de8bf55085c847d149.tooltip: Tryndamere becomes completely immune to death for {{ e3 }} seconds, refusing to be reduced below {{ e2 }} Health and instantly gaining {{ e1 }} Fury.

5a1386438bf55085c847d55e.description: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.
5a1386438bf55085c847d55e.name: Chain of Corruption
5a1386438bf55085c847d55e.tooltip:
Varus flings out a tendril of corruption that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and immobilizes the first enemy champion hit for {{ e2 }} seconds.

The corruption then spreads towards nearby uninfected enemy champions. If it reaches them, they take the same damage and are also immobilized. Immobilized units gain {{ e4 }} Blight stacks over the duration.

5a8239e68bf550fb743b9a7f.description:
Viktor conjures a singularity on the field which deals magic damage and interrupts enemy channels. The singularity then periodically does magic damage to all nearby enemies. Viktor can redirect the singularity.

Augment: The Chaos Storm moves faster.
5a8239e68bf550fb743b9a7f.name: Chaos Storm
5a8239e68bf550fb743b9a7f.tooltip:
Viktor conjures a singularity at target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and interrupting enemy channels.

Viktor can redirect the singularity for {{ e3 }} seconds, which will discharge {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage every {{ e4 }} seconds to nearby enemies. The singularity will move slower as it attempts to move farther away from Viktor.

Augment - Velocity: Chaos Storm moves {{ e0 }}% faster.

5a1386428bf55085c847d523.description: Tahm Kench devours a target, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. He can spit devoured minions and monsters out as a skillshot that deals magic damage in an area upon impact.
5a1386428bf55085c847d523.name: Devour
5a1386428bf55085c847d523.tooltip:
Devour a target for {{ e1 }}s (half that for enemy champions.) Enemies are dealt {{ e3 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of their maximum health as magic damage (maximum of {{ e2 }} against neutral monsters).

Enemy Champions: Requires 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste to be devoured. While holding an enemy champion, Tahm Kench is slowed by 95%.

Allied Champions: While holding an allied champion, Tahm Kench gains {{ e4 }}% movement speed toward enemy champions.

Minions and Monsters: Reactivate to spit them, dealing {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to targets hit.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d427.description: Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d427.name: Leap of Faith
5a13863f8bf55085c847d427.tooltip:
Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and spawning a Tentacle for each enemy champion hit.

For the next {{ e1 }} seconds Tentacles are untargetable and will Slam 50% faster, and Harsh Lesson has a 2 second cooldown.

'There are kind and gentle gods. Mine isn't one of those.'

5a1386418bf55085c847d4f5.description: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f5.name: The Equalizer
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f5.tooltip:
Rumble launches a line of rockets that creates a burning trail for {{ e5 }} seconds. Enemies in the area have their Movement Speed slowed by {{ e3 }}% and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second.

You can control the placement of this attack by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4b5.description: With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing a low amount of damage. If the target was recently stunned by Flash Frost or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, the damage they take is doubled.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b5.name: Frostbite
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b5.tooltip:
Anivia blasts her target with a freezing wind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

If a target was recently stunned by Anivia or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, they take double damage.

5a1386428bf55085c847d52c.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.
5a1386428bf55085c847d52c.name: Riftwalk
5a1386428bf55085c847d52c.tooltip:
Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemy units.

Each subsequent Riftwalk within the next {{ e2 }} seconds doubles the Mana cost and deals an additional {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f3 }}) magic damage per stack, stacking up to {{ e6 }} times.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4af.description: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4af.name: Glacial Fissure
5a1386408bf55085c847d4af.tooltip:
Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line for {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing enemies above it by {{ e4 }}%.

Enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The first champion hit is knocked up for {{ e5 }} seconds, subsequent enemies are knocked up briefly.

5a1386428bf55085c847d536.description: Blitzcrank super charges himself to get dramatically increased Movement and Attack Speed. He is temporarily slowed after the effect ends.
5a1386428bf55085c847d536.name: Overdrive
5a1386428bf55085c847d536.tooltip:
Blitzcrank supercharges himself, gaining {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e4 }} seconds. The Movement Speed bonus decays over the duration.

When Overdrive ends, Blitzcrank's Movement Speed is slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a1386438bf55085c847d55f.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.
5a1386438bf55085c847d55f.name: Mega Adhesive
5a1386438bf55085c847d55f.tooltip:
Singed leaves a sticky area on the ground for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the area are slowed by {{ e1 }}% and grounded, prohibiting the use of Movement abilities.

If Singed flings a target into the zone, it will root them.

5a1386408bf55085c847d471.description: Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Movement Speed after she attacks a <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font> target. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby.
5a1386408bf55085c847d471.name: Heightened Senses
5a1386408bf55085c847d471.tooltip:
Passive: Attacking a Vulnerable target increases Quinn's Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e1 }} seconds.

Active: Valor reveals a large area nearby for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a89c6988bf5504e255a0039.description: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.
5a89c6988bf5504e255a0039.name: Contaminate
5a89c6988bf5504e255a0039.tooltip: Deals {{ e2 }} physical damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) per stack of Deadly Venom to all nearby enemies affected by Deadly Venom. (Max Stack Damage: {{ f2 }})

5a27462f8bf550482ed63de4.description: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.
5a27462f8bf550482ed63de4.name: Requiem
5a27462f8bf550482ed63de4.tooltip: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemy champions (regardless of distance).

5a1386418bf55085c847d4d0.description: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d0.name: Tectonic Disruption
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d0.tooltip:
Vel'Koz disrupts a nearby area which, after a delay, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and knocks up enemies hit for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Any enemies hit that are close to Vel'Koz will be pushed slightly in the direction the ability was cast.

5a1386598bf55085c847d5fa.description:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.
Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage plus 8% of their missing Health.
5a1386598bf55085c847d5fa.name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike
5a1386598bf55085c847d5fa.tooltip:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy it encounters, granting True Sight of the target. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next {{ e7 }} seconds.

Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage plus {{ e3 }}% of their missing Health (Max: {{ e6 }} Damage vs. Monsters).

5a1386408bf55085c847d4bb.description: Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions hit by the blade.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4bb.name: Decimate
5a1386408bf55085c847d4bb.tooltip:
After a short delay, Darius swings his axe around himself, striking enemies in its path. Enemies hit by the axe's blade take {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Enemies hit by the handle take {{ e6 }}% damage (does not apply Hemorrhage).

Darius heals for {{ e5 }}% of his missing Health per enemy champion hit by the blade (max: {{ e7 }}%).

5a1386438bf55085c847d574.description: Garen performs a dance of death with his sword, dealing damage around him for the duration and shredding the armor of enemy champions hit.
5a1386438bf55085c847d574.name: Judgment
5a1386438bf55085c847d574.tooltip:
Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing {{ f3 }} physical damage to nearby enemies -- {{ e1 }} plus {{ e3 }}% of his attack damage (+{{ f1 }}), {{ f2 }} times (increased by 1 every 3 champion levels) -- over the duration.

Enemy champions hit by {{ e6 }} spins lose {{ e5 }}% of their armor for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Judgment deals {{ e4 }}% increased damage when striking only one enemy.
Cancelling Judgment returns cooldown equal to the remaining duration.
Judgment can critically strike for bonus damage.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4c4.description: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her basic attack speed and damage while granting her movement speed if she attacks a champion.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c4.name: Deadly Plumage
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c4.tooltip:
Xayah creates a storm of blades for {{ e2 }} seconds that grant her {{ e1 }}% attack speed and cause her basic attacks to strike an additional time for {{ e5 }}% damage.

If Deadly Plumage strikes an enemy champion, Xayah gains {{ e3 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

If Rakan is nearby he will also gain the effects of Deadly Plumage.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4cd.description: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4cd.name: Rite of the Arcane
5a1386418bf55085c847d4cd.tooltip:
Xerath ascends to his true form, becoming rooted in place and gaining {{ e2 }} Arcane Barrages. This magic artillery deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies hit.

The root ends after {{ e1 }} seconds, when all shots have been fired or when manually deactivated by issuing a move command. If no barrages are fired, {{ e7 }}% of the cooldown is refunded.

5a1386408bf55085c847d49b.description: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.
5a1386408bf55085c847d49b.name: Vorpal Spikes
5a1386408bf55085c847d49b.tooltip:
Cho'Gath's next 3 basic attacks launch spikes that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ f1 }}% of enemies' maximum Health as magic damage and slow by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds, decaying over the duration.

Spikes grow wider as Cho'Gath gains Feast stacks.
Spikes deal an additional 0.5% of enemies' maximum Health per Feast stack.
Percent Health damage against minions and monsters is capped at {{ e8 }}.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1a1.description: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion and deals damage to it. During this time, Skarner can move freely and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, the target will be dealt additional damage.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1a1.name: Impale
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1a1.tooltip: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion for {{ e1 }} seconds, dealing {{ a2 }} physical damage plus {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Skarner can move freely during this time, and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, Skarner's target will be dealt the same damage again.

5a1386408bf55085c847d49a.description: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.
5a1386408bf55085c847d49a.name: Fate's Call
5a1386408bf55085c847d49a.tooltip:
Draw Kalista's Oathsworn to her. For up to 4 seconds, the Oathsworn is untargetable and pacified.

The Oathsworn may mouse click to fly toward target position, stopping at the first enemy champion hit and knocking all enemies in a small radius back.

Kalista's Oathsworn must be within 1100 units for her to cast this ability.

5a1386408bf55085c847d491.name: Shadow Step
5a1386408bf55085c847d491.tooltip:
Kayn gains {{ e1 }}% movement speed and the ability to walk through terrain for {{ e2 }} seconds. When he first enters terrain, he is healed for {{ e7 }} (+{{ a1 }}).
Shadow Assassin: Gain more movement speed and slow immunity.

Maximum duration in combat with enemy champions: {{ e6 }} seconds.
Immobilizing effects and spending more than {{ e3 }} consecutive seconds outside of terrain end Shadow Step immediately.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d464.description: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d464.name: Dark Sphere
5a13863f8bf55085c847d464.tooltip:
Conjures a Dark Sphere dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The sphere remains for {{ f1 }} seconds and can be manipulated by Syndra's other abilities.

This spell can be cast while moving.

5a2745878bf550482ed63dd0.description: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.
5a2745878bf550482ed63dd0.name: Hymn of Valor
5a2745878bf550482ed63dd0.tooltip:
Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the nearest two enemies (prioritizes champions) and changes her Power Chord bonus to Staccato.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ e3 }} seconds. Allied champions that enter the aura will gain an additional {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage on their next attack.

5a5d9080fc675d0d1c55dce9.description: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck and slows them. Basic attacking these enemies within a short window will stun them.
5a5d9080fc675d0d1c55dce9.name: Fracture
5a5d9080fc675d0d1c55dce9.tooltip:
Passive: Crystallizing enemies with Fracture and Impale grants Crystal Charge for the disable duration and reduces the cooldown of Fracture by the same amount.

Active: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, slowing targets hit by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds and reducing the blast's speed.

Enemies hit by Fracture are afflicted with Crystal Venom for {{ e6 }} seconds, causing Skarner's next basic attack against them to deal {{ e2 }} additional physical damage and stun the target for {{ e3 }} second.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4aa.description: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4aa.name: Caustic Spittle
5a1386408bf55085c847d4aa.tooltip:
Passive: Kog'Maw gains {{ e2 }}% bonus attack speed.

Active: Launches a corrosive projectile that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and shreds its Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4ea.description: Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing damage equal to a portion of his target's current Health and slowing them for a short time. Dr. Mundo delights in the suffering of others, so he is returned half of the Health cost when he successfully lands a cleaver (increased to the full Health cost on killing blows).
5a1386418bf55085c847d4ea.name: Infected Cleaver
5a1386418bf55085c847d4ea.tooltip:
Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing {{ e2 }}% of the target's current health as magic damage (no less than {{ e1 }}) and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

If the cleaver hits, {{ f1 }} health is refunded ({{ f2 }} if the cleaver kills).

Infected Cleaver deals no more than {{ e6 }} damage against monsters.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4d9.description: Sion charges in a direction, ramping up speed over time. He can steer his charge slightly with the mouse cursor location. When he collides with an enemy he deals damage and knocks them up based on the distance he has charged.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d9.name: Unstoppable Onslaught
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d9.tooltip:
Sion charges in a direction for 8 seconds and can steer slowly towards the mouse cursor. While charging, Sion is immune to all Crowd Control. Reactivating will cancel Sion's charge early.

When Sion collides with an enemy champion or wall, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and knocks up enemies in a small area for {{ e5 }} seconds. Enemies in a larger area take the same damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for 3 seconds.

The damage increases to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) and the stun increases to {{ e6 }} seconds as Sion charges farther.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d44e.description: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back. Ahri gains movement speed that decays while her orb is traveling.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d44e.name: Orb of Deception
5a13863f8bf55085c847d44e.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on the way out, and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) true damage on the way back.

Ahri gains movement speed that decays while her orb is traveling.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d44a.description: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d44a.name: Help, Pix!
5a13863f8bf55085c847d44a.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Commands Pix to jump to an ally and then follow and aid their attacks instead of Lulu's for {{ e1 }} seconds. If the ally is a champion, Pix shields them from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e1 }} seconds.

On Enemy Cast: Pix deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to target enemy unit. Pix then follows and grants True Sight of them for {{ e6 }} seconds.

5a89c6198bf5504e255a002b.description: Volibear drops to all fours and runs faster. This bonus speed increases when chasing enemy champions. The first enemy he attacks is thrown backwards over Volibear.
5a89c6198bf5504e255a002b.name: Rolling Thunder
5a89c6198bf5504e255a002b.tooltip:
Volibear drops to all fours to hunt his enemies, gaining {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds. This bonus is enhanced to {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed while moving toward enemy champions.

Volibear's next attack during this time deals an additional {{ e1 }} physical damage and flings the target behind him.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0cf.description: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0cf.name: Dark Procession
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0cf.tooltip: Yorick summons a destructible wall of spirits with {{ e5 }} Health around target area for {{ e1 }} seconds. Allies can walk through the wall freely.

5a1386438bf55085c847d579.description: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.
5a1386438bf55085c847d579.name: Pick A Card
5a1386438bf55085c847d579.tooltip:
Cast once to shuffle the deck and again to choose your card, enhancing your next attack.

Blue Card deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and restores {{ e6 }} Mana.

Red Card deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to units around the target and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for 2.5 seconds.

Gold Card deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and stuns for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a1386408bf55085c847d481.description: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack critically strikes.
5a1386408bf55085c847d481.name: Tumble
5a1386408bf55085c847d481.tooltip:
Vayne rolls a short distance, and deals {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage on her next basic attack within {{ e3 }} seconds.

Tumble's bonus damage is equal to {{ e1 }}% of Vayne's total attack damage.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d274.description: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d274.name: Zenith Blade
5a1385df8bf55085c847d274.tooltip: Strikes all enemies in a line dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The last enemy Champion struck will be rooted for {{ e2 }} seconds and Leona will dash to them.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4a6.description: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Wings</font>, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4a6.name: Leap
5a1386408bf55085c847d4a6.tooltip:
Leaps to target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Evolved Wings: Increases Leap's range by 200, and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.

5a2745828bf550482ed63dcf.description: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.
5a2745828bf550482ed63dcf.name: Dragon Strike
5a2745828bf550482ed63dcf.tooltip:
Extends Jarvan IV's lance dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

If the lance contacts Demacian Standard it will pull Jarvan IV to its location, knocking up enemies in his path. This effect can be triggered even while immobilized.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5a6.description: Orianna commands the Ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5a6.name: Command: Dissonance
5a1386448bf55085c847d5a6.tooltip:
Orianna commands her Ball to release an electric pulse, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

The pulse leaves behind an energy field for {{ e4 }} seconds, lowering enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and increasing ally Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds. This effect diminishes over time.

5a1386428bf55085c847d506.description: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.
5a1386428bf55085c847d506.name: Spirit's Refuge
5a1386428bf55085c847d506.tooltip:
Shen's spirit blade creates a defensive zone for {{ e1 }} seconds. Basic attacks that would hit Shen or an allied champion in the zone are blocked.

If there are no champions to protect in the zone when it starts, the spirit blade will not activate until one enters or {{ e2 }} seconds pass.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0aa.description: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0aa.name: Disintegrate
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0aa.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Mana cost and half the cooldown are refunded if Disintegrate kills the target.

5a1386428bf55085c847d50d.description: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.
5a1386428bf55085c847d50d.name: Dark Matter
