5a1386428bf55085c847d50d.tooltip:
After 1.2 seconds, dark matter falls from the sky to the target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Every 50 stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown by 10% (currently {{ f2.0*100 }}%).

5a67ec90fc675d08100b1bad.description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns by 1.5 seconds if it strikes an enemy unit.
5a67ec90fc675d08100b1bad.name: Mystic Shot
5a67ec90fc675d08100b1bad.tooltip:
Ezreal fires a bolt of energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage (applies on-hit effects).

Ezreal's cooldowns are reduced by {{ e2 }} seconds if Mystic Shot hits a target.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d20e.description: Blasts an enemy unit with angelic force, dealing damage, slowing Movement Speed, and applying Holy Fervor.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d20e.name: Reckoning
5a1385df8bf55085c847d20e.tooltip: Blasts an enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds, and applying a stack of Holy Fervor.

5a384fe48bf55044c7f6084e.description: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.
5a384fe48bf55044c7f6084e.name: Jousting
5a384fe48bf55044c7f6084e.tooltip:
Kled dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies in his path. Cannot cross walls.

If Jousting hits an enemy champion or large monster, Kled gains {{ e5 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} second and True Sight of the target. He can cast this ability again within {{ e6 }} seconds to dash back through the same target, dealing the same damage.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d430.description: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d430.name: Last Caress
5a13863f8bf55085c847d430.tooltip: Evelynn unleashes her demonic energy, becoming untargetable and decimating enemies in front of her. She then warps backwards. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, increased to {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) to enemies below {{ e7 }}% health.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d20f.description: Blesses a target friendly champion, granting them increased Movement Speed and healing them.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d20f.name: Divine Blessing
5a1385df8bf55085c847d20f.tooltip: Blesses an allied champion, increasing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) for {{ e3 }} seconds and healing them for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health.

5a89c69e8bf5504e255a003a.description: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.
5a89c69e8bf5504e255a003a.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
5a89c69e8bf5504e255a003a.tooltip: For {{ e3 }} seconds, Kog'Maw's basic attacks gain {{ e1 }} range and deal {{ e2 }}% (+{{ f1 }})% of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage.

5a1386438bf55085c847d572.description: Garen gains a burst of movement speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.
5a1386438bf55085c847d572.name: Decisive Strike
5a1386438bf55085c847d572.tooltip:
Garen breaks free from all slows affecting him, and gains {{ e2 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

His next basic attack within {{ e5 }} seconds deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and silences his target for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1b3.description: Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing damage and knocking the target back.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1b3.name: Headbutt
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1b3.tooltip: Alistar rams into an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and knocking them back.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5a2.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5a2.name: Depth Charge
5a1386448bf55085c847d5a2.tooltip:
Nautilus fires a shockwave that chases an enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to other enemies it passes through, knocking them into the air, and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

The shockwave explodes upon hitting its target dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, launching them into the air and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a13865a8bf55085c847d608.description: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.
5a13865a8bf55085c847d608.name: Nimbus Strike
5a13865a8bf55085c847d608.tooltip: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies nearby. Each enemy struck takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Wukong then gains {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a1386448bf55085c847d597.description: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.
5a1386448bf55085c847d597.name: Emperor's Divide
5a1386448bf55085c847d597.tooltip:
Azir summons a wall of armored soldiers that charge forward, knocking back enemies and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The soldiers then remain as a wall for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Azir and his allies can pass freely through Emperor's Divide.

Emperor's Divide does not interact with Azir's basic attacks or spells.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d452.description: Aurelion Sol gains speed while moving in one continuous direction, and can take off flying for a long distance.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d452.name: Comet of Legend
5a13863f8bf55085c847d452.tooltip:
Passive: Continuously moving in one direction grants increasing Movement Speed up to {{ e2 }}%.

Active: Fly for {{ e3 }} units in the chosen direction. Only castable outside of combat. Aurelion Sol can see and be seen over walls while flying.

Taking champion or turret damage will force a landing and reset the passive movement speed.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d441.description: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d441.name: The Hextech Ultimatum
5a13863f8bf55085c847d441.tooltip:
Camille briefly becomes untargetable and leaps onto an enemy champion, interrupting channels and locking them into an area they cannot escape by any means for {{ e3 }} seconds. Other nearby enemies are knocked away. Her basic attacks against the trapped enemy deal bonus magic damage equal to {{ e2 }} plus {{ e1 }}% of their current health.

The Hextech Ultimatum ends if Camille leaves the area.

5a1386428bf55085c847d521.description: Zac flattens himself, making him immune to crowd control while slowing enemies standing on top of him. When he decides to bounce away, he will suck up any enemies standing on top of him, taking them for a ride.
5a1386428bf55085c847d521.name: Let's Bounce!
5a1386428bf55085c847d521.tooltip:
First cast: Zac squishes himself down, making him immune to Crowd Control for up to {{ e5 }} seconds. Enemies standing on top of him are slowed by {{ e4 }}%.

Second cast: Charging for at least {{ f1 }} seconds before recasting causes Zac to scoop up enemies on top of him, carrying them towards a location. Upon landing nearby enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are briefly slowed.

Reactivating before Zac charges up knocks back nearby enemies instead.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5af.description: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5af.name: Gatling Gun
5a1386448bf55085c847d5af.tooltip:
Corki's gatling gun fires continuously at targets in front of him for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage and reducing up to {{ e4 }} armor and magic resist.

Gatling Gun's damage is {{ e7 }}% physical, {{ e8 }}% magic.
Defense reductions last for {{ e6 }} seconds after last being damaged by Gatling Gun.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d438.description: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d438.name: Body Slam
5a13863f8bf55085c847d438.tooltip:
Gragas charges forward, colliding with the first enemy unit. He deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and bumps them back, stunning them for {{ e2 }} second.

Body Slam's Cooldown is reduced by {{ f1 }} seconds if Gragas collides with a unit.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4df.description: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4df.name: Yordle Snap Trap
5a1386418bf55085c847d4df.tooltip:
Sets traps that an enemy Champion can spring, immobilizing them for {{ e6 }} seconds and granting True Sight for a short duration.

Traps last for {{ e3 }} seconds. {{ e5 }} traps may be active at once.

Trapped enemies take an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) increased damage from Headshot.

5a13865c8bf55085c847d61a.description: Azir shields himself briefly and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he instantly readies a new Sand Soldier for deployment and halts his dash.
5a13865c8bf55085c847d61a.name: Shifting Sands
5a13865c8bf55085c847d61a.tooltip:
Azir shields himself for {{ e6 }} seconds, blocking up to {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies hit for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

If Azir hits an enemy champion, he halts his dash and instantly prepares a new Sand Soldier.

5a1386428bf55085c847d525.description: Tahm Kench teleports across the map, and he may bring one ally champion with him.
5a1386428bf55085c847d525.name: Abyssal Voyage
5a1386428bf55085c847d525.tooltip:
Begin to channel for up to 6 seconds. During this time, one ally champion can right click Tahm Kench to join in. Alternatively, reactivate this ability to travel alone. On reactivation or once an ally has opted in, Tahm travels to the target location. Incoming champion damage breaks the channel.

'Boy, the world's one river, and I'm its king. Ain't no place I ain't been; ain't no place I can't go again.'

5a13865c8bf55085c847d61b.description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.
5a13865c8bf55085c847d61b.name: Three Talon Strike
5a13865c8bf55085c847d61b.tooltip: Xin Zhao's next 3 basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) extra physical damage and reduce his other cooldowns by 1 second. The final strike also knocks the target into the air for {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a89c6138bf5504e255a0029.description: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.
5a89c6138bf5504e255a0029.name: Shadow Assault
5a89c6138bf5504e255a0029.tooltip:
Talon disperses a ring of blades that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all units they hit, gains {{ e2 }}% increased movement speed, and becomes Invisible for up to {{ e3 }} seconds. When the Invisibility ends, the blades converge, dealing the same damage again to enemies they pass through.

If Talon cancels Invisibility with an attack or Noxian Diplomacy, the blades converge on his target's location instead.

Stealth - Invisible: Talon can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.

5a1386448bf55085c847d59f.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits a champion, he drags both himself and the opponent close together. If it hits terrain, Nautilus instead pulls himself to the anchor, the cooldown of Dredge Line is reduced by half, and half the Mana cost is refunded.
5a1386448bf55085c847d59f.name: Dredge Line
5a1386448bf55085c847d59f.tooltip:
Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits an enemy unit, Nautilus drags himself and the target together dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning them briefly.

If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus will drag himself forward, the cooldown is reduced by {{ e3 }}% ({{ f1 }}), and {{ e4 }}% of the Mana cost is refunded.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d444.description: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d444.name: Eulogy of the Isles
5a13863f8bf55085c847d444.tooltip:
Yorick summons The Maiden of the Mist and {{ e1 }} Mist Walkers. The Maiden has {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) Health, deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage, and raises Mist Walkers from nearby enemy deaths.

When Yorick damages the Maiden's target he will deal {{ e5 }}% of their max Health as bonus magic damage ({{ e7 }} second cooldown).

If the Maiden is summoned inside a lane, she will start pushing the lane.

5a13865d8bf55085c847d620.description: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.
5a13865d8bf55085c847d620.name: Dance of Arrows
5a13865d8bf55085c847d620.tooltip:
Lamb vaults, firing up to 3 arrows at nearby enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and gains {{ f2 }}% bonus attack speed for {{ e8 }} seconds.

Casting Wolf's Frenzy or vaulting inside of its effect reduces the cooldown of this spell to {{ e4 }} seconds.

5a1386428bf55085c847d543.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.
5a1386428bf55085c847d543.name: Ebb and Flow
5a1386428bf55085c847d543.tooltip:
Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions.

On Ally Hit: Heals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Health and will bounce to a nearby enemy champion.

On Enemy Hit: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and bounces to a nearby allied champion.

Bounces to each target only once, and hits up to {{ e2 }} targets. The damage and healing value is modified by ({{ f1 }}%) each bounce.

5a1386428bf55085c847d505.description: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.
5a1386428bf55085c847d505.name: Twilight Assault
5a1386428bf55085c847d505.tooltip:
Shen recalls his spirit blade and draws it. Enemies it collides with are slowed by {{ e4 }}% when moving away from Shen for the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

Shen's next {{ e3 }} attacks deal {{ f1 }} plus {{ e2 }} (+{{ charabilitypower*.01 }})% of their target's max health as bonus magic damage. If the spirit blade collided with an enemy champion, those attacks deal {{ f2 }} plus {{ e6 }} (+{{ charabilitypower2*.01 }})% instead and have +{{ e9 }}% Attack Speed.

Each attack deals {{ e1 }}% increased damage to monsters (capped at {{ e7 }}).

5a1386418bf55085c847d4c1.description: Miss Fortune channels a flurry of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c1.name: Bullet Time
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c1.tooltip:
Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets for {{ e3 }} seconds, dealing (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage per wave ({{ e2 }} waves total).

Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike for {{ f3 }}% damage.

Total Damage: {{ f2 }}

5a1386448bf55085c847d5ad.description: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5ad.name: Cannon Barrage
5a1386448bf55085c847d5ad.tooltip:
Signals Gangplank's ship to fire {{ f3 }} waves of cannonballs at an area over {{ e3 }} seconds. Each wave deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slows enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Collect Silver Serpents with Parrrley to upgrade in the shop.

5a89c6a38bf5504e255a003c.description: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.
5a89c6a38bf5504e255a003c.name: Apprehend
5a89c6a38bf5504e255a003c.tooltip:
Passive: Darius gains {{ e1 }}% Armor Penetration.

Active: Pulls in all enemies in front of Darius and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1a4.description: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Movement Speed or increasing an ally's Movement Speed for a short time.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1a4.name: Time Warp
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1a4.tooltip: Zilean increases an allied champion's Movement Speed, or slows an enemy champion, by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e1 }} seconds.

5a1386408bf55085c847d46d.description: Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage, increased by how long the bleed was active on his target.
5a1386408bf55085c847d46d.name: Seastone Trident
5a1386408bf55085c847d46d.tooltip:
Passive: Fizz's basic attacks bleed his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage over {{ e8 }} seconds.

Active: Fizz's next basic attack deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus magic damage. If the target has been bleeding for at least {{ e7 }} seconds, this bonus increases to {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}).

If the Active kills a target it refunds {{ e2 }} mana and resets its cooldown to {{ e0 }} second.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d216.description: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d216.name: Aqua Prison
5a1385df8bf55085c847d216.tooltip: Sends a bubble to target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, and stunning them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a1386438bf55085c847d552.description: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.
5a1386438bf55085c847d552.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
5a1386438bf55085c847d552.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee heals target ally champion for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) based on their missing health and grants them {{ e4 }}% Attack Speed for 7 seconds.

Cougar: Nidalee claws at enemies in target direction.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4b1.description: Akali teleports to a nearby location, leaving a cover of smoke at her previous location. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes Invisible and gains Movement Speed. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her. Enemies inside the smoke have their Movement Speed reduced.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b1.name: Twilight Shroud
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b1.tooltip:
Akali teleports to a nearby location, leaving a cover of smoke at her previous location that lasts for {{ e2 }} seconds and slows enemies within its area by {{ e3 }}%.

While inside the shroud Akali gains Invisibility and {{ e6 }}% movement speed. Attacking or using abilities briefly removes Invisibility.

Stealth - Invisible: Akali can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.

5a1386448bf55085c847d58f.description: Sivir's next few basic attacks will bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage to secondary targets.
5a1386448bf55085c847d58f.name: Ricochet
5a1386448bf55085c847d58f.tooltip:
Sivir's next {{ e4 }} basic attacks bounce to nearby targets, dealing {{ f1 }} physical damage to the first target and {{ f2 }} physical damage to each subsequent target.

If a given Ricochet attack critically strikes its first target, all subsequent bounces from that attack will also critically strike.

Targets cannot be hit more than once by a given Ricochet attack and on-hit effects are applied only to the first target of each attack.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1ff.description: Pantheon leaps at an enemy and bashes them with his shield, stunning them. After finishing the attack, Pantheon readies himself to block the next attack.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1ff.name: Aegis of Zeonia
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1ff.tooltip: Pantheon leaps at target enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage and stunning them for {{ e2 }} second. Pantheon also instantly refreshes his Aegis Protection.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4c7.description: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for movement speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c7.name: Spider Form
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c7.tooltip:
Elise transforms into a menacing spider, sacrificing 425 attack range in exchange for {{ e3 }} movement speed and access to arachnid abilities. All dormant Spiderlings are awakened and will attack nearby foes.

Spiderlings: Spiderlings deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and take {{ e4 }}% reduced damage from multi-target abilities.

5a1386408bf55085c847d488.description: Heimerdinger lays down a rapid-fire cannon turret equipped with a secondary pass-through beam attack (turrets deal half damage to towers).
5a1386408bf55085c847d488.name: H-28G Evolution Turret
5a1386408bf55085c847d488.tooltip:
Places a Turret. Turret attacks prioritize Heimerdinger's targets and enemies attacking Heimerdinger. Turrets shut down if Heimerdinger moves far away. Heimerdinger generates a Turret Kit every {{ f1 }} seconds and can hold {{ e3 }} Kits at once.

H-28G Evolution Turret Stats
Health: {{ f4 }} (+{{ f2 }})
Attack - Cannon: {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage.
Attack - Beam: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage every {{ e6 }} seconds.
Maximum Turrets Placed: 3

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0ff.description: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0ff.name: Wither
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0ff.tooltip: Nasus ages target champion over {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%, increasing to {{ e1 }}% over the duration. The target's Attack Speed is reduced by half the amount.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4e5.description: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e5.name: Battle Dance
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e5.tooltip:
Flies to an allied champion, granting them a {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health shield for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Can be re-cast at no cost once within {{ e2 }} seconds.

Battle Dance's cast range is increased when cast on Xayah.

5a1386428bf55085c847d50b.description: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.
5a1386428bf55085c847d50b.name: Mantra
5a1386428bf55085c847d50b.tooltip:
Karma empowers her next ability within 8 seconds for an additional effect.

Soulflare: Deals bonus damage and leaves behind a circle of flame, slowing enemies and dealing additional damage.

Renewal: Karma heals for a portion of her missing health. If the link is unbroken the root is longer and Karma is healed again.

Defiance: The shield is stronger and allied champions around the target also gain a shield and movement speed.

5a1386428bf55085c847d537.description: Passively causes lightning bolts to damage a nearby enemy. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to damage nearby enemies and silence them for 0.5 seconds, but doing so removes the passive lightning until Static Field becomes available again.
5a1386428bf55085c847d537.name: Static Field
5a1386428bf55085c847d537.tooltip:
Passive: Lightning arcs off of Blitzcrank to hit a random nearby enemy for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage every 2.5 seconds.

Active: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and silences surrounding enemy units for 0.5 seconds. The passive is not in effect during the cooldown.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4d1.description: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d1.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d1.tooltip:
Passive: Deconstructing enemy Champions Researches them for {{ e2 }} seconds. Basic attacks and all abilities refresh Research.

Active: Vel'Koz channels a ray of energy that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds, dealing Magic Damage up to a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and slowing units hit by {{ e3 }}%.

Enemies that stay in the beam will periodically gain Organic Deconstruction stacks. Deals True Damage instead of Magic against Researched units.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d23d.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d23d.name: Insanity Potion
5a1385df8bf55085c847d23d.tooltip: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him {{ e1 }} Ability Power, Armor, Magic Resist, Movement Speed, Health Regen, and Mana Regen for {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a384fef8bf55044c7f6084f.description: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.
5a384fef8bf55044c7f6084f.name: Shunpo
5a384fef8bf55044c7f6084f.tooltip:
Katarina dashes in the blink of an eye to the target ally, enemy, or Dagger. If it is an enemy, Katarina strikes for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage - otherwise she strikes the nearest enemy in range.

Picking up a Dagger will reduce Shunpo's cooldown by {{ f1 }} seconds ({{ f3*100 }}%).

Katarina can blink to any location near the target.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d42b.description: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d42b.name: Excessive Force
5a13863f8bf55085c847d42b.tooltip:
Causes next basic attack to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the target and enemies behind it.

Vi charges a new punch every {{ f1 }} seconds and can hold 2 charges at once.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d137.description: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d137.name: Feral Scream
5a1385de8bf55085c847d137.tooltip: Silences enemies in a cone for {{ e2 }} seconds and deals {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4de.description: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).
5a1386418bf55085c847d4de.name: Piltover Peacemaker
5a1386418bf55085c847d4de.tooltip:
Revs the rifle for {{ e4 }} second to fire a narrow piercing shot dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. After hitting any target, it opens into a wider shot that deals {{ e2 }}% less damage.

Always deals full damage to trap revealed targets.

5a2746258bf550482ed63de3.description: Aurelion Sol projects a blast of pure starfire, damaging and slowing all enemies caught in it and knocking nearby enemies back to a safer distance.
5a2746258bf550482ed63de3.name: Voice of Light
5a2746258bf550482ed63de3.tooltip:
Breathes out a blast of pure starfire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

The blast will also knock nearby enemies back to Aurelion Sol's Outer Limit.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d447.description: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d447.name: Death Lotus
5a13863f8bf55085c847d447.tooltip:
Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, rapidly throwing knives at the three nearest enemy champions, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per knife. Total over {{ e3 }} seconds to each enemy: {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ f3 }}) magic damage.

Applies Grievous Wounds to all enemies struck, reducing their healing and regeneration by 40%.

5a1386408bf55085c847d49c.description: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.
5a1386408bf55085c847d49c.name: Feast
5a1386408bf55085c847d49c.tooltip:
Ravenously feed on an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) true damage to champions or {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) to minions and monsters. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath gains a stack of Feast, which causes him to grow in size and gain {{ e3 }} maximum health.

Only {{ e4 }} total stacks can be gained from minions and non-epic monsters. (Current: {{ f3 }}/{{ e4 }})

5a1386438bf55085c847d55a.description: Galio grants damage reduction to an ally. After a delay Galio smashes down on the ally's original location, knocking up nearby enemies.
5a1386438bf55085c847d55a.name: Hero's Entrance
5a1386438bf55085c847d55a.tooltip:
Galio designates an allied champion's current position as his landing spot and grants {{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }})% damage reduction to that ally until he lands.

When Galio lands, enemies in the area take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are knocked into the air for {{ e3 }} seconds ({{ e2 }} seconds in the center).

5a13863f8bf55085c847d429.description: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d429.name: Summon: Tibbers
5a13863f8bf55085c847d429.tooltip:
Summons Tibbers, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the target area. For the next 45 seconds, Tibbers burns nearby enemies for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) per second and attacks for {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) as magic damage. Annie can control Tibbers by reactivating this ability.

Tibbers Enrages when: summoned; Annie uses Pyromania on an enemy Champion; and when Annie dies.

Enrages: Tibbers gains 275% Attack Speed and 100% Movement Speed, decaying over 3 seconds.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0b8.description: Places a protective barrier around an allied champion, absorbing magical damage and disables until penetrated or the shield dissipates.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0b8.name: Black Shield
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0b8.tooltip: Shields an allied Champion for {{ e2 }} seconds. The shield absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and prevents disables until it breaks.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4d3.description: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d3.name: Ardent Blaze
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d3.tooltip:
Fires a shot that explodes upon enemy contact or reaching the end of its path. The explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and marks enemies for 6 seconds.

When Lucian or his allies damage a marked target, Lucian gains {{ e2 }} Movement Speed for 1 second.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d14c.description: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d14c.name: Void Ooze
5a1385de8bf55085c847d14c.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to enemies hit and leaves a trail on the ground for {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing enemies in it by {{ e2 }}%.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5ae.description: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5ae.name: Valkyrie
5a1386448bf55085c847d5ae.tooltip:
Active: Corki flies a short distance, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to enemies in the fire left along his path.

Special Delivery: Corki flies a great distance, dropping bombs that knock aside enemies and leave a burning trail for 5 seconds. The trail slows enemies by {{ e2 }}% and burns them for {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage per second.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d245.description: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d245.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
5a1385df8bf55085c847d245.tooltip: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Enemies farther away take two-thirds damage.

5a8239ab8bf550fb743b9a77.description: Master Yi becomes skilled in the art of Wuju, passively increasing his Attack Damage. Activating Wuju Style grants bonus true damage on basic attacks, but the passive bonus is then lost while on cooldown.
5a8239ab8bf550fb743b9a77.name: Wuju Style
5a8239ab8bf550fb743b9a77.tooltip:
Passive: Grants {{ e1 }}% ({{ f1 }}) Attack Damage.

Active: Basic attacks deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) bonus true damage for {{ e5 }} seconds. Afterwards the passive bonus is lost while Wuju Style is on cooldown.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d242.description: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d242.name: Bouncing Bomb
5a1385df8bf55085c847d242.tooltip: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0c1.description: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0c1.name: Explosive Cask
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0c1.tooltip: Gragas hurls his cask, causing it to explode when it lands. Enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are knocked away from the explosion.

5a1386408bf55085c847d479.description: Bear Stance: Activation - Udyr increases Movement Speed for a short duration. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks stun his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target for several seconds.
5a1386408bf55085c847d479.name: Bear Stance
5a1386408bf55085c847d479.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Basic attacks stun the target for {{ e3 }} second. This effect cannot occur on the same target again for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Activation: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% and ignores unit collision for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4b7.description: Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for 1.5 seconds.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b7.name: Sear
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b7.tooltip:
Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for 1.5 seconds.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0dd.description: Irelia summons 4 spirit blades that she can fling to deal physical damage and siphon life from enemies they pass through.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0dd.name: Transcendent Blades
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0dd.tooltip: Irelia summons 4 spirit blades that she can fling to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies they pass through. She heals for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt against champions. ({{ e4 }}% vs. minions and monsters)

5a67ed47fc675d08100b1bb1.description: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.
5a67ed47fc675d08100b1bb1.name: Destiny
5a67ed47fc675d08100b1bb1.tooltip:
Grants True Sight on all enemy champions on the map for {{ e1 }} seconds.

While Destiny is active, Twisted Fate can teleport up to {{ e4 }} units away in 1.5 seconds.

5a13866a8bf55085c847d62d.description: Blink to a nearby position for 1 second. Then blink back.
5a13866a8bf55085c847d62d.name: Portal Jump
5a13866a8bf55085c847d62d.tooltip:
Blink to a nearby position for 1 second. Then blink back.

Zoe may cast and attack, but not move, during this time. She can also see over walls.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d454.description: Vladimir steals life from the target enemy. When Vladimir's resource is full, Transfusion will benefit from massively increased damage and healing for a brief time.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d454.name: Transfusion
5a13863f8bf55085c847d454.tooltip:
Vladimir drains the lifeforce of his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health. After casting Transfusion twice, Vladimir gains Crimson Rush the next time it becomes available to cast.

Crimson Rush: Vladimir is briefly hasted and for the next {{ e8 }} seconds Transfusion deals {{ e7 }}% increased damage and heals for an additional {{ f7 }} plus {{ e5 }}% (+{{ f6 }}%) of his missing health (empowered heal has {{ e9 }}% effectiveness against minions).

5a1386448bf55085c847d590.description: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana back if a spell is blocked.
5a1386448bf55085c847d590.name: Spell Shield
5a1386448bf55085c847d590.tooltip:
Sivir creates a magical barrier for {{ e1 }} seconds that blocks the next incoming enemy ability.

If an ability is blocked by the shield, Sivir regains {{ e2 }} Mana.

5a13865a8bf55085c847d60c.description: Pantheon focuses and unleashes 3 swift strikes to the area in front of him dealing damage to all enemies. Pantheon also becomes more aware of his enemy's vital spots, allowing him to always crit enemies below 15% Health.
5a13865a8bf55085c847d60c.name: Heartseeker Strike
5a13865a8bf55085c847d60c.tooltip:
Passive: Pantheon's basic attacks and Spear Shot gain 100% critical strike chance against targets below {{ e3 }}% Health.

Active: Pantheon focuses and delivers {{ e4 }} swift strikes in front of him for a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage (deals {{ e2 }}% damage to minions and monsters).

Damage per Strike: {{ f1 }}

5a1386448bf55085c847d5b4.description: Diana dashes to an enemy and deals magic damage. Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to teleport to a target afflicted with Moonlight.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b4.name: Lunar Rush
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b4.tooltip:
Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight. All other enemies will have the Moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of Lunar Rush.

5a1386578bf55085c847d5ec.description:
Passively, Ryze's other damaging spells reset Overload and begin to charge a Rune that can be used to empower Overload.

On cast, Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck. If a Rune is fully charged, Ryze also gains a shield and Movement Speed.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5ec.name: Overload
5a1386578bf55085c847d5ec.tooltip:
Passive: Rune Prison and Spell Flux reset Overload's cooldown and charge a Rune for {{ e2 }} seconds, up to {{ e9 }} Runes.

Active: Unleash a runic blast, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy struck. Any active Runes are discharged.

If {{ e9 }} Runes are discharged, they Overload, shielding Ryze from {{ f3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) damage and increasing his Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d25d.description: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font>, damaging them and rendering them unable to attack or move.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d25d.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
5a1385df8bf55085c847d25d.tooltip: Amumu entangles nearby enemy units, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applying Curse. Entangled enemies are unable to attack or move for 2 seconds.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1b5.description: Alistar lets out a wild roar, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1b5.name: Unbreakable Will
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1b5.tooltip: Removes all disables from Alistar. For {{ e1 }} seconds Alistar takes {{ e2 }}% reduced physical and magical damage.

5a1386578bf55085c847d5e8.description: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e8.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e8.tooltip:
Kled charges toward a location, leaving a trail that grants allies increasing movement speed. While charging, Kled gains a shield that increases over time to a maximum of {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and lasts for 2 seconds after the charge ends.

Skaarl rams the first enemy champion encountered, dealing up to {{ f5 }}% (+{{ f1*3 }}%) of the target's maximum health as physical damage based on distance traveled.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4e0.description: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e0.name: Ace in the Hole
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e0.tooltip:
Takes a second to line up the perfect shot on an enemy Champion at up to {{ e2 }} range. The shot deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage, but other enemy Champions can intercept it.

Grants True Sight of the target during the channel.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4dc.description:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4dc.name: Flame Breath
5a1386418bf55085c847d4dc.tooltip:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that stops after hitting a champion. All enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ f4 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are marked for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Shyvana's basic attacks against marked targets deal {{ e4 }}% of their maximum health as magic damage on hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ f5 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and scorching the earth for 4 seconds. Enemies on scorched earth take {{ f3 }} (+{{ f6 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage per second.

Flame Breath's on-hit damage against monsters is capped at {{ e3 }} damage per hit.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1db.description: Ezreal fires a fluctuating wave of energy, dealing magic damage to enemy champions, while increasing the Attack Speed of allied champions.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1db.name: Essence Flux
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1db.tooltip: Ezreal fires a wave of energy that damages all enemy champions it passes through for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If Ezreal or his Allied champions are hit by the wave, their Attack Speed is increased by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a13864f8bf55085c847d5da.description: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
5a13864f8bf55085c847d5da.name: Permafrost
5a13864f8bf55085c847d5da.tooltip:
Passive: Nearby melee allied champions' basic attacks apply Frost to enemy champions and large monsters.

Active: Target enemy with 4 stacks of Frost takes {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, is stunned for {{ e1 }} second(s), and is briefly displaced.

An enemy stunned by Sejuani cannot gain Frost for {{ f2 }} seconds.

5a1386438bf55085c847d564.description: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.
5a1386438bf55085c847d564.name: Satchel Charge
5a1386438bf55085c847d564.tooltip:
Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after {{ e2 }} seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.

Satchel Charge will hexplode structurally unsound towers below {{ f1*100 }}% of their Health.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d23a.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d23a.name: Poison Trail
5a1385df8bf55085c847d23a.tooltip: Toggle: Singed lays a poisonous trail that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ charabilitypower*4 }}) magic damage per second.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4cb.description: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4cb.name: Dragon's Rage
5a1386418bf55085c847d4cb.tooltip:
Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick knocking an enemy champion back and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air briefly and take physical damage equal to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of the initial target's bonus health.

5a1386438bf55085c847d569.description: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.
5a1386438bf55085c847d569.name: Glacial Path
5a1386438bf55085c847d569.tooltip:
Casts an ice claw that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies hit.

Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.

5a1386428bf55085c847d532.description: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.
5a1386428bf55085c847d532.name: Ruthless Predator
5a1386428bf55085c847d532.tooltip:
Renekton's next attack strikes twice, stunning his target for {{ e3 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage per hit ({{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }}) total).

Each strike applies on-hit effects and generates Fury. Hitting a champion generates an additional {{ e7 }} Fury.

50 Fury Bonus: Renekton attacks three times, stunning his target for {{ e4 }} seconds and dealing a total of {{ e6 }} (+{{ f3 }}) damage. No longer generates Fury.

5a1386448bf55085c847d59c.description:
Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.

Augment: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.
5a1386448bf55085c847d59c.name: Death Ray
5a1386448bf55085c847d59c.tooltip:
Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to every enemy in its path.

Augment - Aftershock: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4a7.description: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisible</font>, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Movement Speed. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Adaptive Cloaking</font>, while out of combat Kha'Zix also passively gains Void Assault upon entering a new brush.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4a7.name: Void Assault
5a1386408bf55085c847d4a7.tooltip:
Passive: Ranking up Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities.

Active: Kha'Zix becomes Invisible for {{ e1 }} seconds and activates Unseen Threat. While Invisible, he gains {{ e3 }}% movement speed and ignores unit collision. Void Assault can be cast a second time within {{ e2 }} seconds.

Evolved Adaptive Cloaking: While out of combat, Kha'Zix also passively gains Void Assault for {{ e5 }} seconds in brush. This persists for up to {{ f1 }} seconds after exiting the brush ({{ f1 }} second per brush cooldown).

Stealth - Invisible: Kha'Zix can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4f7.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased, he gains Life Steal and has increased healing from all sources based on how much Health he is missing.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f7.name: Vicious Strikes
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f7.tooltip:
For 6 seconds, Olaf gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal and his Attack Speed is increased by {{ e1 }}%.

During this time, Olaf also receives 1% increased healing from all sources for every {{ e3 }}% of Health he is missing.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d46b.description: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance for the duration.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d46b.name: Fury of the Sands
5a13863f8bf55085c847d46b.tooltip:
Nasus becomes empowered in the sandstorm for 15 seconds, increasing his maximum Health by {{ e1 }} and Armor and Magic Resistance by {{ e4 }}.

While the storm rages, he deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of nearby enemies' maximum Health each second as magic damage ({{ e5 }} damage max per second), gains an additional {{ e8 }} Armor and Magic Resistance each second, and Siphoning Strike has a {{ e9 }}% reduced cooldown.

5a13865d8bf55085c847d621.description: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.
5a13865d8bf55085c847d621.name: Mounting Dread
5a13865d8bf55085c847d621.tooltip:
Cripple an enemy, slowing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e8 }} second.

After Lamb attacks the target twice, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ f2 }}% of the target's missing health as bonus physical damage.

Wolf's attack critically strikes targets for {{ e6 }}% increased damage if they are below {{ e5 }}% (+{{ f3 }}%) health (Increased by Critical Strike Chance).

[Maximum {{ e0 }} vs. monsters]

5a1386418bf55085c847d4d7.description: Sion shields himself and can reactivate after 3 seconds to deal Magic Damage to enemies nearby. When Sion kills enemies, he passively gains maximum Health.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d7.name: Soul Furnace
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d7.tooltip:
Passive: Sion gains {{ e5 }} maximum Health when he kills a unit ({{ e6 }} for champion kills, assists, large minions and large monsters). Current Bonus: {{ f1 }}

Active: Sion shields himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) ({{ e3 }}% of maximum Health) for 6 seconds. After {{ e7 }} seconds, while the shield holds, Sion can reactivate to deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e4 }}% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage to nearby enemies. Max 400 bonus damage to minions and monsters.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d29f.description: Draven gains increased Movement Speed and Attack Speed. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d29f.name: Blood Rush

5a1386418bf55085c847d4ec.description: Dr. Mundo gains bonus attack damage based on his missing health, and his next basic attack headbutts his target for additional damage. Passively increases magic resist whenever Dr. Mundo is dealt magic damage or pays a health cost.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4ec.name: Masochism
5a1386418bf55085c847d4ec.tooltip:
Passive: When Dr. Mundo suffers magic damage or pays a health cost, his magic resist is increased by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e0 }} seconds, up to a maximum of {{ f3*100 }}%.

Active: Dr. Mundo's next basic attack will headbutt the enemy, dealing an additional {{ f1 }} physical damage ({{ e1 }}% of maximum health) at the cost of {{ e2 }} health.

Upon activation, Dr. Mundo gains up to {{ e4 }} attack damage (no less than {{ e5 }}) for {{ e6 }} seconds based on his missing health.

Masochism grants {{ f2 }} attack damage above the minimum for every 1% of missing health ({{ f5 }}).

5a1386408bf55085c847d49f.description: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.
5a1386408bf55085c847d49f.name: Equinox
5a1386408bf55085c847d49f.tooltip:
Creates a zone at target location for 1.5 seconds, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemy Champions in the cast radius. Enemy Champions standing in the zone are silenced until they leave.

When the zone disappears, all enemy Champions still standing in the zone are rooted for {{ e1 }} second(s) and are dealt {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d437.description: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d437.name: Drunken Rage
5a13863f8bf55085c847d437.tooltip:
Gragas guzzles down his brew, taking {{ e1 }}% reduced damage for {{ e5 }} seconds.

After finishing his drink, his next basic attack deals magic damage to nearby enemies equal to {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of their max Health (max {{ e4 }} vs monsters).

5a1386408bf55085c847d492.description: Kayn hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out.
5a1386408bf55085c847d492.name: Umbral Trespass
5a1386408bf55085c847d492.tooltip:
Kayn infests an enemy champion he has recently damaged, becoming untargetable for up to {{ e4 }} seconds. Reactivate to end this effect early. When Umbral Trespass ends, the target takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.
Shadow Assassin: Gains extra range and refresh The Darkin Scythe on exit.

Darkin: Deals percent maximum health damage and heals for a percentage of target maximum health.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4d4.description: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d4.name: Relentless Pursuit
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d4.tooltip:
Quickly dashes a short distance.

Whenever Lightslinger hits an enemy, Relentless Pursuit's cooldown is reduced by {{ e1 }} second (doubles to {{ e2 }} seconds against champions).

5a1386408bf55085c847d4ac.description:
Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4ac.name: Winter's Bite
5a1386408bf55085c847d4ac.tooltip:
Braum propels freezing ice from his shield dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [2.5% of Braum's Max Health] magic damage to the first enemy hit and slowing them by {{ e2 }}%, decaying over the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.

5a1386408bf55085c847d49d.description: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers health and gains movement speed when moving away from enemy champions.
5a1386408bf55085c847d49d.name: Starcall
5a1386408bf55085c847d49d.tooltip:
Calls down a star from Soraka to a target location. Enemies standing in the explosion radius take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

If Starcall hits a champion Soraka gains Rejuvenation for {{ e5 }} seconds, which restores {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) health per second and grants {{ e9 }}% movement speed when not moving toward enemy champions.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d21a.description: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d21a.name: Thundering Shuriken
5a1385df8bf55085c847d21a.tooltip: Throws a shuriken that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy it hits.

5a89c61b8bf5504e255a002e.description:
Rengar slashes all enemies in an arc before piercing all enemies in a line. Casting this outside the max range moves Rengar a short distance in that direction.

Ferocity effect: deals increased damage.
5a89c61b8bf5504e255a002e.name: Savagery
5a89c61b8bf5504e255a002e.tooltip:
Rengar gains {{ e5 }}% Attack Speed for his next 2 attacks. The first attack deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage.

Ferocity effect:
Savagery's damage is increased to {{ f3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) and grants Rengar {{ f4 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5c5.description: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5c5.name: Ranger's Focus
5a1386448bf55085c847d5c5.tooltip:
Passive: Basic attacks grant Focus for {{ e1 }} seconds, stacking up to {{ e2 }} times. Stacks fall off one at a time, and at {{ e2 }} stacks, Ranger's Focus can be cast, consuming all Focus.

Active: For {{ e3 }} seconds, Ashe gains {{ e4 }}% Attack Speed, and her basic attacks fire a flurry of arrows dealing {{ f1 }} physical damage. During this time, she does not stack Focus. Ranger's Focus applies Frost Shot.

5a1386598bf55085c847d603.description:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
5a1386598bf55085c847d603.name: Burrow / Un-burrow
5a1386598bf55085c847d603.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Burrow into the ground.

Burrowed: Un-burrow, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage and knocking up the closest enemy for {{ e5 }} second. All other nearby enemies will be knocked back. An enemy who has been knocked up will be immune from further Un-burrow effects for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Burrowed Effects: New abilities, +{{ f1 }} Movement Speed, reduced vision range, disabled basic attacks, and gains Tremor Sense: Nearby enemies that move in Fog of War have their position revealed to Rek'Sai and her allies.

5a1386408bf55085c847d48d.description: LeBlanc flings illusionary chains towards a target location. If it hits an enemy unit, it will deal initial magic damage and shackle them. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, the target takes additional magic damage and is unable to move.
5a1386408bf55085c847d48d.name: Ethereal Chains
5a1386408bf55085c847d48d.tooltip:
Launches a chain that shackles the first unit hit to LeBlanc, granting True Sight of the unit and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

If the target remains shackled for {{ e2 }} seconds they are rooted for {{ e2 }} seconds and take an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4b2.description: Akali flourishes her kamas, dealing damage based on her bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power. When Crescent Slash kills a unit, it has a shorter cooldown.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b2.name: Crescent Slash
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b2.tooltip:
Akali flourishes her kamas, slicing enemies for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

If Crescent Slash kills an enemy, its cooldown is refunded by {{ e3 }}%.

5a1386438bf55085c847d55c.description: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health.
5a1386438bf55085c847d55c.name: Blighted Quiver
5a1386438bf55085c847d55c.tooltip:
Varus' basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and apply Blight for {{ e3 }} seconds (stacks {{ e4 }} times).

Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of the target's maximum Health per stack. Max damage vs. monsters: {{ e5 }} per stack.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4fe.description: Rek'Sai dives underground and leaps towards her target, dealing massive damage.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4fe.name: Void Rush
5a1386418bf55085c847d4fe.tooltip:
Passive: Dealing damage to enemy Champions marks them for the next {{ e6 }} seconds.

Active: Rek'Sai lets out a harrowing scream before burrowing underground seeking out a marked target. Moments later she leaps from underground, dealing {{ e8 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage plus {{ e9 }}% of their missing Health.

5a1386438bf55085c847d54c.description:
Hammer Stance: Passive: Restores Mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging nearby enemies for several seconds.

Cannon Stance: Gains a burst of energy, increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks.
5a1386438bf55085c847d54c.name: Lightning Field / Hyper Charge
5a1386438bf55085c847d54c.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e5 }} Mana per strike while in Hammer Stance.

Active: Creates an electric aura dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e2 }} seconds to nearby enemies.

5a67ed3ffc675d08100b1bb0.description: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Reaper Claws</font>, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.
5a67ed3ffc675d08100b1bb0.name: Taste Their Fear
5a67ed3ffc675d08100b1bb0.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If the target is Isolated, the damage is increased by {{ e2 }}% ({{ f1 }}).

Evolved Reaper Claws: Increases the range of Taste Their Fear and Kha'Zix's basic attacks by {{ e3 }}. If target is Isolated, refunds {{ e4 }}% of Taste Their Fear's cooldown.

5a1386438bf55085c847d567.description: Fiora parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if Fiora blocked an immobilizing effect with this ability.
5a1386438bf55085c847d567.name: Riposte
5a1386438bf55085c847d567.tooltip:
Fiora parries all incoming damage, debuffs, and disables for the next {{ e2 }} seconds and then stabs in the target direction.

The stab deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy champion hit and slows their movement and attack speed by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

If Fiora parries an immobilizing effect, Riposte stuns instead of slowing.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4eb.description: Dr. Mundo drains his Health to reduce the duration of disables and deal continual damage to nearby enemies.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4eb.name: Burning Agony
5a1386418bf55085c847d4eb.tooltip:
Toggle: Dr. Mundo sets himself on fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies every second.

While on fire, the duration of disables against Dr. Mundo are reduced by {{ e5 }}%.

5a13865c8bf55085c847d61c.description: Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.
5a13865c8bf55085c847d61c.name: Spinning Axe
5a13865c8bf55085c847d61c.tooltip:
Draven's next attack will deal {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage. The bonus is equal to {{ e5 }} plus {{ e2 }}% of his bonus Attack Damage.

This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe.

Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.

5a1386438bf55085c847d57e.description: Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.
5a1386438bf55085c847d57e.name: Fear Beyond Death
5a1386438bf55085c847d57e.tooltip:
Urgot fires a chem-drill, impaling the first enemy champion hit. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slows for {{ e4 }} seconds by up to {{ e3 }}% based on the victim's missing health.

If the victim falls below {{ e2 }}% health while impaled, Urgot may recast this ability, suppressing the victim and dragging them in for execution. Activates automatically if the target is below {{ e2 }}% at the end of the effect.

When Urgot executes a victim, nearby enemies flee in terror for {{ e0 }} seconds.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4f1.description:
Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion.

Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f1.name: Bastion
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f1.tooltip:
Taric's spells will also cast from a nearby ally protected by Bastion.

Passive: Bastion increases Armor by {{ f1 }} ({{ e1 }}% of Taric's Armor).

Active: Blesses an ally with Bastion and shields them for {{ e2 }}% of their maximum Health for {{ e3 }} seconds. Bastion lasts on the target until a new one is chosen.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d19d.description: Dr. Mundo sacrifices a portion of his Health for increased Movement Speed and drastically increased Health Regeneration.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d19d.name: Sadism
5a1385df8bf55085c847d19d.tooltip: Dr. Mundo regenerates <scaleHealth>{{ f1 }}</scaleHealth> Health ({{ e1 }}% of max health) over {{ e2 }} seconds, and gains {{ e3 }}% movement speed for the duration.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4f9.description: Olaf temporarily becomes immune to disables.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f9.name: Ragnarok
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f9.tooltip:
Passive: Olaf gains {{ e1 }} Armor and {{ e1 }} Magic Resist.

Active: Olaf removes all disables from himself and becomes immune to them for the next {{ e2 }} seconds. Olaf also receives a {{ e5 }}% Movement Speed bonus towards enemy champions for {{ e4 }} second. During this time, Olaf loses the passive portion of Ragnarok and gains {{ e3 }} Attack Damage.

5a89c6d48bf5504e255a0040.description: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned.
5a89c6d48bf5504e255a0040.name: Heroic Charge
5a89c6d48bf5504e255a0040.tooltip: Poppy tackles an enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and carrying them forward. If Poppy carries the target into terrain, the enemy takes {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) additional physical damage and is stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a27461a8bf550482ed63de1.description: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt and damage nearby enemies.
5a27461a8bf550482ed63de1.name: Shield of Durand
5a27461a8bf550482ed63de1.tooltip:
Passive: After not taking damage for {{ e6 }} seconds Galio gains a shield that absorbs {{ f3 }} magic damage.

First Cast: Galio starts to charge, gaining {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }})(+{{ f4 }})% Damage Reduction from Magic Damage and {{ f5 }}% of that amount as Damage Reduction from Physical Damage. While charging, Galio slows himself by {{ e3 }}%.

Second Cast: Galio taunts nearby enemy champions for {{ e4 }} to {{ e7 }} seconds, deals {{ f8 }} (+{{ f9 }}) to {{ f10 }} (+{{ f11 }}) damage, and refreshes the Damage Reduction for {{ e8 }} seconds. Taunt duration, damage, and radius increase with charge time.

Shield of Durand's charge cannot be interrupted by crowd control.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1a3.description: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1a3.name: Rewind
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1a3.tooltip: Reduces Zilean's other basic spell cooldowns by {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a13865b8bf55085c847d611.description: Reveals a healing shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after healing the first ally that touches it.
5a13865b8bf55085c847d611.name: Caretaker's Shrine
5a13865b8bf55085c847d611.tooltip:
Bard raises a health shrine that immediately offers {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health, but restores up to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health as it gathers power for 10 seconds. The shrine's effect also grants {{ e1 }}% decaying movement speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Bard can have up to {{ e3 }} shrines active at once, which remain until visited by an ally champion or crushed by an enemy champion.

Active Shrines: {{ f1 }} / {{ f2 }}

5a1386408bf55085c847d4a1.description: Shaco creates a hidden animated Jack-in-the-Box. When triggered, it will fear and attack nearby enemies.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4a1.name: Jack In The Box
5a1386408bf55085c847d4a1.tooltip:
Shaco creates a Jack in the Box that hides from view after {{ e5 }} seconds. It pops out when an enemy comes near or when uncovered by a ward or trinket, making nearby enemies flee very slowly for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Its attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. It lasts for {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) seconds while hidden or 5 seconds while firing.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d424.description: Increases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d424.name: Tentacle Smash
5a13863f8bf55085c847d424.tooltip:
Passive: Slam damage is increased by {{ e6 }}% ({{ f1 }}).

Active: Illaoi swings her idol, causing a Tentacle to Slam forward.

5a1386428bf55085c847d535.description: Pantheon composes himself then leaps into the air to a target, striking all enemy units in an area. Enemies closer to the impact point take more damage.
5a1386428bf55085c847d535.name: Grand Skyfall
5a1386428bf55085c847d535.tooltip:
Pantheon gathers his strength and then leaps high into the air, crashing down at target area a few seconds later. Deals up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies at the center (down to {{ e6 }}% at the edge) and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% for 1 second.

If Pantheon cancels this channel, Grand Skyfall is put on a {{ e5 }} second cooldown.

5a1386438bf55085c847d57f.description: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Movement Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Movement Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.
5a1386438bf55085c847d57f.name: Move Quick
5a1386438bf55085c847d57f.tooltip:
Passive: Teemo's Movement Speed is increased by {{ e1 }}% unless he has been damaged by an enemy champion or turret in the last 5 seconds.

Active: Teemo sprints, gaining twice his normal bonus for {{ e2 }} seconds. This bonus is not lost when struck.

5a1386428bf55085c847d508.description:
Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.

Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.
5a1386428bf55085c847d508.name: Inner Flame
5a1386428bf55085c847d508.tooltip:
Fires a blast of energy that explodes upon enemy contact, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Mantra Bonus - Soulflare: Deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional magic damage and leaves a circle of flame that slows enemies by {{ f3 }}%. After 1.5 seconds the circle erupts, dealing {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4a3.description: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets).  Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4a3.name: Hallucinate
5a1386408bf55085c847d4a3.tooltip:
Shaco vanishes briefly and reappears with a clone. The clone lasts up to 18 seconds and detonates when it dies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes.

  • Mini boxes deal {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage, make enemies flee for {{ e7 }} second(s), and trigger together.

    Clone deals {{ e8 }}% of Shaco's damage and receives {{ e2 }}% increased damage.

    • The clone can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

5a1386428bf55085c847d52e.description:
Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him Movement Speed.

Mega Gnar is too enraged to be hyper and instead can rear up on his hind legs and smash down on the area in front of him, stunning enemies in an area.
5a1386428bf55085c847d52e.name: Hyper / Wallop
5a1386428bf55085c847d52e.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Passive: Every 3rd attack or spell on the same target deals an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) + {{ e2 }}% of the target's max Health as magic damage and grants Gnar {{ f1 }}% Movement Speed that decays over 3 seconds (max {{ e4 }} damage vs. monsters).

Mega Gnar: Stuns enemies in an area for {{ e5 }} seconds, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage.

Gnar gains Hyper's Movement Speed bonus when he leaves Mega form.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5bd.description: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5bd.name: Spray and Pray
5a1386448bf55085c847d5bd.tooltip:
For {{ e2 }} seconds Twitch gains {{ e5 }} Attack Range and {{ e1 }} Bonus Attack Damage.

For the duration, his basic attacks become piercing bolts that deal {{ e3 }}% less damage to subsequent targets, down to a minimum of {{ e4 }}% damage.

Stealth - Camouflage: Activating Spray and Pray does not end Camouflage.

5a13865d8bf55085c847d622.description: While toggled on Aatrox deals bonus damage and fills a portion of his Blood Well every third subsequent attack. While toggled off Aatrox restores Health every third subsequent attack.
5a13865d8bf55085c847d622.name: Blood Thirst / Blood Price
5a13865d8bf55085c847d622.tooltip:
Toggle Off: Blood Thirst: Every third attack, Aatrox restores {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1*100 }}% Missing Health) Health.

Toggle On: Blood Price: Every third attack, Aatrox deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus physical damage and fills up 20% of the Blood Well.

5a1386428bf55085c847d53c.description: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor (this amount is tripled while Granite Shield is active).
5a1386428bf55085c847d53c.name: Brutal Strikes
5a1386428bf55085c847d53c.tooltip:
Passive: Malphite's armor is increased by {{ e1 }}% ({{ f1 }}). While Granite Shield is active, this bonus is tripled to {{ f4.0 }}% ({{ f3 }}).

Active: Basic attacks deal an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the target and nearby enemies. Lasts {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a1386438bf55085c847d576.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.
5a1386438bf55085c847d576.name: Tantrum
5a1386438bf55085c847d576.tooltip:
Passive: Amumu takes {{ e1 }} reduced damage from physical attacks.

Active: Amumu tantrums, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding units.

Basic attacks that hit Amumu reduce the cooldown of Tantrum by 0.5 seconds.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5c6.description: Ashe fires 9 arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5c6.name: Volley
5a1386448bf55085c847d5c6.tooltip:
Fires arrows in a cone, each dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Enemies can block multiple arrows, but only take damage from the first.

Champion hits count as Critical Strikes for the purposes of Frost Shot.

5a1386568bf55085c847d5e0.description: Zed and his shadow spin their blades, creating a burst of shadow energy.  The shadow's spin slows.
5a1386568bf55085c847d5e0.name: Shadow Slash
5a1386568bf55085c847d5e0.tooltip:
Zed and his shadows slash, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies.

Each enemy champion hit by Zed's slash reduces Living Shadow's cooldown by {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies hit by a Shadow's slash are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies hit by multiple slashes take no additional damage but are slowed by {{ e3 }}% instead.

5a1386578bf55085c847d5e9.description: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e9.name: Noxian Diplomacy
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e9.tooltip:
Talon leaps to target and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If cast from melee range, Talon does not leap but instead critically strikes, dealing {{ f2 }}% damage ({{ f3 }}).

When Noxian Diplomacy kills a unit, Talon regains {{ f4 }} health and refunds {{ e5 }}% of its cooldown.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d43b.description: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Movement Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Movement Speed on their next attack.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d43b.name: Song of Celerity
5a13863f8bf55085c847d43b.tooltip:
Active: Grants Sona {{ f1*100 }}% movement speed [{{ e1 }}% + {{ f2*100 }}% per 100 ability power] for {{ e9 }} seconds (or until damaged) and changes her Power Chord bonus to Tempo.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ e3 }} seconds. Allied champions that enter the aura will gain {{ f3*100 }}% movement speed for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Sona's personal movement speed increase will always last at least {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a1386438bf55085c847d586.description: Jhin brandishes his cane, firing a single shot with incredible range. It pierces through minions and monsters, but stops on the first champion hit. If the target was recently struck by Jhin's allies, lotus traps, or basic attacks, they are rooted.
5a1386438bf55085c847d586.name: Deadly Flourish
5a1386438bf55085c847d586.tooltip:
Jhin fires a long range shot that stops on the first champion hit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to it, and {{ e4 }}% of that damage to minions and monsters hit along the way.

If Deadly Flourish strikes a champion that has been hit by one of Jhin's basic attacks, Lotus Traps, or allies within the last 4 seconds it will root them for {{ e2 }} seconds and grants Jhin movement speed as though he had crit them.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4d5.description: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d5.name: The Culling
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d5.tooltip:
Lucian moves freely while firing rapidly in a single direction for {{ e1 }} seconds. His shots collide with the first enemy they hit and each do {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage. The Culling does {{ e8 }}% damage to minions.

Lucian may use Relentless Pursuit during The Culling.

Reactivate The Culling to cancel early.

5a13865a8bf55085c847d607.description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit.
5a13865a8bf55085c847d607.name: Arcane Shift
5a13865a8bf55085c847d607.tooltip: Ezreal teleports to a nearby location and fires a bolt at the nearest enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

5a13865a8bf55085c847d60e.description:
Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration.

Ferocity effect: roots the target.
5a13865a8bf55085c847d60e.name: Bola Strike
5a13865a8bf55085c847d60e.tooltip:
Throw a bola, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing the first enemy hit by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Ferocity effect:
Deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and roots the target for {{ e4 }} seconds.

5a8239c18bf550fb743b9a79.description: Swain opens a demon eye that deals damage and slows enemies. Champions hit are revealed and also grant Swain a Soul Fragment.
5a8239c18bf550fb743b9a79.name: Vision of Empire
5a8239c18bf550fb743b9a79.tooltip:
Swain opens a demon eye up to {{ castrange }} range away that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slows for {{ e4 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Champions hit grant Swain a Soul Fragment and are revealed for {{ e9 }} seconds.

Damage is reduced by {{ e6 }}% against minions.

5a1386568bf55085c847d5e2.description: Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemies upon landing.
5a1386568bf55085c847d5e2.name: Hookshot
5a1386568bf55085c847d5e2.tooltip:
