First Cast: Fire a hookshot that attaches to terrain, pulling Camille to it and allowing Hookshot to be recast for 1 second.

Second Cast: Camille leaps from the wall, colliding with the first enemy champion hit. Upon landing, she deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and a {{ e1 }} second stun to nearby enemies. Dashes towards enemy champions travel twice as far and grant {{ e2 }}% attack speed for {{ e5 }} seconds on impact.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4e2.description: Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to stop enemy dashes around her and gain movement speed.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e2.name: Steadfast Presence
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e2.tooltip:
Passive: Poppy gains {{ f1 }} Armor and {{ f2 }} Magic Resist ({{ e3 }}% of Armor and Magic Resist). This bonus is doubled if Poppy is below 40% Health.

Active: For the next {{ e1 }} seconds, Poppy gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed. While Steadfast Presence is active, she stops enemy dashes in an area around her, dealing {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5a7.description: Orianna commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the Ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5a7.name: Command: Protect
5a1386448bf55085c847d5a7.tooltip:
Passive: The Ball adds {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist to the allied champion it is attached to.

Active: Orianna commands her Ball to travel to and attach onto an allied champion, shielding them for {{ e5 }} seconds from the next {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Enemies the Ball passes through along the way are damaged for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1b2.description: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies and tossing them into the air.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1b2.name: Pulverize
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1b2.tooltip: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and tossing nearby enemy units into the air for {{ e3 }} second.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d448.description: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits. An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d448.name: Glitterlance
5a13863f8bf55085c847d448.tooltip:
Lulu and Pix each fire a piercing bolt dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy hit and {{ f4 }} (+{{ f5 }}) to all additional enemies. Enemies hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}%, decaying over the next {{ e3 }} second(s).

An enemy can only be damaged for up to a total of {{ f6 }} damage per cast.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d465.description: Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Movement Speed of enemies.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d465.name: Force of Will
5a13863f8bf55085c847d465.tooltip:
First Cast: Grabs target Dark Sphere or enemy minion. If no target is selected, grabs nearest Dark Sphere.

Second Cast: Throws the grabbed unit. Enemies hit take {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ f2 }} seconds.

This spell can be cast while moving.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1cc.description: After a brief delay Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, stunning enemies who pass through the perimeter.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1cc.name: Event Horizon
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1cc.tooltip: After a {{ e2 }} second delay, Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, forming a pentagon of walls. Enemies who attempt to pass through the perimeter are stopped and stunned for {{ e1 }} seconds.

5a67ec62fc675d08100b1baa.description: A skillshot basic attack. After two successful Steel Tempests, the next fires a tornado that knocks enemies Airborne.
5a67ec62fc675d08100b1baa.name: Steel Tempest
5a67ec62fc675d08100b1baa.tooltip:
Thrusts forward, dealing {{ f2.0 }} (+{{ f3.0 }}) physical damage.

On hit, Steel Tempest grants a stack of Gathering Storm for 6 seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne.

Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack: It can critically strike, applies on-hit effects, is interruptible by crowd control and its cooldown and cast time are reduced by Attack Speed.

If cast while dashing, Steel Tempest will strike as a circle.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5a1.description: Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him in a set of three explosions. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5a1.name: Riptide
5a1386448bf55085c847d5a1.tooltip:
Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him. Each explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. This slow diminishes over time.

A unit can be hit by more than one explosion, but they take {{ e3 }}% less damage from additional explosions.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1a5.description: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1a5.name: Chronoshift
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1a5.tooltip: Zilean marks himself or an allied champion with a protective time rune for {{ e2 }} seconds. If the target would take lethal damage, they are instead transported back in time, arriving with {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d42c.description: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d42c.name: Assault and Battery
5a13863f8bf55085c847d42c.tooltip:
Targets an enemy champion and chases it down, knocking it up for 1.25 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

While charging, Vi cannot be stopped and has True Sight of the target. Any enemies in the way are knocked aside and dealt 75% of the damage.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1cf.description: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1cf.name: Empower
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1cf.tooltip: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next basic attack or Leap Strike to deal an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage.

5a8239e48bf550fb743b9a7e.description:
Viktor blasts an enemy unit dealing magic damage, gaining a shield and empowering his next basic attack.

Augment: Siphon Power's shield is increased by 60% and Viktor gains bonus Movement Speed after casting.
5a8239e48bf550fb743b9a7e.name: Siphon Power
5a8239e48bf550fb743b9a7e.tooltip:
Viktor blasts an enemy unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage while granting Viktor a shield that absorbs up to {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) damage over the next {{ e2 }} seconds.

Viktor's next basic attack deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus magic damage.

Augment - Turbocharge: Siphon Power's shield is increased by 60% and Viktor gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a1386438bf55085c847d585.description: Jhin launches a magical cartridge at an enemy. It can hit up to four targets and gains damage each time it kills.
5a1386438bf55085c847d585.name: Dancing Grenade
5a1386438bf55085c847d585.tooltip:
Jhin launches a cartridge at the targeted enemy that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage before bouncing to a nearby target that has not yet been hit.

The cartridge can hit a maximum of 4 times. Each kill by the cartridge increases the damage of subsequent hits by {{ e2 }}%.

5a1386428bf55085c847d52d.description:
Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced.

Mega Gnar instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown.
5a1386428bf55085c847d52d.name: Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss
5a1386428bf55085c847d52d.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Throws a boomerang that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slows enemies by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. The boomerang returns towards Gnar after hitting an enemy, dealing {{ e7 }}% damage to subsequent targets. Each enemy can only be hit once. Catching the boomerang reduces its cooldown by {{ f1 }}%.

Mega Gnar: Throws a boulder that stops when it hits an enemy, slowing all nearby enemies and dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage. Picking up the boulder reduces its cooldown by {{ e6 }}%.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d24b.description: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d24b.name: Ring of Frost
5a1385df8bf55085c847d24b.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and roots them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a13865a8bf55085c847d606.description: Jax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly counterattack, stunning all surrounding enemies.
5a13865a8bf55085c847d606.name: Counter Strike
5a13865a8bf55085c847d606.tooltip:
Jax enters a defensive stance for up to {{ e6 }} seconds, dodging all incoming basic attacks and taking {{ e3 }}% less damage from area of effect abilities.

After 2 seconds or if activated again, Jax stuns surrounding enemies for {{ e2 }} second and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to them.

Counter Strike deals {{ e5 }}% more damage for each attack Jax dodged (max: {{ e4 }}% increased damage).

5a1386418bf55085c847d4d6.description: Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned.</font>
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d6.name: Decimating Smash
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d6.tooltip:
Sion charges up a heavy blow for up to 2 seconds. When released, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to enemies hit ({{ e8 }}% damage to minions) and briefly slows them.

If Sion charges for at least 1 second, enemies are knocked up and stunned for 1.25 to 2.25 seconds.

5a89c63c8bf5504e255a0030.description: A wisp of wind strikes an enemy unit and then bounces to nearby enemy units, dealing damage and silencing the victims.
5a89c63c8bf5504e255a0030.name: Dark Wind
5a89c63c8bf5504e255a0030.tooltip:
Unleashes a Crow at the targeted enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage before bouncing to another target. Units struck are also silenced for {{ e2 }} seconds the first time per cast.

Dark Wind can strike up to {{ e3 }} times and will prioritize enemies being Drained or ones it has not yet hit. Deals {{ e4 }}% damage to monsters.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1fd.description: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1fd.name: Dominus
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1fd.tooltip: Renekton surrounds himself with dark energies for {{ e5 }} seconds, gaining {{ e1 }} Health and {{ e6 }} Fury. While active, he deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and gains {{ e4 }} Fury per second.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d16f.description:
Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d16f.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy
5a1385de8bf55085c847d16f.tooltip: Summons a venom-gorged Spiderling that moves to target location and explodes, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage when it nears an enemy or after 3 seconds.

5a1386408bf55085c847d487.description: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Daisy will send out a shockwave if she attacks the same champion three times in a row.
5a1386408bf55085c847d487.name: Daisy!
5a1386408bf55085c847d487.tooltip:
Ivern summons his sentinel friend Daisy for {{ f6 }} seconds. If Daisy attacks the same champion three times in a row, she will create a shockwave knocking enemies up for 1 second (3s cooldown). Daisy has:
  • Health: {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})
    Armor and Magic Resist: {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }})
    Attack Damage: {{ f4 }} (+{{ f3 }})

    • Recast to manually issue orders to Daisy.

5a1386428bf55085c847d516.description: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to nearby enemies and slowing them. Turrets take double damage from Tremors.
5a1386428bf55085c847d516.name: Tremors
5a1386428bf55085c847d516.tooltip:
Shake the earth for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds, stacking up to {{ e6 }} times.

Tremors deals {{ e5 }}% damage to turrets.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d445.description: Katarina throws a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d445.name: Bouncing Blade
5a13863f8bf55085c847d445.tooltip:
Katarina throws a Dagger, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the target and {{ e4 }} nearby enemies. The dagger then ricochets onto the ground behind the primary target.

The dagger always lands 350 units on the opposite side from where it struck the first target, getting there in the same amount of time regardless of how many times it bounces.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4f8.description: Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f8.name: Reckless Swing
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f8.tooltip:
Olaf ferociously swings his axes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) true damage to his target. This ability's cost is equal to {{ e2 }}% of the total damage dealt, but the cost is refunded if it kills the target.

Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Reckless Swing by 1 second.

5a89c6e28bf5504e255a0041.description: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.
5a89c6e28bf5504e255a0041.name: Powder Keg
5a89c6e28bf5504e255a0041.tooltip:
Places a powder keg that can be attacked by Gangplank or his enemies at a location for {{ e5 }} seconds.

If Gangplank destroys a keg, it explodes dealing the attack's damage as physical damage (ignores {{ e0 }}% Armor) to enemies and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Champions take {{ e3 }} bonus physical damage from the explosion.

When a keg explodes, other kegs with overlapping blast zones chain explode (damage does not stack).

Kegs health decays every {{ f5 }} seconds. (Decay rate increases at level 7 and 13)

Keg explosions apply Parrrley's plunder effect.

5a89c6f18bf5504e255a0043.description: Ornn advances, breathing fire and shielding himself. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.
5a89c6f18bf5504e255a0043.name: Bellows Breath
5a89c6f18bf5504e255a0043.tooltip:
Ornn stomps forwards, breathing fire and shielding himself for {{ f5 }} (12% max health) for {{ e5 }} seconds. The fire deals up to {{ e0 }}% of the enemy's max health as magic damage (minimum {{ e3 }}).

Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle for {{ f9 }} seconds. The next immobilizing effect against a Brittle enemy has its duration increased by 30% and deals {{ f8 }}% of their max health as magic damage.

Ornn's basic attacks knock back Brittle targets.

5a8239d58bf550fb743b9a7c.description: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.
5a8239d58bf550fb743b9a7c.name: Bloodlust
5a8239d58bf550fb743b9a7c.tooltip:
Passive: Tryndamere thirsts for blood, gaining {{ e1 }} Attack Damage plus {{ e2 }} per 1% Health missing.

Active: Tryndamere consumes his Fury, restoring {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health, plus {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) Health per Fury consumed.

5a1386438bf55085c847d587.description:
Jhin places an invisible lotus trap that blooms when walked over. It slows nearby enemies before dealing damage with an explosion of serrated petals.

Beauty in Death - When Jhin kills an enemy champion, a lotus trap will bloom near their corpse.
5a1386438bf55085c847d587.name: Captive Audience
5a1386438bf55085c847d587.tooltip:
Jhin places an invisible Lotus Trap that lasts {{ e5 }} minutes and activates when stepped on, revealing nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

The trap leaves behind a zone that slows enemies inside by {{ e7 }}% and detonates after 2 seconds, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage ({{ e1 }}% damage on subsequent hits and vs. minions and monsters).

Jhin prepares a new trap every {{ f1 }} seconds and can store 2 at once.

Beauty in Death - When Jhin kills an enemy champion a Lotus Trap will spawn and detonate where they were killed.

5a384f858bf55044c7f6084b.description: Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana.
5a384f858bf55044c7f6084b.name: Twin Fang
5a384f858bf55044c7f6084b.tooltip:
Deal {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to a target. If the target is killed by Twin Fang, or is killed during its flight, Cassiopeia gains {{ cost }} Mana.

If the victim is Poisoned when Twin Fang hits, it takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional magic damage and Cassiopeia heals for {{ f4 }} (+{{ f2 }}).

5a13865d8bf55085c847d61f.description: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.
5a13865d8bf55085c847d61f.name: Phosphorus Bomb
5a13865d8bf55085c847d61f.tooltip: Corki lobs a bomb, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the target area. In addition, the blast reveals the area and champions hit by the blast for {{ e2 }} seconds (does not reveal stealth).

5a1386418bf55085c847d4f2.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f2.name: Flamespitter
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f2.tooltip:
Rumble torches his opponents, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a cone over {{ e9 }} seconds. This spell deals {{ e4 }}% damage to minions.

Danger Zone Bonus: Deals {{ e5 }}% damage.

5a1386448bf55085c847d589.description: Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful.
5a1386448bf55085c847d589.name: Shroud of Darkness
5a1386448bf55085c847d589.tooltip:
Passive: Nocturne gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: Nocturne creates a magical barrier for 1.5 seconds, which blocks the next enemy ability.

If an ability is blocked by the shield, Nocturne's passive Attack Speed bonus doubles for 5 seconds.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5b6.description: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b6.name: Sapling Toss
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b6.tooltip:
Maokai flings a sapling, which stands watch for {{ f1 }} seconds. Saplings will chase nearby enemies, detonating on proximity, dealing {{ e1 }} +{{ e8 }}% [+{{ a1 }}%] Target Max Health magic damage and slowing enemies struck by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Saplings placed in brush last for {{ f2 }} seconds and cause a larger explosion, dealing double damage over {{ e6 }} seconds to all enemies hit.

Maximum {{ e4 }} Damage to non-Champions, doubled for brush.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d296.description: Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d296.name: Timewinder
5a1385df8bf55085c847d296.tooltip: Ekko throws a device that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies it passes through. It expands into a slowing field on the first champion hit, slowing everything inside by {{ e2 }}%. It then returns to him after a delay, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to all targets hit upon return.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0d3.description: Katarina gains a burst of movement speed, tossing a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> into the air directly above herself.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0d3.name: Preparation
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0d3.tooltip: Katarina tosses a Dagger into the air and gains {{ e4 }}% decaying movement speed over {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5ba.description: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5ba.name: Lamb's Respite
5a1386448bf55085c847d5ba.tooltip:
Lamb blesses the ground underneath her for {{ e2 }} seconds, creating an area in which no living things, ally or enemy, can die. Upon reaching 10% Health, units become immune to further damage or healing.

When the blessing ends all living things inside heal for {{ e1 }}.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4ef.description: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4ef.name: Time Bomb
5a1386418bf55085c847d4ef.tooltip:
Zilean tosses a time-delayed bomb to a location. The bomb sticks to the first unit which comes within a small area around it (prioritizes Champions). After {{ e2 }} seconds it detonates, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all surrounding enemies.

Placing two bombs on a unit detonates the first bomb early, stunning all enemies in the blast for {{ e4 }} seconds.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d262.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d262.name: Wild Cards
5a1385df8bf55085c847d262.tooltip: Throws three cards that deal {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> Magic Damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d24a.description: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Movement Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d24a.name: Ice Shard
5a1385df8bf55085c847d24a.tooltip: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Shards then pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d25a.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d25a.name: Bandage Toss
5a1385df8bf55085c847d25a.tooltip: Launches a bandage in a direction. If it hits an enemy unit, Amumu pulls himself to them, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning for {{ e2 }} second.

5a1386578bf55085c847d5e6.description: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e6.name: Violent Tendencies
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e6.tooltip:
Passive: When Kled basic attacks, he frenzies, gaining {{ e2 }}% attack speed for four attacks or {{ e6 }} seconds. Violent Tendencies then goes on cooldown.

The fourth hit deals bonus physical damage equal to {{ e4 }} plus {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) of the target's maximum health (maximum {{ e7 }} vs monsters).

5a1386438bf55085c847d582.description: Dashes through a unit, dealing escalating Magic Damage with each cast.
5a1386438bf55085c847d582.name: Sweeping Blade
5a1386438bf55085c847d582.tooltip:
Dashes through target enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f3 }}) Magic Damage. Each cast increases your next dash's base Damage by 25%, up to {{ e6 }}%.

Cannot be re-cast on the same enemy for {{ e2 }} seconds.

If cast while dashing, Steel Tempest will strike as a circle.

5a1386438bf55085c847d551.description: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
5a1386438bf55085c847d551.name: Bushwhack / Pounce
5a1386438bf55085c847d551.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee places an invisible trap that lasts for 2 minutes. The trap triggers when an enemy walks over it, revealing the victim and bleeding them for {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds.

{{ f4 }} traps may be active at once. (Maximum traps increases at level 6, 11 and 16)

Cougar: Nidalee lunges in target direction, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

5a1386648bf55085c847d625.description: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.
5a1386648bf55085c847d625.name: Aria of Perseverance
5a1386648bf55085c847d625.tooltip:
Active: Restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health to Sona and a nearby allied champion (prioritizes most wounded) and changes her Power Chord bonus to Diminuendo.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ e3 }} seconds. Allied champions that enter the aura will gain a shield that prevents up to {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage within the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a1386428bf55085c847d520.description: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.
5a1386428bf55085c847d520.name: Elastic Slingshot
5a1386428bf55085c847d520.tooltip:
First cast: Zac faces the cursor and charges up over {{ e4 }} seconds.

Second cast: Launches Zac towards a location, knocking up nearby enemies for {{ f2 }} to {{ f3 }} seconds (based on charge time) and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Zac spawns extra chunks of Goo for each enemy champion hit.

Can be cancelled by moving, refunding half of the ability's cooldown and cost.

5a89c63c8bf5504e255a0031.description: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.
5a89c63c8bf5504e255a0031.name: Crowstorm
5a89c63c8bf5504e255a0031.tooltip:
Fiddlesticks channels for {{ e3 }} seconds, then blinks to the target point unleashing a murder of crows that flock wildly around him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to all enemy units in the area.

The effect lasts for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing up to {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) total magic damage.

5a13865a8bf55085c847d60b.description: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing damage.
5a13865a8bf55085c847d60b.name: Spear Shot
5a13865a8bf55085c847d60b.tooltip: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing {{ e2 }} <scaleAD>(+{{ f1 }})</scaleAD> physical damage.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d168.description: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d168.name: Primal Howl
5a1385de8bf55085c847d168.tooltip: Warwick gains {{ e1 }}% damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end of the duration, or if activated again, Warwick howls, causing all nearby enemies to flee for {{ e3 }} second.

5a1386408bf55085c847d485.description: In brush, Ivern's attacks are ranged and deal bonus magic damage. Ivern can activate this ability to create a patch of brush.
5a1386408bf55085c847d485.name: Brushmaker
5a1386408bf55085c847d485.tooltip:
Passive: In brush, Ivern's attacks are ranged and deal {{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }}) bonus magic damage.

Active: Ivern grows a patch of brush for {{ e1 }} seconds. For 3 seconds the area in and around the brush is revealed.

5a1386448bf55085c847d58b.description: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion.
5a1386448bf55085c847d58b.name: Paranoia
5a1386448bf55085c847d58b.tooltip:
Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision for 4 seconds.

While Paranoia is active, Nocturne can launch himself at an enemy champion, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

5a1386428bf55085c847d50a.description:
Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Movement Speed of the protected ally.

Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.
5a1386428bf55085c847d50a.name: Inspire
5a1386428bf55085c847d50a.tooltip:
Target ally gains a shield, granting {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds and absorbing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Mantra Bonus - Defiance: The shield overflows with energy, absorbing an additional {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage. Nearby allied champions gain shields that absorb {{ f2 }}% as much as the initial target's shield. All champions shielded gain {{ f3 }}% movement speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d157.description: Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d157.name: Crystallize
5a1385de8bf55085c847d157.tooltip: Anivia summons an impassable wall of ice {{ e2 }} units wide, blocking all movement. The wall lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds before it melts.

5a1386438bf55085c847d565.description: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing.
5a1386438bf55085c847d565.name: Hexplosive Minefield
5a1386438bf55085c847d565.tooltip:
Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Enemies hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies triggering a mine take {{ e5 }}% damage from additional mines. Mines disarm automatically after {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a1386408bf55085c847d472.description: Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing the target's Movement Speed. Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range away from the target.
5a1386408bf55085c847d472.name: Vault
5a1386408bf55085c847d472.tooltip:
Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage while Valor marks it as Vulnerable.

Upon reaching the target, Quinn leaps off, briefly displacing and slowing it by {{ e1 }}% (diminishing over {{ e3 }} seconds).

5a1386438bf55085c847d578.description:
Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions.

If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.
5a1386438bf55085c847d578.name: Malefic Visions
5a1386438bf55085c847d578.tooltip:
Deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to an enemy target over {{ e3 }} seconds. Applying Call of the Void or Nether Grasp to the victim during this time refreshes the visions.

If the victim is killed, Malzahar gains {{ f1 }} Mana ({{ e5 }}% of max mana) and the visions spread to the nearest enemy.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0d9.description: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0d9.name: Wild Growth
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0d9.tooltip: Lulu enlarges her ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air. For {{ e4 }} seconds, her ally gains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus health and slows nearby enemies by {{ e2 }}%.

5a1386428bf55085c847d510.description: Every third consecutive attack deals additional Magic Damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.
5a1386428bf55085c847d510.name: Grandmaster's Might
5a1386428bf55085c847d510.tooltip:
Passive: Every third consecutive strike Jax deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) additional Magic Damage.

Active: Jax strengthens his resolve, granting him {{ f2 }} Armor and {{ f1 }} Magic Resist for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Armor bonus is equal to {{ e3 }} + {{ e6 }}% bonus Attack Damage.
Magic Resist bonus is equal to {{ e3 }} + {{ e7 }}% Ability Power.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5bc.description: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5bc.name: Venom Cask
5a1386448bf55085c847d5bc.tooltip:
Twitch hurls a cask that adds a stack of Deadly Venom to all enemies struck and leaves behind a toxic cloud that persists for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Enemies that remain within the cloud have {{ e2 }}% reduced Movement Speed and receive an additional stack of Deadly Venom each second.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4c6.description: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c6.name: Featherstorm
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c6.tooltip:
Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable. She then rains down daggers which deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and leave behind a line of Feathers.

Xayah can move while in the air.

5a1386408bf55085c847d480.description: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.
5a1386408bf55085c847d480.name: Eye Of The Storm
5a1386408bf55085c847d480.tooltip: Shields an allied Champion or turret for {{ e3 }} seconds. The shield absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage and grants {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Attack Damage until it breaks.

5a1386598bf55085c847d5fb.description:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple for the next 3 seconds.
Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.
5a1386598bf55085c847d5fb.name: Tempest / Cripple
5a1386598bf55085c847d5fb.tooltip:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast Cripple for the next {{ e6 }} seconds.

Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies struck by Tempest for {{ e5 }} seconds, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.

5a1386578bf55085c847d5e5.description:
Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled.

When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e5.name: Bear Trap on a Rope
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e5.tooltip:
Kled throws a bear trap that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and hooks onto the first enemy champion or large monster hit, granting True Sight. Deals 150% damage to minions passed through.

If Kled stays near a hooked enemy for {{ e3 }} seconds, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ charbonusphysical*2 }}) physical damage, yanks the enemy toward him, and slows the enemy by {{ e5 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

Dismounted: Becomes Pocket Pistol, a ranged ability that restores courage.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d456.description: Vladimir pays his own health to charge up a reservoir of blood which, when released, deals damage in the area around him but can be blocked by enemy units.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d456.name: Tides of Blood
5a13863f8bf55085c847d456.tooltip:
First Cast: Vladimir charges up a reservoir of blood, spending up to {{ e2 }}% of his max Health ({{ f3 }}) to increase this spell's damage. While at full charge, Vladimir is slowed.

Second Cast: Vladimir unleashes a nova of blood at surrounding enemies which deals between {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) and {{ e0 }} (+{{ f4 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and, at full charge, briefly slows by {{ e9 }}%. Targets hit block a portion of the nova.

Tides of Blood will release automatically if held for more than {{ e7 }} seconds.

5a89c65e8bf5504e255a0036.description:
Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further.

Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him.
5a89c65e8bf5504e255a0036.name: Hop / Crunch
5a89c65e8bf5504e255a0036.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Leaps to a location, gaining {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. If Gnar lands on a unit he will bounce off it, traveling further. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [6% of Gnar's Max Health] physical damage and slows briefly if the unit landed on was an enemy.

Mega Gnar: Leaps to a location and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [6% of Gnar's Max Health] physical damage to nearby enemies on landing. Enemies Gnar lands directly on top of are slowed briefly.

If Crunch is used to transform, Gnar will still be able to bounce.

5a1386438bf55085c847d54e.description: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.
5a1386438bf55085c847d54e.name: Rocket Jump
5a1386438bf55085c847d54e.tooltip:
Tristana launches herself to target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and slowing surrounding enemies by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Kills, Assists, and max stack Explosive Charge detonations on Champions reset Rocket Jump's cooldown.

5a1386448bf55085c847d591.description: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge Movement Speed for a period of time. Additionally passively grants Sivir bonus Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.
5a1386448bf55085c847d591.name: On The Hunt
5a1386448bf55085c847d591.tooltip:
Passive: Sivir gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.

Active: Sivir rallies her allies for {{ e3 }} seconds, granting all nearby allies an initial {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed bonus that reduces to {{ e2 }}% after the first {{ e5 }} seconds of On The Hunt elapse.

5a1386428bf55085c847d51c.description: Wukong becomes Invisible for a short duration, leaving behind a decoy that will deal Magic Damage to enemies near it when Wukong's stealth expires.
5a1386428bf55085c847d51c.name: Decoy
5a1386428bf55085c847d51c.tooltip:
Wukong becomes Invisible for {{ e2 }} seconds, leaving behind a decoy that will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to enemies near it after {{ e2 }} seconds.

Stealth - Invisible: Wukong can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d431.description: Latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions, dealing initial damage to them and slowing their Movement Speed, and then echoing the pain a few seconds later and stunning them if they remain close to Morgana.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d431.name: Soul Shackles
5a13863f8bf55085c847d431.tooltip:
Dark chains latch onto nearby enemy Champions dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds, granting True Sight. After {{ e3 }} seconds, they are dealt an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are stunned for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Enemy Champions can break the chains by moving away from Morgana.

5a1386438bf55085c847d561.description: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.
5a1386438bf55085c847d561.name: Prismatic Barrier
5a1386438bf55085c847d561.tooltip:
Throws Lux's wand in target direction protecting her and all allied Champions it touches from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 3 seconds.

Upon reaching its destination it returns to Lux, protecting her and other allied Champions it touches from another {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 3 seconds.

Shielding an ally with the outgoing shield doubles the value of the returning shield.

5a1386438bf55085c847d550.description: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.  As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.
5a1386438bf55085c847d550.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown
5a1386438bf55085c847d550.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee throws her javelin, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. If it exceeds her basic attack range, it gains damage based on distance flown, up to a potential {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) total damage.

Cougar: Nidalee's next attack deals additional damage, greatly increased on low health targets.

5a89c61a8bf5504e255a002c.description: Volibear's repeated attacks grant him additional Attack Speed. Once Volibear has repeatedly attacked three times, he can perform a vicious bite on his target which deals increased damage based on the target's missing Health.
5a89c61a8bf5504e255a002c.name: Frenzy
5a89c61a8bf5504e255a002c.tooltip:
Passive: Volibear gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed with each attack. Stacks up to {{ e2 }} times.

Active: When Volibear has {{ e2 }} stacks of Frenzy, he can bite an enemy to deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }} [{{ e4 }}% of bonus Health]) physical damage, increased by {{ e5 }}% for each {{ e7 }}% Health the target is missing. If Volibear bites a minion or monster, Frenzy's cooldown is reduced by {{ e6 }}%.

5a1386428bf55085c847d53f.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
5a1386428bf55085c847d53f.name: Death Sentence
5a1386428bf55085c847d53f.tooltip:
Thresh throws out his scythe, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, granting True Sight and stunning the first unit hit, pulling them in for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Reactivating this ability will pull Thresh to the bound enemy.

Death Sentence's cooldown is reduced by {{ e4 }} seconds if it hits an enemy.

5a82395c8bf550fb743b9a74.description: Nunu commands the yeti to take a bite out of a target minion or monster, dealing heavy damage to it and healing himself.
5a82395c8bf550fb743b9a74.name: Consume
5a82395c8bf550fb743b9a74.tooltip:
Nunu commands the yeti to take a bite out of a minion or monster, dealing {{ e1 }} true damage and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}).

Passive - Feed The Yeti: For every Large or Epic Monster the yeti bites, Nunu gains {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage on hit, {{ e0 }}% Maximum Health, increased size, and {{ e9 }} out of combat Movement Speed for the next {{ f5 }} seconds (max {{ e6 }} stacks).

Recently Consumed monsters will not grant additional bonuses ({{ e5 }} second cooldown).

5a67edaafc675d08100b1bb6.description: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.
5a67edaafc675d08100b1bb6.name: Nether Grasp
5a67edaafc675d08100b1bb6.tooltip: Malzahar suppresses a target champion for {{ e4 }} seconds, dealing {{ e7 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a2 }})</scaleAP> magic damage over the duration. A zone of negative energy is created around his target for {{ e3 }} seconds, dealing {{ e1 }}% <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }}%)</scaleAP> of nearby enemies max health as magic damage per second.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5c3.description: Mordekaiser deals damage to enemies in a cone in front of him. For each unit hit, Mordekaiser's shield absorbs energy.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5c3.name: Siphon of Destruction
5a1386448bf55085c847d5c3.tooltip:
Mordekaiser deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a cone.

For each Champion hit, he gains {{ e5 }}% maximum shield.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d299.description: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d299.name: Chronobreak
5a1385df8bf55085c847d299.tooltip: Ekko turns back time, going briefly untargetable and invulnerable. He teleports to where he was 4 seconds ago and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies on arrival. Additionally, Ekko heals for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}), increased by {{ e5 }}% for each 1% of his health lost over the last 4 seconds.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d426.description: Illaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a <font color='#669900'>Vessel</font> and begin spawning Tentacles.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d426.name: Test of Spirit
5a13863f8bf55085c847d426.tooltip:
Illaoi pulls the spirit from an enemy champion for {{ e3 }} seconds (reduced when Illaoi is attacked by the target). The spirit can be attacked, with {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f5 }}%) of the damage taken echoing to its owner.

If the spirit dies or the target leaves its range, the target becomes a Vessel for {{ e2 }} seconds and is slowed by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds. Vessels spawn Tentacles every {{ f1 }} seconds if no other Tentacles are nearby.

Tentacles will automatically Slam at spirits and Vessels once every 10 seconds.

5a1386438bf55085c847d55b.description: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.
5a1386438bf55085c847d55b.name: Piercing Arrow
5a1386438bf55085c847d55b.tooltip:
First Cast: Varus starts drawing back his next shot, gradually increasing its range and damage. While preparing to shoot Varus' Movement Speed is slowed by {{ e7 }}%. After {{ e5 }} seconds, Piercing Arrow fails but refunds {{ e4 }}% of its Mana cost.

Second Cast: Varus fires, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage, reduced by {{ e3 }}% per enemy hit (minimum {{ e9 }}%).

Piercing Arrow's cooldown is reduced by {{ f1 }} seconds if the arrow detonates Blight stacks from at least one enemy champion.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5b5.description: Maokai contorts into a mass of moving roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he roots the target.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b5.name: Twisted Advance
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b5.tooltip:
Maokai transforms into a moving mass of roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target.

Upon arrival, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and roots the target for {{ e2 }} second(s).

5a1386598bf55085c847d600.description: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.
5a1386598bf55085c847d600.name: Dazzle
5a1386598bf55085c847d600.tooltip: Readies a beam of starlight that, after {{ e3 }} second, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage and stuns enemies for {{ e2 }} second(s).

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0b6.description: Morgana releases a sphere of dark magic. Upon contact with an enemy unit, the sphere will deal magic damage and force the unit to the ground for a period of time.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0b6.name: Dark Binding
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0b6.tooltip: Fires a bolt of dark energy, rooting the first enemy hit for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

5a89c72a8bf5504e255a0047.description: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.
5a89c72a8bf5504e255a0047.name: Buster Shot
5a89c72a8bf5504e255a0047.tooltip: Tristana fires a massive cannonball at an enemy unit. This deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and knocks surrounding units back {{ e2 }} distance.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d449.description: If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d449.name: Whimsy
5a13863f8bf55085c847d449.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Target ally gains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }})% Movement Speed and {{ e7 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds.

On Enemy Cast: Polymorphs an enemy champion for {{ e3 }} seconds, disabling their ability to attack or cast spells and reducing their base Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}.

5a1386438bf55085c847d573.description: Garen passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a huge burst of Tenacity and damage reduction for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration.
5a1386438bf55085c847d573.name: Courage
5a1386438bf55085c847d573.tooltip:
Passive: Killing units permanently grants {{ f2 }} armor and magic resist, up to a maximum of {{ e2 }}. Current Bonus: {{ f1 }}

Active: Garen steels his courage for {{ e4 }} seconds. For the first {{ e7 }} seconds, he takes {{ e6 }}% less damage and gains {{ e5 }}% Tenacity. For the remaining duration, he takes {{ e3 }}% less damage.

5a1386448bf55085c847d58c.description: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.
5a1386448bf55085c847d58c.name: Winter's Wrath
5a1386448bf55085c847d58c.tooltip:
Sejuani swings her flail, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying Frost to enemies hit and knocking minions and monsters back.

She then lashes out with her flail, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage, applying Frost and slowing enemies hit briefly.

5a1386438bf55085c847d563.description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. If Final Spark kills a champion, part of its cooldown is refunded. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.
5a1386438bf55085c847d563.name: Final Spark
5a1386438bf55085c847d563.tooltip:
Fires a dazzling ray of light dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line. If Final Spark kills an enemy champion, {{ e3 }}% of its cooldown is refunded.

Final Spark ignites and refreshes the Illumination debuff.

5a13865a8bf55085c847d60a.description: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.
5a13865a8bf55085c847d60a.name: Slice and Dice
5a13865a8bf55085c847d60a.tooltip:
Slice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies he passes through. Hitting an enemy grants the ability to use Dice for {{ e8 }} seconds.

Dice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies he passes through.

He generates {{ e4 }} Fury for each non-champion hit and {{ e5 }} Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of {{ e0 }} Fury.

Dice - 50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}). Enemies hit have {{ e2 }}% reduced Armor for {{ e9 }} seconds. No longer generates Fury.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0fd.description: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0fd.name: Subjugate
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0fd.tooltip: Trundle drains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of an enemy champion's maximum Health as Magic Damage and {{ e2 }}% of their Armor and Magic Resist, half immediately and half over {{ e3 }} seconds. The Armor and Magic Resist is returned {{ e3 }} seconds after the drain ends.

5a1386428bf55085c847d540.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
5a1386428bf55085c847d540.name: Dark Passage
5a1386428bf55085c847d540.tooltip:
Thresh throws the Lantern to a target location. If an ally clicks on it Thresh will pull both the Lantern and his ally to him.

The Lantern grants a shield lasting {{ e5 }} seconds that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f6 }}) damage to Thresh and up to one ally if they come near it. The shield amount scales with the number of souls Thresh has collected.

5a1386428bf55085c847d51d.description: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.
5a1386428bf55085c847d51d.name: Cyclone
5a1386428bf55085c847d51d.tooltip:
Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around for 4 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage per second to nearby enemies, knocking them up for {{ e4 }} second the first time they get hit.

At the start, Wukong gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed, and he gains an additional {{ e3 }}% per second over the duration.

5a1386448bf55085c847d58e.description: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.
5a1386448bf55085c847d58e.name: Glacial Prison
5a1386448bf55085c847d58e.tooltip:
Sejuani throws her True Ice bola that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy champion hit and stuns them for {{ e2 }} second.

The bola becomes more powerful as it travels, dealing {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, stunning for {{ e6 }} seconds and creating a storm that slows other enemies by {{ e8 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds, the storm deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slows by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4c9.description:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.
Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 4 seconds, Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c9.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c9.tooltip:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally. If the ally is a champion, Lee Sin shields the ally and himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e3 }} seconds and Safeguard's cooldown is reduced by {{ e6 }}%. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next {{ e9 }} seconds.

Iron Will: Lee Sin gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal and Spell Vamp for {{ e8 }} seconds.

5a38500a8bf55044c7f60852.description: Miss Fortune reveals an area with a flurry of bullets, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.
5a38500a8bf55044c7f60852.name: Make It Rain
5a38500a8bf55044c7f60852.tooltip: Miss Fortune reveals an area, raining down bullets that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 2 seconds and slow enemies hit by {{ e2 }}%.

5a8239c18bf550fb743b9a78.description: Swain unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through targets killed. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by.
5a8239c18bf550fb743b9a78.name: Death's Hand
5a8239c18bf550fb743b9a78.tooltip:
Swain unleashes {{ e5 }} bolts of eldritch power that strike the first enemy they hit and pierce through enemies they kill. Enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, plus {{ e2 }}% per additional bolt. Max Damage: {{ f2 }}.

Each unit killed by Death's Hand restores {{ f1 }} Mana ({{ e4 }}% max mana).

5a1386408bf55085c847d4be.description: Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4be.name: Noxian Guillotine
5a1386408bf55085c847d4be.tooltip:
Leaps to target enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) true damage. For each stack of Hemorrhage on the target, Noxian Guillotine deals an additional {{ e3 }}% damage.

Maximum Damage: {{ f3 }}

If Noxian Guillotine kills the target, it may be re-cast at no cost within 20 seconds.

At rank 3, Noxian Guillotine unlocks - its cooldown resets entirely on kills and it no longer has a Mana cost.

5a13864b8bf55085c847d5d4.description: Phoenix Stance: Activation - Udyr unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after engulfs enemies in front of him with flames.
5a13864b8bf55085c847d5d4.name: Phoenix Stance
5a13864b8bf55085c847d5d4.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after burns enemies in front of him, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Activation: Unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second to nearby enemies for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d113.description: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d113.name: Golden Aegis
5a1385de8bf55085c847d113.tooltip: Grants a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }} [{{ e6 }}% max Health] for each nearby enemy champion) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds, and slows surrounding enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5b8.description: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b8.name: Wolf's Frenzy
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b8.tooltip:
Wolf claims a territory, attacking nearby enemies inside it for {{ e4 }} seconds. Lamb can redirect Wolf to new targets by attacking them. If Lamb leaves Wolf's territory he will cease attacking and join her.

Wolf's attacks deal magic damage equal to {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ f3 }}% of the target's current health.

Wolf attacks faster based on Kindred's attack speed. His attacks maim monsters for {{ e7 }}% increased damage and reduce their attack and movement speed by {{ e8 }}% for 2 seconds.

5a1386448bf55085c847d593.description: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.
5a1386448bf55085c847d593.name: Blade of the Exile
5a1386448bf55085c847d593.tooltip:
Riven's weapon surges with spiritual energy for {{ e4 }} seconds, granting her {{ e5 }}% extra Attack Damage (+{{ f3 }}), increased Range on her damaging spells and attacks, and the ability to use Wind Slash once.

Wind Slash: Riven fires a shockwave that deals from {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to all enemies hit, increasing based on how much Health they are missing.

5a1386408bf55085c847d47c.description: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.
5a1386408bf55085c847d47c.name: Demacian Standard
5a1386408bf55085c847d47c.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e3 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: Throws a Demacian Standard to a nearby area dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies. The Standard lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds and grants surrounding allied champions {{ e3 }}% Attack Speed.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d169.description: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus movement speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d169.name: Infinite Duress
5a1385de8bf55085c847d169.tooltip: Warwick leaps 2.5 seconds worth of movement speed in a direction, suppressing the first champion he collides with for {{ e2 }} seconds. Deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applies on-hit effects 3 times. Warwick heals for 100% of all damage he deals during Infinite Duress.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d248.description: Fiora has increased attack speed for the next two attacks. The first attack slows the target, and the second attack will critically strike.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d248.name: Bladework
5a1385df8bf55085c847d248.tooltip: Fiora gains {{ e4 }}% attack speed for her next two attacks. The first attack cannot critically strike, but will apply a {{ e3 }}% slow for {{ e2 }} second. The second attack is guaranteed to critically strike for {{ f4 }}% damage ({{ f3 }}).

5a1385e08bf55085c847d2cd.description: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy Champion, it deals damage and stuns the Champion, stunning for longer the farther arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage and are slowed.
5a1385e08bf55085c847d2cd.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
5a1385e08bf55085c847d2cd.tooltip: Launches a crystal arrow of ice that stuns the first enemy Champion hit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The farther the arrow flies, the longer the stun, up to {{ e2 }} seconds. Surrounding enemies take half damage.

5a1386598bf55085c847d602.description:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Physical Damage and reveals enemies hit.
5a1386598bf55085c847d602.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker
5a1386598bf55085c847d602.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks within 5 seconds deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

Burrowed: Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that explodes on first enemy hit, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage and revealing non-stealthed enemies for {{ e6 }} seconds.

5a67ecb1fc675d08100b1bae.description: Taliyah creates a very long wall and then surfs it.
5a67ecb1fc675d08100b1bae.name: Weaver's Wall
5a67ecb1fc675d08100b1bae.tooltip:
Cast once to create a wall. Recast immediately to ride ahead of the wall. Moving or receiving damage will cause Taliyah to stop.

Weaver's Wall lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds. Deactivate this spell to break the wall early.

5a8239148bf550fb743b9a72.description: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.
5a8239148bf550fb743b9a72.name: Conquering Sands
5a8239148bf550fb743b9a72.tooltip:
Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a {{ e2 }}% slow for 1 second.

Enemies hit by multiple Sand Soldiers will not take additional damage.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4b8.description: After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b8.name: Pillar of Flame
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b8.tooltip:
After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies.

Blaze: Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage from Pillar of Flame.

5a3850048bf55044c7f60851.description: Aatrox unleashes the power of his blade, dealing damage to enemies hit and slowing them.
5a3850048bf55044c7f60851.name: Blades of Torment
5a3850048bf55044c7f60851.tooltip:
Aatrox unleashes the power of his blade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage to enemies hit and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Aatrox fills up 20% of the Blood Well upon cast.

5a5d90d1fc675d0d1c55dcea.description: Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after 2 seconds, or 0.2 seconds if it strikes terrain.
5a5d90d1fc675d0d1c55dcea.name: End of the Line
5a5d90d1fc675d0d1c55dcea.tooltip:
Fires a powder round that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies in a line.

After 2 seconds or {{ e6 }} seconds on collision with terrain, the round detonates, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies.

5a13865b8bf55085c847d610.description: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.
5a13865b8bf55085c847d610.name: Explosive Charge
5a13865b8bf55085c847d610.tooltip:
Passive: Enemies explode when slain by Tristana's basic attacks, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

Active: Places a bomb on an enemy or turret that explodes after 4 seconds, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage. Each attack and ability charges the bomb's damage by +{{ e6 }}%.

At 4 charges, the bomb explodes immediately. The detonation radius is twice as large if used on a turret.

5a384f988bf55044c7f6084c.description: Infects an area with desecrated soil, causing enemy units who stand on the location to take continual damage.
5a384f988bf55044c7f6084c.name: Tormented Soil
5a384f988bf55044c7f6084c.tooltip:
Curses an area for {{ e7 }} seconds. Enemies on the cursed ground are dealt
from {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage every second based on the enemy's missing Health.

Every time Soul Siphon heals Morgana, Tormented Soil's cooldown is reduced by {{ e4 }}%.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4f0.description: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f0.name: Starlight's Touch
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f0.tooltip:
Spends all charges to heal nearby allied champions for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}% of maximum Health) per charge, up to {{ e5 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) at maximum charges.
Maximum charges: {{ e6 }}

Bravado-empowered attacks grant 1 charge of Starlight's Touch.

5a1386438bf55085c847d54d.description:
Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist.

Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.
5a1386438bf55085c847d54d.name: Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer
5a1386438bf55085c847d54d.tooltip:
Active: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and ranged attacks.

The next attack in Cannon Stance reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist by {{ f3 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0e1.description: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging 3 nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions). Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0e1.name: Spirit Rush
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0e1.tooltip: Nimbly dashes forward firing 3 essence bolts at nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions) dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Can be cast up to three times within 10 seconds before going on cooldown.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4b3.description: Akali moves through shadows to quickly strike through her target, dealing damage and consuming an Essence of Shadow charge. Akali recharges Essence of Shadow charges periodically, max 3 stacks.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b3.name: Shadow Dance
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b3.tooltip:
Akali quickly strikes through her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Akali stores an Essence of Shadow on kills and assists as well as every {{ f1 }} seconds up to {{ e4 }} total.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4e8.description: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use Movement abilities.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e8.name: Miasma
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e8.tooltip:
Cassiopeia spews venom in an arc, leaving toxic clouds for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies in the clouds are continually afflicted with Debilitating Poison, inflicting a decaying {{ e2 }}% slow and grounding them, prohibiting the use of Movement abilities. They also take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second.

Miasma has a minimum cast range.

5a27461a8bf550482ed63de2.description: Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.
5a27461a8bf550482ed63de2.name: Justice Punch
5a27461a8bf550482ed63de2.tooltip: Galio lunges forward with a mighty blow, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies and knocking them into the air for {{ e2 }} seconds. Galio will stop upon hitting a champion or terrain.

5a1386408bf55085c847d476.description: Ryze creates a portal to a nearby location. After a few seconds, allies standing near the portal are teleported to the target location.
5a1386408bf55085c847d476.name: Realm Warp
5a1386408bf55085c847d476.tooltip:
Ryze opens a portal to a location up to {{ e7 }} range away. After {{ e4 }} seconds, all allies near the portal are teleported to that location.

If Ryze becomes unable to cast or move, Realm Warp is cancelled.

5a89c65e8bf5504e255a0037.description: Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them.  Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage.
5a89c65e8bf5504e255a0037.name: GNAR!
5a89c65e8bf5504e255a0037.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Passive: Increases Hyper's Movement Speed bonus to {{ e2 }}%.

Mega Gnar: Knocks nearby enemies in the specified direction, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage and slowing them by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds. Enemies that hit a wall take {{ e7 }}% damage and are stunned instead of slowed.

5a67ec53fc675d08100b1ba9.description: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.
5a67ec53fc675d08100b1ba9.name: Call of the Forge God
5a67ec53fc675d08100b1ba9.tooltip:
Ornn summons a massive lava elemental which stampedes toward him. Enemies run over by the elemental take {{ e2 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage, are slowed by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds and become Brittle for {{ f10 }} seconds.

Ornn can recast this ability to smash into the elemental to redirect and empower it. The empowered elemental knocks up enemies for 1.5 seconds, deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage and applies Brittle.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0af.description: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0af.name: Denting Blows
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0af.tooltip: Every 3rd attack on the same target deals an additional {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) of the target's maximum Health as physical damage, reduces its Armor by {{ e3 }}% and grants Vi {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e4 }} seconds (max {{ e5 }} damage vs. monsters).

5a13863f8bf55085c847d428.description: Grants Annie and Tibbers increased percentage Damage Resist and damages enemies who attack with basic attacks.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d428.name: Molten Shield
5a13863f8bf55085c847d428.tooltip:
Annie grants herself and Tibbers {{ e1 }}% damage reduction for {{ e3 }} seconds.

While the shield is active, enemies who basic attack it take {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5b0.description: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b0.name: Missile Barrage
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b0.tooltip:
Active: Corki fires a missile that explodes at the first enemy it hits, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all nearby enemies.

Corki can store up to 7 missiles, and every 3rd missile will be a Big One, dealing {{ f2 }}% damage ({{ f3 }}).

5a1386428bf55085c847d529.description: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.
5a1386428bf55085c847d529.name: Null Sphere
5a1386428bf55085c847d529.tooltip:
Kassadin fires an orb of void energy that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and interrupts channels.

The excess energy forms around himself, granting a shield that absorbs {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage for {{ e4 }} seconds.

5a1386578bf55085c847d5e4.description: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e4.name: Devastating Charge
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e4.tooltip:
Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for {{ e5 }} seconds. His next attack knocks the target back dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage based on how far Hecarim has traveled during Devastating Charge (knockback distance also scales).

Devastating Charge's remaining duration pauses during Onslaught of Shadows.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d46c.description: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d46c.name: Urchin Strike
5a13863f8bf55085c847d46c.tooltip:
Fizz dashes through his target, dealing {{ a2 }} physical damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. This spell applies on-hit effects.

Seastone Trident is applied to all enemy units Fizz passes through during his dash.

5a3850218bf55044c7f60854.description: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.
5a3850218bf55044c7f60854.name: Shield of Daybreak
5a3850218bf55044c7f60854.tooltip: Next basic attack deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and stuns for {{ e1 }} second.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d20d.description: Malphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d20d.name: Unstoppable Force
5a1385df8bf55085c847d20d.tooltip: Malphite charges to target area. Upon his arrival he deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and knocks them into the air for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a13865c8bf55085c847d617.description: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.
5a13865c8bf55085c847d617.name: Ki Burst
5a13865c8bf55085c847d617.tooltip: Riven's sword emits a burst of runic energy that shocks nearby enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4b4.description: Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b4.name: Flash Frost
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b4.tooltip:
A massive chunk of ice flies toward target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

At the end of its range or if Anivia activates the spell again, the missile detonates, doing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a small area and stunning units for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies damaged by Flash Frost are also slowed by {{ f1 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d459.description: Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies for a short duration. Hecarim gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d459.name: Spirit of Dread
5a13863f8bf55085c847d459.tooltip:
Hecarim deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to all nearby enemies. Hecarim is healed for {{ e1 }}% of the damage these enemies take from any source.

Hecarim cannot heal more than {{ e4 }} Health from minions or monsters.

5a1386588bf55085c847d5f6.description: Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds.
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f6.name: Stand Behind Me
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f6.tooltip:
Braum leaps to target allied champion or minion.

On arrival, Braum and the ally gain {{ f3 }} Armor and {{ f4 }} Magic Resist ({{ e4 }} plus {{ e3 }}% of Braum's bonus Armor/Magic Resist) for {{ e1 }} seconds.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1dd.description: Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a powerful barrage of energy missiles which do massive damage to each unit they pass through (deals 10% less damage to each unit it passes through).
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1dd.name: Trueshot Barrage
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1dd.tooltip: Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a long range missile that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each enemy it passes through. Deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each enemy hit (minimum {{ e3 }}%).

5a89c65a8bf5504e255a0035.description: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, and drain Mana.
5a89c65a8bf5504e255a0035.name: Switcheroo!
5a89c65a8bf5504e255a0035.tooltip:
Jinx swaps weapons.

Fishbones, the Rocket Launcher: Basic attacks deal 110% Damage to the target and nearby enemies, gain {{ e3 }} range, drain Mana, and scale {{ e5 }}% less with bonus Attack Speed.

Pow-Pow, the Minigun: Basic attacks grant bonus Attack Speed for 2.5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 3 times for a total bonus of {{ e1 }}%.

Stacks fall off one at a time and only benefit Jinx's first attack after switching to Rocket Launcher.

5a1386438bf55085c847d577.description: Malzahar summons Voidlings to attack nearby enemies.
5a1386438bf55085c847d577.name: Void Swarm
5a1386438bf55085c847d577.tooltip:
Passive: Casting Malzahar's other spells gives him Gathering Swarm, increasing the number of Voidlings summoned by Void Swarm (max {{ e6 }}).

Active: Summons one or more Voidlings. Voidlings last {{ e1 }} seconds and deal an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each hit.

Voidlings deal {{ e3 }}% damage to lane minions affected by Malefic Visions.
Voidlings deal {{ e4 }}% damage to epic monsters.

5a89c6a28bf5504e255a003b.description: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Movement Speed is slowed.
5a89c6a28bf5504e255a003b.name: Crippling Strike
5a89c6a28bf5504e255a003b.tooltip:
Darius's next basic attack deals {{ f1 }} physical damage and slows the target by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} second.

Crippling Strike refunds its Mana cost and {{ e3 }}% of its cooldown if it kills the target.

5a1386578bf55085c847d5eb.description: Quinn and Valor team up to fly around at great speed.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5eb.name: Behind Enemy Lines
5a1386578bf55085c847d5eb.tooltip:
Quinn calls down Valor to assist her. After a 2 second channel, they unite, gaining {{ e3 }}% Total Movement Speed and the ability to cast Skystrike by recasting this ability or taking offensive action. Skystrike damages nearby enemies.

Taking champion or turret damage puts Behind Enemy Lines on a 3 second cooldown.

5a89c6c88bf5504e255a003f.description: Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from the 3 closest enemy champions. After draining enough health, Swain can cast Demonflare to end his transformation and decimate nearby enemies with a nova of soulfire.
5a89c6c88bf5504e255a003f.name: Demonic Ascension
5a89c6c88bf5504e255a003f.tooltip:
Swain frees the demon within for {{ e3 }} seconds, gaining {{ e6 }} health. Every second, he drains the 3 closest enemy champions for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, healing him for {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health. After draining {{ f7 }} health, Swain gains the ability to cast Demonflare.

Demonflare: Swain unleashes a nova of soulfire dealing magic damage and ending his transformation. Damage per Soul Fragment: {{ e0 }} (+{{ f1 }}).

Current Damage: {{ f3 }}
Max Damage: {{ f2 }}
